item.text: @#/ /mdo zha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu bzhes pa dang shin tu tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe
rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po che'i gdugs kyi khang bzang tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang ba
brtsegs pa na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal
cher dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol
ba| shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor
ba| bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu
rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa gA yA 'od srung dang / tshe dang
ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang
ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kau Di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin
dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum du
tshang ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas
'dus pa gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po dang / stobs dang /
mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
rab tu bskor ba/ gang dag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos kyi blo gros dang / seng+ge'i blo gros dang / stag gi blo gros dang / don gyi blo gros dang / rin po che'i blo gros dang / rab
mchog blo gros dang / zla 'od dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dpag med pa dang / rnam par gnon pa
mtha' yas dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
spos kyi glang po dang / spos dga' dang / spos dga'i dpal dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / tog dang / tog chen po dang / tog dri ma med pa dang / rin chen
mtha' yas dbyug gu dang / rin chen dbyug gu 'dor dang / rin chen dri med dbyug gu dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / rtag tu rab dga' dang / lag na rin po che
dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ri bo dang / ri rab dang / ri bo chen po dang / yon tan rin chen snang dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can
thams cad kyi nad sel dang / rab tu yid dga' dang / yid skyo dang / skyo med dang / 'od byed dang / tsan+dan dang / g.yo bzlog dang / dpag med mngon bsgrags dbyangs dang /
byang chub kun nas bslang dang / mthong ba don yod dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed dang yang thabs cig go /lha
dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dang
yang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / tshong dpon
dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas shing mchod do/ /de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang ba brtsegs pa de nyid kyi nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de las pad+ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum yod pa/ tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ kha ma bye ba bye
ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/ de dag steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khebs
par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i bla re bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /pad+ma'i snying po re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs
shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/ pad+ma de dag thams cad kyang shin tu kha bye bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad+ma de dag gi
'dab ma de dag thams cad kyang mog mog po dang / nog nog po dang / dri nga ba dang / smad par 'os pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin par gyur to/ /'on kyang
pad+ma'i snying po de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par gyur te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu mdzes par
gyur to| |de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi'ang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mthong nas the tshom du gyur te/ gang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gi 'dab ma rnams 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing chu ba rnams kyang
kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os su gyur te/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying po de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re
skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed pas shin tu mdzes par kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu ni/ gang yin/ rkyen ni/ gang yin snyam mo/ /de
nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / 'khor bzhi po the tshom du gyur pa rnams 'dong bar bya ba'i mtshan ma byas so/ /de'i tshe tsan+dan gyi snying po
khang pa brtsegs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis chos can gyi gtam las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su zhu bar spobs par gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das
kyis gnang bas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi po dag gi the tshom gyi zug rdu rig
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pad+ma kha dog ngan cing dri mi bda' ba 'di lta bu bye ba khrag khrig
phrag 'bum 'di dag gis khebs pa dang / de dag gi dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs te 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu
gda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba'i rgyu ni/ gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang
lags| de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mi g.yo bar/ /pad+ma dag gi dbus na
bzhugs par ni/ /khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston mdzad pa/ /bdag gis sngon chad nam yang 'di ma mthong / /'od zer stong rnams rab tu 'gyed mdzad cing / /sangs
rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khengs par mdzad/ /ngo mtshar chos kyi rnams la rol mdzad pa'i/ /'dren pa rnams kyis bar chad ma mchis mdzod/ /'dab ma dag dang chu ba smad 'os
la| |kha dog ngan pa'i pad+ma rnams dbus der/ /de dag rin chen rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs pa/ /ci yi slad du rdzu 'phrul 'di dag sprul/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye
snyed mthong / /de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste/ /de ring dga' ba'i rnam sprul ci 'dra ba/ /sngon chad nam yang 'di 'dra 'di ma mthong / /
rkang gnyis gtso bo lhas ni bstan du gsol/ /rgyu gang rkyen gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ /'jig rten don mdzad thugs brtse gsung du gsol/ /lus can kun gyi
the tshom dgum du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo shin tu rgyas pa yod de/ de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pas snang ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di byas so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan
'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad+ma kha dog ngan pa/ dri
nga ba| smad par 'os pa/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur pa ma yin pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pad+ma'i
snying po 'di dag la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'khod de/ 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed cing 'khod pa de dag kyang rig nas lha dang / mi rnams phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i
las kyang byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang gi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gis sems can srog chags su gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag
'bum gyi spubs su gyur pa thams cad dang / rigs kyi bu dag /sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbubs su gyur pa de dag gi nang na nga 'dra bar ye shes dang ldan pa/ mig dang ldan
ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'khod cing skyil mo krung bcas nas mi g.yo bar 'khod pa mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa de dag gi
nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi g.yo zhing srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dag mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ nga dang 'dra'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /
rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig ni/ de ltar mdzes pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig des sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
pa'i snying po can du mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu lha'i mig can la la zhig gis lha'i mig gis 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing 'di ltar dri nga ba'i pad+ma
kha ma bye zhing ma gyes pa dag la bltas te/ de'i dbus na pad+ma'i snying po la de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
blta bar 'dod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha dog ngan cing dri nga ba smad par 'os pa de dag 'byed cing sel ba de bzhin
du rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mig gis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong nas sems can de dag gi 'dod
chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs dbye ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ yang
dag pa nyid du gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / sems can 'di
dag ni/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/ rigs kyi bu dag /smad par 'os pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs rnams kyis g.yogs pas/ de dag gi nyon
mongs pa'i spubs gzhig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston te/ bya ba 'di la'ang mos par byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la mngon par brtson
par gnas pa de dag gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar pad+ma smad par 'os gyur pa/ /de yi 'dab ma spubs gyur ma gyes la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma gos de/ /mi
'ga' la las lha yi mig gis mthong / /de ni de yi 'dab ma 'byed pa na/ /dbus na rgyal ba'i lus ni mthong gyur nas/ /rgyal ba nye ba'i nyon mongs phyis mi 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig
rten kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi/ /dkyil der gnas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi lus/ /ji ltar smad 'os pad+ma'i sbubs
'dra ba'i/ /nyon mongs stong phrag bye bas khebs par mthong / /nga yang de dag gis ni gsal ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu chos ston to/ /sems can 'di dag sangs
rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/ /rgyal ba'i phyir ni nyon mongs rnam par sbyong / /nga yi sangs rgyas mig ni de 'dra ste/ /de yi rgyal ba'i lus su gnas pa yi/ /sems can 'di dag thams cad
mthong gyur te/ /de dag rnam par sbyang phyir chos smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sbrang tshang zlum po shing gi yal ga la 'phyang ba/ bung ba 'bum
gyis kun tu bsrungs shing sbrang rtsis yongs su gang ba zhig yod la/ de nas sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas bskrad
na| sbrang rtsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang sbrang tshang dang 'dra ste/ de la sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig go/ rigs kyi bu dag/ ji ltar sbrang tshang gi nang na sbrang rtsi bung ba bye
ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes par rig pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la'ang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye
ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
thabs la mkhas pas lung ba bsal ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba
dang / gnod sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsal nas ji ltar sems can de dag la'ang nyon mongs pa
dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag gis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba dang / gnod par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
mthong ba de rnam par sbyangs nas 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag /nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig yongs su dag pa des ngas sems can
thams cad de ltar mthong ngo / /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar 'di na sbrang tshang yod pa la/ /bung bas kun tu bsrungs
shing sbas gyur pa/ /mi gang sbrang rtsi 'dod pas de mthong nas/ /de ni bung ba rab tu skrod par byed/ /de bzhin 'dir yang sbrang tshang lta bu ni/ /srid pa gsum
gyi sems can thams cad do/ /de dag nyon mongs bye ba mang ba ste/ /nyon mongs dbus na de bzhin gshegs 'dug mthong / /nga yang sangs rgyas rnam par sbyang don du/ /bung
ba skrod pa lta bur nyon mongs sel/ /gang gis nyon mongs bye bas gnod 'gyur ba/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thabs kyis rab ston te/ /de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
gyur la| |'jig rten kun tu rtag tu bya byed cing / /spobs ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yi/ /snod 'dra'i chos ston 'gyur bar bya phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan
yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bras sA lu'am/ nas sam/ ci tsi'am/ 'bru rnams ni/ snying po phub ma nas yongs su bsrungs pa yin te/ de rang gi phub ma nas ma phyung gi
bar du bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba'i bya ba mi byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu dag /skyes ba dang / bud med gang dag bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa zas skom gyi
bya ba 'dod pa de dag gis brdungs shing brdungs te phub ma'i sbubs dang phyi shun sel to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i spyan gyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ sangs rgyas nyid/ rang byung nyid nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pas dkris shing gnas par mthong ngo / /
rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa bsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can 'di dag
ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa thams cad las grol te 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs
su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar 'bru'am sA
lu'i 'bras kyang rung / /ci tse 'am ni 'on te nas kyang rung / /ji srid bar du de dag phub bcas pa/ /de srid bar du bya ba mi byed de/ /de dag gis ni brdungs nas phub bsal na/ /
bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed/ /snying po phub ma ldan pa de dag ni/ /sems can rnams la bya ba mi byed do/ /de bzhin sems can kun gyi sangs rgyas sa/ /nyon mongs rnams
kyis khebs par ngas mthong nas/ /ngas ni de dag rnam par sbyang ba dang / /sangs rgyas myur thob bya phyir chos ston to/ /sems can kun la nga 'dra'i chos nyid ni/ /nyon mongs
brgya yis dkris nas gang yod pa/ /de ni rnam sbyang thams cad ji lta bur/ /rgyal bar myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang
'di lta ste dper na/ rul ba dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas bshang gci dri mi zhim pas kun tu gang ba zhig tu mi gzhan gseb lam nas song ba zhig gi gser gyi gar bu zlum
po zhig lhung bar gyur la/ /bshang gci dri nga bas kun tu gang ba/ rul ba dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas der mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis bsnan pas bltar mi snang bar
gyur cing / der des lo bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lo lnga bcu'am/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong du mi gtsang bas chud mi za ba'i chos can de sems can
gang la'ang phan par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de nas lhas lha'i mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po de la bltas nas mi zhig la kye mi khyod song la 'di ni/ rin po
che'i mchog gser rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pas non pa de byi dor gyis la/ gser gyi bya ba gyis shig ces bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu dag/ rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi
rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de ni/ chud mi za ba'i chos can gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /lhas
pa'i mig ces bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid chud mi za ba yod pa'i nyon mongs pa rul pa dang / 'dam rdzab
lta bu rnams bsal ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar mi yi gser gyi gar bu ni//
nyal nyil rnam pa'i nang du lhung gyur la/ /der de lo ni mi nyung ba zhig tu/ /de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can no/ /lha yis lha yi mig gis de mthong nas/ /rnam par sbyang phyir
gzhan la smras pa ni/ /'di na rin chen mchog gi gser yod pa/ /rnam par sbyongs la des ni bya ba gyis/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang / /nyon mongs rnams kyis
yun ring rtag non mthong / /de dag gis ni glo bur nyon mongs zhes/ /rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbul
po zhig gi khyim gyi nang gi mdzod kyi 'og gis la gter chen po dbyig dang / gser gyis rab tu gang ba mdzod kyi tshod tsam zhig mi bdun srid kyi sas g.yogs pa'i 'og na yod la/
gter chen po de mi dbul po de la 'di skad du kye mi nga ni/ gter chen po ste/ sas g.yogs shing 'dug go /zhes mi smra ste/ 'di lta ste/ gter chen po
ni| sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can ma yin pa'o/ /mi dbul po khyim gyi bdag po de ni/ dbul ba'i sems kyis rjes su sems shing de nyid kyi steng na rnam par rgyu'ang
sa'i 'og na gter chen po yod pa de ma thos mi shes ma mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi mngon bar zhen pa'i yid la byed pa khyim lta bur
gyur pa'i 'og na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi gter chen po yod kyang sems
can de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa la chags pas sdug bsngal bas 'khor ba na 'khod de/ chos kyi gter chen po de ma thos pas thob par ma gyur
cing yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir brtson par yang mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste byang chub sems dpa'i nang du 'di lta
bu'i chos kyi gter chen po yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag kyang chos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas go ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ste/ chos kyi gter chen po lta bur gyur nas sems can rnams la sngon ma byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang
dpe dang byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang / bya ba rnams ston pa gter chen po'i mdzod kyi sbyin bdag chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan zhing stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mig shin tu yongs su dag bas sems can thams cad de lta bur mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa'i mdzod yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
ji ltar dbul po'i khyim gyi 'og logs na/ /dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa/ /de la g.yo ba'am rlom sems yod min te/ /nga ni khyod kyi yin zhes de mi smra/ /
de yi tshe na sems can khyim bdag de/ /dbul bar gyur la rnam par mi shes shing / /sus kyang de la bsnyad pa med pas na/ /dbul po de ni de yi steng na 'dug /de ltar ngas
ni sangs rgyas mig gis su/ /sems can de dag thams cad dbul 'dra la/ /de dag rnams la gter chen yod pa dang / /g.yo ba med cing bde gshegs
lus su mthong / /ngas ni de mthong byang chub sems dpa' la/ /khyod kyis nga yi ye shes mdzod zungs la/ /dbul ba med cing 'jig rten mgon gyur dang / /bla med chos gter
'gyur bar gyis zhes bstan/ /gang dag ngas bstan pa la mos gyur la/ /sems can de dag kun la gter yod do/ /gang dag mos nas bdag nyid rtsol byed pa/ /de
dag myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing a mra'i 'bras bu'am/ dzam+bu'i 'bras bu'am/ ta la'i 'bras bu'am
spa'i 'bras bu'ang rung ste/ phyi shun gyi sbubs kyi nang na myu gu'i sa bon chud mi za ba'i chos can yod pa gang gis sa la btab na/ shing gi rgyal por chen por 'gyur ro/
rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'jig rten na gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon
mongs pa'i phyi shun gyi sbubs kyis kun tu khris par mthong ngo / /de la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i
sbubs kyi nang na snying por gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de ni/ sems can zhes bya ba'i ming du chags so/ /de la gang bsil bar gyur pa de ni/ mya ngan na las 'das
pa ste/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnyed pa'o/ /sems can gyi
khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs dam pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du smra bar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
bya ba'i 'du shes su byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don de nye bar ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar spa yi 'bras bu
thams cad ni/ /nang na spa yi myu gu yod pa ste/ /ta la dang ni dzam+bu kun la'ang yod/ /nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu bskyed na skye/ /de bzhin chos kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa yang / /sems
can thams cad spa yi sa bon 'dra/ /de kun nang na bde gshegs lus yod par/ /zag med sangs rgyas mig ni dam pas thob/ /sbubs bshig ma gyur da ni sems can
brjod| |mi shes gang na gnas kyang rlom sems med/ /ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste/ /de la g.yo ba ci yang yod ma yin/ /dper na sdong chen
sa bon las byung ltar/ /sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'tshang rgya zhing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes/ /yongs su sbyang ba'i don du chos gtam smra/ /
rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu dbul po zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa lag mthil tsam zhig
yod la| de nas skyes bu dbul po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te 'brog dgon pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod par gyur nas ci nas kyang de gzhan
gyis mi tshor zhing rkun pos mi 'khyer bar bya ba'i phyir des de ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu du mas dkris te de nas skyes bu de 'brog dgon pa de nyid du nyes pa gang
gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa ras rul pa'i dum bus dkris pa'ang rdog lam de na
'phyan zhing 'dug pa dang / mgron po rnams kyis ma shes nas 'goms shing 'goms shing dong la/ ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu'i thum bu kun tu 'dril ba 'di
gang nas rlung gis bdas zhes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang / 'brog na gnas pa'i lhas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas nas mi gzhan dag cig la bstan te/ kye
skyes bu dag /ras kyi dum bu 'di'i thum bu 'di'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyi/
phye zhig ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris te smad pa'i 'os su gyur cing yun
ring por 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na rtag tu 'khyams par mthong ste rigs kyi bu dag /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyang rung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pa
sna tshogs kyi dkri bas dkris par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus nga ci 'dra ba yod pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni/
ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing yongs su dag par gyur la/ ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag
bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur snyam nas nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar dri nga smrad pa'i 'os rnams kyis/ /yongs su dkris pa bde bar gshegs kyi gzugs/ /
rin chen byas pa ras dum dkris pa de/ /lam gyi bar na 'bor de 'khyams gyur pa/ /lha yi mig gis de ni mthong nas su/ /lha des gzhan zhig la ni rab smras pa/ /'di na
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yod/ /ras du ma thum bu 'di ni myur du phye/ /de bzhin nga yi lha mig 'di 'dra ba/ /des ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang / /nyon
mongs dkri pas dkris nas rab sdug bsngal/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni rtag gces mthong / /ngas ni nyon mongs dkris pa'i nang dag na/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam
bar bzhag gyur la/ /de ni g.yo ba med cing mi 'gyur yang / /de yongs thar byed gang yang med par mthong / /ngas mthong de nas skul ma btab pa ni/ /byang chub mchog tu
gang dag zhugs pa nyon/ /de ltar sems can chos nyid 'di 'drar rtag /'di na yongs su dkris pa'i rgyal ba bzhugs/ /bde bar gshegs kyis ye shes yongs bkrol
nas| |gang tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi ba/ /de tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas ming thob ste/ /lha dang mi rnams sems ni rab tu dga'/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta
ste/ dper na/ bud med mgon med par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ smad par 'os pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ blta na mi sdug pa/ 'dre mo 'dra ba zhig mgon med pa'i
khang par zhugs nas gnas so/ /de der gnas pa dang sbrum par gyur te/ gang gis gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de 'dra ba
zhig de'i mngal du zhugs kyang bud med de'i mngal na 'dug pa'i sems can de la bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can 'di ci 'dra ba zhig snyam du'ang de yid la mi byed/
bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/ ma zhugs snyam du'ang de de na yid la mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na de dbul ba'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / dman pa dang / kho ru chung ba snyam pa'i
sems rjes su sems shing mdog ngan pa dang / dri mi zhim pa nyid kyis mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas te dus 'da' bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du sems can
thams cad kyang mgon med par gyur cing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses par gyur la/ srid par skye ba'i gnas mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas so/ /de na sems
can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzhugs te khong na yod kyang sems can de dag gis khong du ma chud do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs
pa ni| sems can dag bdag nyid la khyad du mi gsad par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed bdag nyid sro shi bar ma byed par khyed brtson 'grus
brtan par gyis shig dang / khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pa yod pa dus shig na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro
bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can zhes bya bar ni/ ma yin no/ /der yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'i/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes
chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar bud med mgon med gyur ba zhig/ kha dog ngan cing gzugs
ni mi sdug la/ /byis pa yin te mgon med khang par gnas/ /re zhig dus na de ni der sbrum gyur/ /de yi mngal du gang zhig nges par ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal po che ba nyid/ /rin chen rnams kyi 'phags pa'i gling bzhi yi/ /bdag po byed par 'gyur ba de 'dra zhugs/ /bud med byis pa de ni 'di lta bur/ /mngal du zhugs
sam ma zhugs mi shes la/ /mgon med khang pa na ni gnas byed de/ /dbul bsnyam du sems shing dus 'da' byed/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang //
mgon med gyur la sdug bsngal chos kyis nyen/ /khams gsum pa yi bde ba chung la gnas/ /nang na chos nyid mngal gnas 'dra yod mthong / /de 'dra mthong nas byang chub sems
dpa' la/ /'jig rten phan par byed pa mngal gnas na/ /sems can kun gyis chos nyid ma shes kyi/ /bdag dman 'du shes ma skyed cig ces bstan/ /khyed cag brtson 'grus
brtsam pa brtan gyis dang / /rang lus ring por mi thogs rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dus shig byang chub snying po thob gyur nas/ /srog chags stong phrag bye ba grol byed 'gyur/ /rigs kyi
bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ spra tshil las rta'i gzugs sam/ glang po che'i gzugs sam/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs dag byas te 'jim
pa'i nang du bcug nas g.yogs la bzhu ste/ zags par byas la gser bzhu ste zhu bar gyur pas bkang nas rim gyis grang bar gyur pa na mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i
gzugs de dag thams cad phyi rol gyi 'jim pa nag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang nang gi rnams ni/ gser las byas pa dag go /de nas mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma
zhig gis de las gzugs gang dang gang dag grang bar gyur pa mthong ba de dang de dag gi phyir rim gyis 'jim pa tho bas bkogs na/ de nas skad cig de la nang na gser las
byas pa'i gzugs yod pa dag yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
des sems can thams cad 'jim pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la/ phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang gi sbu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gang
ste zag pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
thams cad de ltar mthong nas byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song ste 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa de dag gis de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos
kyi rdo rje'i thobs phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gogs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu
dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mig gi sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas nyon mongs pa
de dag las thar par byas te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rab tu bgod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
ji ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs/ /nang ni sbu gu yod cing gsog yin pa/ /rin chen bzhus pas rab tu bkang na ni/ /brgya stong phrag ni mang por 'gyur ba yin/ /
mgar bas shin tu grang bar gyur shes nas/ /'di ltar rin chen las ni byas pa 'di/ /rnam dag gzugs 'gyur las gang bya snyam ste/ /gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa
'gogs par byed/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang / /gser gzugs 'jim pas g.yogs pa 'dra ba ste/ /phyi rol shun pa nyon mongs sbubs yin la/ /nang na
sangs rgyas ye shes yod par mthong / /de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni/ /zhi zhing shin tu bsil bar gyur pa dag /gang gis de dag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin/ /
chos kyi lag chas de la 'gogs par byed/ /rin chen gzugs ni blta na sdug pa ltar/ /rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir ni dag gyur pa/ /stobs bcu dag gis lus rnams
yongs gang ste/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di na mchod par 'gyur/ /ngas ni srog chags thams cad de ltar mthong / /byang chub sems dpa'ang ngas ni de ltar mthong / /
de ltar dag pa bde bar gshegs 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs dag ni sangs rgyas tshul ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'jog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher
'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas 'di
lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang
mang ba rnams su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
bcas pa bzhugs shing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang khang ba brtsegs ba dus su bde ba/ rgyar dpag tshad tsam la 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa/ rin po che
thams cad las byas pa/ lha'i dri zhi ma po dang ldan pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ longs spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa thams cad dang ldan pa 'bum phrag gang+gA'i
klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed nyin re zhing phul te bskal pa 'bum du tshang ba'i bar du 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byed pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig byang
chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dpe gcig tsam lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam du gnas par byed na/ rdo rje'i
blo gros| de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga mas brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang
bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol bas sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du shing man+dA ra ba'i me tog khal bzhi 'bum 'thor la/ rdo rje'i blo gros/
dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di thos nas thal mo lan gcig sbyar te rjes su yi rang ngo / /zhes tshig gcig smras na/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba
mngon par 'du bya ba de la me tog dang / me tog phreng phul ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon
par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /
de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dge bka' stsal to/ /sems can la la gang zhig byang chub la/ /mos pa bskyed nas 'di nyan 'dzin
pa'am| |yi ger 'bri'am glegs bam gzhag byed cing / /gus dang bcas pas tshigs bcad gcig bshad dam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di thos nas/ /
gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di tshol byed na/ /bsod nams phung po ji tsam skyed 'gyur pa/ /de yi phan yon 'dir ni mnyan par gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog 'di la
gnas nas su/ /dpa' bo bskal pa dag ni stong bar du/ /phyogs bcu rnams su mi yi gtso bo dag /nyan thos bcas pa rnams la bsti stang byed/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i stong mang bye ba
bas| |de bas lhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /gzhal med khang mchog rin chen las byas pa/ /'jig rten slob dpon re re la yang phul/ /de dag 'phang du dpag tshad bcu
yod la| |chu dang rgyar ni dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ /spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la/ /de na rin chen las byas khri bshams shing / /dar dang bcos bu'i ras ni brgya bting
ba'i| |khri dag dang ni khri stan gzhan rnams kyang / /ji ltar gang+gA'i klung bzhin dpag med pa/ /rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la/ /rgyal ba gang dag 'jig rten khams
bzhugs pa/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma bas mang ba/ /rgyal pa de dag rnams la de ltar phul/ /kun la gus par mchod pa byed pa bas/ /mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos
nas| |dpe gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dam/ /bzung nas mi 'ga' zhig la 'chad byed na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams phung po mang / /dpa' bos bzung ba'i
bsod nams 'di la ni/ /cha dang dper yang de ni nyer mi 'gro/ /srog chags dag ni kun gyi skyabs 'gyur zhing / /de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/ /de bzhin
gshegs kyi snying po 'dra yod pa/ /sems can dag ni kun gyi chos nyid 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang sems pa/ /de ni rang byung sangs rgyas
myur du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par 'gyur bas gces spras byed par rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu rgyas
pa| tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i 'khor los sgyur
ba| bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rdo rje'i blo gros/ ci'i phyir de
bzhin gshegs pa de rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya zhe na/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'od zer gtong de byang chub sems
dpar gyur pa na ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu de ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung ste shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar dang /
'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te/
byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od dga' bar 'gyur ba/ sdug pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ mgu bar 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag de snyed
snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag tu sems can
gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang / rtogs pa dang ldan
pa dang / spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro
ba dag nas shi 'phos te lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
gyur to| |yang phyir mi ldog pa gang dag la 'od des reg pa de dag reg ma thag tu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /yon tan lnga brgya ba'i
le'u zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gang dag la reg par gyur pa
de dag thams cad baiDUR+ya las grub par yongs su gnas par gyur te/ gser gyi skud pas mig mang ris su bris par gyur la/ mig mang ris thams cad nas kyang
rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dri dang / kha dog dang ldan pa rnams thon par gyur to/ /rin po che'i shing de dag rlung gis
bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu
'di dag byung ngo / /rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag thams cad na sems can rnams dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas
gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams
med par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'ang sems can de dag thams cad la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang bar gyur to/ /mngal na
gnas pa nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thal mo sbyar ba'i las byas so/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bcas pa dang / mngon par
byung ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /tshul de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das de'i
lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ring bsrel mchod rten na gnas pa'i che'ang lus
kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba zhes bya bar lha dang mi rnams kyis mtshan gsol to/ /rdo rje'i
blo gros| yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba de mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas pa'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od
zer mtha' yas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong de la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongs su dris so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rjes su gzung ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i phyir stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du bskal ba
chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad de/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
tshig rnam par shes par bya bas chos bsgrub pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / dpe 'bum phrag du mas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyogs
bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang tshegs chung dus go bar gyur to/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa
ba yongs su smin nas yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bzhi ni/ ma gtogs so/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod
sems na/ de de ltar mi blta ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan
pa la gang dag da dung yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid de/ bzhi po'o/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/
de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pas
don che ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na/ /bcom ldan 'od zer
gtong zhes bya ba byung / /de yi lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byung bas/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong dag snang bar gyur/ /rgyal ba dang por mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas rig /byang chub
sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas kyis/ /de tshe bde gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus/ /mdo 'di rtag tu yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis rgyal de'i bstan las mdo sde
'di| |'dren pa las ni mngon sum thos gyur pa/ /de kun myur du byang chub dam pa thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni ma gtogs te/ /mthu chen thob dang spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gsum ba ste/ /rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yin/ /de tshe de dag gis ni mdo 'di thos/ /byang chub sems dpa'
'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /de tshe gang gis rgyal la zhus byung ste/ /de yi dbang byas bde gshegs sras po ni/ /de tshe rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid yin/ /nga yang sngon gyi spyad pa spyod pa'i
tshe| |bde bar gshegs pa seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan las/ /mdo sde 'di yi ming ni thos par gyur/ /gus par byas te thos nas thal mo sbyar/ /nga ni legs par byas pa'i las de yis//
byang chub dam pa myur du thob par gyur/ /de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis/ /rtag tu mdo mchog 'di ni gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ /rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ lung nod dam/ kha ton du byed dam/ ston kyang
rung / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rab tu 'chad pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba de dag la tshegs chung dus chos de dag kyang mngon
sum du 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa de byang par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das /
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang las kyis grib pas bsgrib par mi 'gyur zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de dag sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig las mang du thos pas chos bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
bo| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir ngas par 'byung ba de dag kyang yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong dang / nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang /
lnga stong dang / drug stong dang / bdun stong dang / brgyad stong dang / dgu stong dang / khri dang / sangs rgyas 'bum nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi bar dag gi chos
ston pa kun tu gsung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bdag kyang yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / glegs pa ma du byas te 'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis deng nyid bla na med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam du sems bskyed bar bya ste/ de ni/ ji ltar da ltar de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya
ba'i 'os dang / mchod pa'i 'os yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di thos
nas| |bdag gis byang chub dam pa thos par bsam/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/ /de ni de ltar 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os/ /de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam par
'dren| |khrid byed rnam par khrid byed bsngags pa'i 'os/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/ /de ni de ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod
pa| |mi yi khyu mchog chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin/ /de ni nyi zla lta bur blta ba'i 'os/ /'jig rten mgon po lta bur phyag bya'i gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi
po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya bra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya nAk+Sha ra ka raN+Da ka bai ro tsa na gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
bod skad du/'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang rgya chen po shes pa/ thabs la mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ le lo med pa/
yi ge sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa khong du chud par byed pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'dul ba'i myu gu dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes
pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ sems can la mnyes gshin pa/ ting nge 'dzin mang po dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ bla ma la
su zhu che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gling dang mtshungs pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba shes pa/ g.yo khong du chud par byed pa/ nges pa'i tshig dang
spobs pa zad mi shes pa zung khong du chud par byed pa/ rnam par rgyal ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad la khong du chud par byed pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las byung zhing brten
pa| shin tu dpa' ba/ gnas pa med pa/ chos bla ma'i rang bzhin la nges pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i khyad par sems pa/ snying po la dpa' ba/ skye ba la smod pa'i skyes bu/ chos
khong du chud par byed pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi shes pa/ yul 'khor srung ba/ yul 'khor skyong ba/ sgra grags pa/ rgyal ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i mdzod dang ldan pa/
yi ge med pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ shin tu gnyid kyis ma log pa/ ye shes kyi phung po la gzhol ba/ rang gi las la mngon par dga' ba/ rang gi rig pa sten pa/ kun tu bzang
ba| mnyam pa nyid la dga' ba/ rnam par dag ba/ rang gi rgyud dang / pha rol gyi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ rnam par rgyal ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sgrog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rgyal ba'i gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sprul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gi 'byung
gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro ba 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i sgra dbyangs
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu brtsegs dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i gdong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug
na nor bu dang thabs cig go /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa thams
cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
kyang rgyal tshab tu gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni/ brgya byin du ma dang lhan cig/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba
du ma dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug na /tshangs
pa du ma dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ni/ 'khor rnam thos kyi bu du ma dag dang lhan gcig /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid gnyis 'groms dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad 'dzin pa du ma dang lhan cig/ shA ra dwa ri'i
bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge mang dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni/ lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal
po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman yang dag byung dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na zla ba dang nyi ma rang gi
gzi brjid snyems pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa de'i tshe dzam+bu'i chu po'i gser
gyi mdun du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyir zhing mi mdzes/ phyir zhing mi 'bar/ phyir zhing lam me ma yin/
phyir zhing lhan ne ma yin/ phyir zhing lhang de ma yin no/ /sred med kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / ma dros pa la sogs
pa klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / dri za'i bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni/ dri za bye ba phrag du ma dang lhan cig/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dri ma med
pa chen po ni/ nam mkha'i lding bye ba phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa las gnang ba mnos te 'khor bzhi dag dang lhan cig dong nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gnyis shig zhu lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnang gi/ khyad par sems/ khyod ci bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can
gcig gi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ba ma yin gyi/ nga ni/ khyed kyi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad
par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas gang spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpas gang bsrungs na/ bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas
gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
khyad par sems la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ tshangs pa/ de skad ces smras ba ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
sbobs pa 'di lta bu byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la su'ang zhu ba 'di lta bu zhu bar mi
'gyur ro/ /khyad par sems/ de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
byang chub sems dpas chos gcig gang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig pho gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi chos te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos
gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar zhe sdang gi chos te/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar
gti mug gi chos te/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar bdag tu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig
go /yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar le lo ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go /yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar rmugs pa dang gnyid
de| 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go /yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar sred pa ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ rigs kyi bu/ yang byang
chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ rigs kyi bu/
gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig po de gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas gang bdag mi 'dod pa de
gzhan dag la mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang la la zhig chos gcig po de bsrungs na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad
srung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa de srog mi gcod do/ /gang bdag gi nor phangs par 'dzin pa de ma byin
par mi len to/ /gang bdag gi chung ma phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la sogs te/ gang la la zhig 'di
snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o snyam du sems pa des chos gcig po 'di bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub don du gnyer ba de thams cad ni/ rang gi bde ba'i rgyu don du gnyer gyi/ su'ang bdag sdug bsngal ba mi 'dod
do| |'gro ba ni/ bde ba 'dod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la ma byed cig ces nga smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ gang byang chub
sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig go /rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
chos gcig po de gang yin zhes de skad zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang yang med do//
rigs kyi bu/ gang la chos gang yang rtogs pa med pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad 'gag pa med par thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
pas chos thams cad mtha' gnyis las grol bar thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byung bar thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pas las bdag gir bya bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las par thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen ni/ glog dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen med pa las skye ba med par thugs su chud do/ /de ltar de
bzhin gshegs pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid thugs su chud do/ /ci'i phyir yongs su rtog pa dag rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes smra zhe na/ rigs kyi
bu| 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes la sogs pa gang dag ci 'byung ba'i mngal de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi tshe ye shes de rang bzhin la yongs su
rtog pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ni mngal du chud pa yin te/ de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
pas chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i rang gi chos nyid thugs
su chud do/ /rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo gcig thugs su chud do/ /
rigs kyi bu/ gang la 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / 'chi 'pho med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / blang nga med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang /
'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ gang rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med de/ gang la dper bya bar mi nus pa dang / gang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis
brjod par mi nus pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig po de de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do/ /bkod pa'i rgyal po bstan pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi
snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig la rdul phra rab ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi sems can rnams
kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de snyed cig gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /de bas ches mang ba'i sems can
dang / sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni/ sa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong
mngon du gyur to/ /mang du ci dgos te gtam 'di ni/ su la'ang don med par ma gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan
zin| khyod nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar spro bar gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
dgu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o/ /slad
ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i snod du 'tshal bar bgyis la/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ grogs
po dag /shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
chung ngu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga la skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ btsun par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de dag
ni| nga'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yongs su
dag par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
mdun gyis bltas nas mdun na bzhugs par gyur te mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nga'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la
gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de dag gi chos kyi mdzod mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /de dag tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ nga ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i tshig 'di smra ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di lus la btags sam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ da ni/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar ngas ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing mig lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo / /byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i las tshad med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshig 'di ni/ tha mar smra ste/ de mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas par ngas mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas khyad par sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i
bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do| |'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na
shI la dang / mu ni warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya A ka sha gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
chen po dang yang thabs cig go /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang de'i tshe na nub phyogs na brgya
byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bum phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha
dang / mi rnams dang / gang nyan thos rnams dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gang sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba
chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu rin po che snang ngo / /lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa/ brjod du med
pa| nam mkha' bzhin du snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /sems can gang dag der 'dus pa de dag kyang bdag kyang mi mthong ngo / /
gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong ngo / /de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to/ /bdag bdag gi lus kyi
gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / rig pa'ang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo / /nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
yang mi mthong / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to/ /sgra dag kyang rna lam du grag par
ma gyur to/ /dri dag kyang sna la bro bar ma gyur to/ /sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung
bar gyur to/ /yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang dang gang du brtags pa de dang / de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku'i mtshan dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs su mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyang ma nas kyang brgya byin thogs pa'i rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin
gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/
skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas 'jigs par mi byed/ dngangs par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed de/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
gyi sa yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/ dngangs par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed
do| |gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / lha dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / dri za dag dang / lha ma yin
dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye chen po dag dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi
dang / mi ma yin pa 'dus pa de dag ma lus par 'jigs par gyur/ dngangs par gyur/ skyo bar gyur nas tshu rol dang pha rol la rmongs shing sems 'khrugs nas de dag
gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong / de na 'di ci zhig /'di ji lta bu zhig /'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes dri ba'ang gang yang mi snang ngo / /yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu chen po zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/ chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la/ /gang zag gang dag
ma 'tshal ba/ /gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas/ /dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur/ /phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing / /gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de/ /'di la gang zag kha
cig ni| |sangs rgyas chos la the tshom 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la/ /chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de dag tshu rol pha rol la/ /bzod pa'i nam mkha'i
mtshan 'tshal to/ /'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste/ /brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen che/ /spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'/ /nor bu rin chen
brgya byin thogs/ /gang dag la ni rgyang nas gda'/ /sems can de dag skal pa che/ /dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyin/ /ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad
shes rab che/ /de ring 'dir ni zab mo'i gtam/ /mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/ /bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i/ /sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod/
sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du/ /'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /gang na
kun gzhi thos gyur cing / /shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas/ /de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo/ /de ni nam mkha'i snying po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul te/ /snang ba med
cing smros med pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan/ /lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa/ /phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /rtag dang chad la chags pa ni/ /pha rol tshu rol shin tu
rmongs| |lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las/ /rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa/ /brjod pa med pa sgom par gyis/ /de ni myur du sa thob 'gyur/ /kye grogs po dag /gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya
ste| 'di lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jigs pa shes par byas nas de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi
skye mi 'gag pa/ mi dmigs pa/ cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag ba dang chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs/
mi dngangs/ mi skrag par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la chags par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing
phyin chad kyang chad pa dang rtag pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas 'khor der lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji
ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to| |nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs
pa| ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/ bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi
mchog lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ ded dbon lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni/ gter lta bu/ sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni/
bum pa bzang po lta bu/ mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni/ nyi ma lta bu/ lam stor pa rnams kyi ni/ zla ba lta bu/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi ni/ ri rab lta bu/ nyon mongs pa'i nad
kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyi ni/ sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de ltung ba rnams kyi ni/ 'khar ba lta bu/ phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams
kyi ni| me tog lta bu/ sdom pa spyod pa rnams kyi ni/ me long lta bu/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yu do pa rnams kyi ni/ gos lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ stegs
lta bu| pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ gu lta bu/ mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ them skas lta bu/ tshigs ngan pa dang skur pas gdungs pa rnams kyi ni /gdugs lta bu/ pha
rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni/ seng+ge lta bu/ char pa rnams kyi ni/ chu lta bu/ bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni/ go cha lta bu/ slabs pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni/ mig 'byed pa lta bu/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog thams cad kyi ni/ sa lta bu/ nad pa rnams kyi ni/ smad pa lta bu/ bkres pa rnams kyi ni/ 'bru lta bu/ skom pa rnams kyi ni/ chu shel lta bu/ ngad pa rnams
kyi ni| mal lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ me shel lta bu/ byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni/ shing rta lta bu/ skyed mos tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni/
rdzing bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi ni/ phrang ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni/ 'bras bu lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de
sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ nor bu yid bzhin lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ shing yongs 'du dang 'dra ba/ gcod pa'i phyir
lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni/ mtshon lta bu/ 'joms pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ni/ rdo rje lta bu/ bdud rnams kyis ni/
thub par dka' ba/ thabs dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ tshes grangs/ ye shes kyi ni/ 'byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni/ gnas/ rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni/ phreng ba dang
mtshungs pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ni/ gos dang mtshungs pa/ lha rnams kyi ni/ mig lta bu/ mi rnams kyi ni/ lam lta bu/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi ni/ skyabs/
yi dwags rnams kyi ni/ rten/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni/ mgon/ sbyin gnas kyi sems can thams cad kyi ni/ snod du gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyi ni| shing rta lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni/ blon po lta bu/
chos kyi grong khyer gyi ni/ sgo srung yin te/ rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni/ brgyan pa/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
dang ni| ldan/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba
yin gyi| da khyed 'dir lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig /mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug ba dang / lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / snod sna tshogs kyis bkur stir gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/
bsti stang gyis shig /mchod par gyis shig /lam byi dor gyis shig/ rgyan par gyis shig/ bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig /khyed thams cad kyang de lta
bu'i yon tan thos pa dang / snod du gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa mtha' dag stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te snying ni/ rab tu dga'/ bzhin ni/ rab
tu 'dzum/ mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang / 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha'i dbang po dang
klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
dbang po dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la bkod pa'i mchog ji lta bu
zhig gis bkur sti bya snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po
che sna bdun las byas shing / ri dang | 'brog dang / ri skam dang / phug dang / grog po dang / g.yang sa dang / rtswa dang | rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / dri nga ba la sogs pa/
med la lag mthil lta bur mnyam par sprul to/ /des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu dbyangs dang / shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang /
'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par sprul to/ /shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / skam shing dang / 'dab ma sa la brten pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las
byas pa sprul to/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na'ang nad ni/ rab tu zhi/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang | dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sems can dag gis kyang zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dag thong bar gyur
to| |de'i tshe gang dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
pa| blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing yan lag thams cad ni/ yongs su rdzogs/ rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
'od kyis ni/ mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni/ bral/ sems ni/ rab tu zhi/ dge ba thams cad la ni/ sems mos/ dkon mchog gsum la ni/ sems rab tu
dad par gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na'ang nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so
dang 'tsham pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur to/ /nor bu rin
po che de dag las kyang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byung bar gyur to/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gos bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang
rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos sna tshogs kyi char dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang / snod sna tshogs kyi char
dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to/ /lha'i gos dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
dkar po dang | u ra ga sa la dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i phye mas lam der bkram par mngon par sprul to/ /lam de'i
g.yas g.yon gnyis kar rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang ba dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bzang yang mngon par sprul nas khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi chung ma dam
pa dang / slas dang 'dra ba dang / yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrog cing rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng
