su bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyod par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol
tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi chung bar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i pha rol tu bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
dpag tu med pa'i yon tan mang bas 'das pa'i rgyan lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yon tan dpal rgyan gzi brjid phung po lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i ri bo dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo dpal rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyan gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags gtsang shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla mdzes grags
ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen rdo rje brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa mthu chen brtson 'grus 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen brtson 'grus la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mang ba la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar ston par mngon du 'phags pa'i brtson 'grus chen
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa chen por 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'bar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grol bar 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ta ma la'i lo ma tsan+dan dri la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri thams cad 'bar ba'i sgo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri ma yin pa la phyag 'tshal
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dri med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa mi tshugs pa'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ban lang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes me tog la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'bar ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gtor ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu thul ba'i me tog la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dkar ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa mi smon pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par che ba'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i yan lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa med par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa don gcig tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don du gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa gang du'ang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa med par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa rnam par spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi
mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ bam po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mang du
ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum 'byung ba
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum rnam par 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun
sum ma spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phro ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa shin tu sbyangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa shin tu sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lte ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo| /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba dri mchog gi
lte ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum chub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyi rtse mo
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems kyi mchog
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong bar gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
'khor lo gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mchod pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i sde 'joms dgra spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
ba 'dod pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ji bzhin pa rjes su ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho 'byung bar gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thog mar sems bskyed pa'i the tshom gcod pa nyon mongs pa spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa yid dam kun bsgrags the tshom gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snyems pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kauN+Ti n+ya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skrag pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mtshan smos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i rigs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu nan tan mdzad pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od shar bsil la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ri'i dri bsung la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i tshul 'dzin sgra 'byin dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom rnam par
'byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu ma nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtse mo ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi dra bas
sku brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa so sor dmigs pas brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dkar ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
rab tu snang ba 'gyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyas pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thos par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'tshe ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smred pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dper stag lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro rnams dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
dga' ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba skyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par skyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sbyor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du mar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa mthor gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgo dbyangs mdzod mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyod pa'i ye shes kun tu mi nor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gog par gzhol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs ye shes gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ze ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par brgyan pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang rna la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gdul dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan rtse
mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma byang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi spyan bden
ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtsol ba la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems rtse gcig tu thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar
gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ta ma la'i lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang 'gying ba'i 'gros bzhin
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan 'gyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab chen po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags
skyes po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo dzam+bu gser la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chu stod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stsal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra ba med pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brjid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma rgya chen la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbu na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa so sor dmigs
pa'i rgyan sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge brlang pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar sbyin
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs rnam par bsgrags
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud sde'i dgra rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa rnams rab tu sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rang bzhin
nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis bsod nams mtha' med grangs med pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mang po 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/
rjes su dran zhing bsgoms na/ de dag la mig nad med par 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad med/ sna nad med/ lce nad med/ lus nad med cing sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'byang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
thams cad kyis gnod pa byed pa mi 'byung / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/ phyogs thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
dgongs par 'gyur/ de dag gis de la rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par mdzad do/ /mngon du'am chung du na rmi lam du'ang rung ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas par mngon du ston te/ ci nas myur du ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo mo so sor thob par mdzad do/ /nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ rin po che'i pad+mo las rdzus te skye bar 'ong / nam yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang
ldan par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / spyan lnga dang / sems can smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub
kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / mi
'jigs pa dang / so so kun tu rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan
par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi yon tan dang / grags pa phun
sum tshogs pa de bzhin du de dag la'ang yon tan du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de dag la'ang phun sum tshogs pa ring po mi thogs par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde
bar myur du mngon sum par byang chub bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re d+harma d+hA tu pra ti Sh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs

pa phyogs thams cad du mar me'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra dI pe pra dI pe/ dz+nyA na pra dI pe swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/

dz+nyA na te dze/ bud+d+ha te dze/ d+harma te dze/ sang+g+ha te dze swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra te pra te/ sarba pra te/ ba ri pu ra Ni bud+d+ha sa mu dra daR+sha Ne swAhA/ de bzhin

gshegs pa chos brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ k+Shi ne k+Shi ne sarba karma A ba ra Na NI/ bud+d+ha sad te na/ d+harma sad te na/ sang+g+ha sa da te na swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa

chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ sUR+ya pra b+he/ tsan+d+ra sUR+ya sha ta sa ha/ sri ti re ka pra b+he/ bi sho d+hA ya dz+nyA na tsak+Shu swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mang
ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+harma byu he/ ga ga na byu he/ dz+nyA na byu he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ da ra da ra/ dz+nyA na

kA ya pa ri sho d+ha ni/ dz+nyA na pa ri pu ra Ni ta thA ta a ba bo d+ha ni shi g+h+ra ma swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi bu le go tsa re pU ra yA pU/

ra yA/ sarba A shA dz+nyA na a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ sarba bo d+hi satwa a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shugs rdul med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ be

ge be ge /d+harma sa mu dra be ge/ ga ga na sa mu dra ba ge/ pA ra mi tA be ge/ sarba A shA pa ri bu ra Ne be ge/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ sangs rgyas 'di dag sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe
smon lam 'di skad ces gsungs te/ nam bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa na sems can gang gis nged kyi ming thos sam/ 'dzin tam/ bklags na/ de dag thams cad
phyir mi ldog par gyur cig /mi khom pa brgyad las yongs su 'das shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon sum du dgongs te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du skye bar shog cig /de nas shi 'phos na'ang lhag mar bcas pas yongs su 'dzin par shog cig /'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par shog cig /gang gis de
bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan 'dzin pa de dag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par zungs shig/ de ste byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mthong bar 'dod na/ des ci
nus par mchod pa byas te 'bum bzla bar bya'o/ /kun tu yid gtsang zhing byams pa'i sems su bya/ de ste kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'dod na'ang de bzhin mchod de nyis 'bum bzla bar bya'o/ /de ste'ang de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mthong bar 'dod na/ de ltar mchod de sum 'bum bzla bar bya'o/ /kun tu'ang gtsang zhing byams pa'i sems su bcas la nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang /
khro ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma mchog 'od gsal dpal gzi brjid snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ suR+ya suR+ya/ dz+nyA na sU R+ye swAhA/ de
bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po rnam pa du ma'i rgyal po dpal 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ te dza shi ri swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs
med par bsags pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa mu dra ye sa mu dra ye/ dz+nyA na sa mu dra ye swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshul thams cad rnam par sprul pa'i
gzi brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he gar+b+he/ dz+nyA na gar+b+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang nam mkha' sgra mang gzi brjid 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na ga ga na/ ga ga na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ me ru me ru/ rat+na me ru swAhA/ de
bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gu Ne gu Ne/ gu Na sa mu dre swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
ge thu ge thu/ dz+nyA na ge thu swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa mu dre sa mu dre/ dz+nyA na sa mu dre swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal

mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+h+wa dze d+h+wa dze/ d+harma d+h+wa dze swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+ha ra ni mu dre swAhA/ de bzhin
gshegs pa chos stobs 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra b+he pra b+he/ d+harma pra b+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas nam mkha' dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he
bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chos kyi 'od zer ri rab rtse mo snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a rtsi a rtsi/ dz+nyA na a rtsi swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rtse

mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ me g+ha me g+ha/ ma hA me g+ha swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma mar me dpal rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra dI pe pra dI pe/ dz+nyA na pra dI pe swAhA/ de

bzhin gshegs pa zhing du sangs rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa me sa me/ sa ma s+thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dru me dru me/ dz+nyA na dru
me swAhA| de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gu Ne gu Ne/ gu Na me ru shi ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ni me

ni me| dz+nyA na ni me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi ri bi ri/ bai ro tsa na swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ byu
he byu he| dz+nyA na byu he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ma sa ma sa mu dra bi kra Ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA| te dze te dzo/ dz+nyA na te dze swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ in+d+re in+d+re/ in+d+ra bi kra me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal bzang

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ha dre b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kun 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra b+he pra b+he/ dz+nyA na pra b+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje

rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ badzra badzra/ badzre ut+ta re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs stobs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a seng+ge a sang+ge bud+d+he swAhA/ de bzhin
gshegs pa chos dbyings gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+harme d+harme/ d+harma d+ha re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu mar me 'od kyi rgyal po

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ de ni de ni/ de ni ka ra ni swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa snying rje'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ ma hA te dze swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dka'

thub rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra te pra te/ pra ta ba ri pu ra Ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ k+Sha me k+Sha me/ dz+nyA na k+Sha me

swAhA| de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra b+he pra b+he/ dz+nyA na maN+Da la pra b+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i rgya mtsho mnga' la phyag

'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi 'od rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra shan+te pra shan+te/ u ba pra shan+te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs

pa grags pa rnam par rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi bu le bi bu le/ dz+nyA na bi pu le swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho shugs kyi rtse mo rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa
ma sa ma| sa ma s+thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ra ti ka re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sprin la phyag 'tshal lo//
tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ g+hu ma g+hu me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ shi ra ye swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i cod pan la phyag 'tshal
lo| |tad+ya thA/ mu ku te mu ku te/ d+harma mu ku te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od zer gzi brjid dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ye ba ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs

pa rkang gnyis dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ ma hA d+hu me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga ne ga ga ne/ ga ga na sa me swAhA/
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sam+b+ha ba sam+b+ha ba/ bud+d+ha sa te na swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa smin mtshams dpal snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya
thA| u me u me/ u ma ba ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba grags par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ g+ho She g+ho She/ bud+d+ha g+ho She swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ se ra shi be swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ te dze te dze/ te dza ba ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi be shi be/ bu shi be swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ k+Sha ye k+Sha ye/ karma k+Sha ye swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa
sprin sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ru he ru he/ g+ho Sha ru he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ in+d+re
in+d+re| an+d+ra ba ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gu Ne gu Ne/ gu Na sa mu ti te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams ri bo la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pu ra ya pu ra ya/ sarba ma nor tha nA tha swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsung zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sha ma sha me/ sha ma ma ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs
pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ pra sa ra Ni swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang ba bzhin dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ku mu ku mu/

ku mu te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he gar+b+he/ ta thA ga ta gar+b+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

sam+b+ha ba sam+b+ha ba/ pra Ni d+ha na sam+b+ha ba swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbang po gtsug tor nor bu snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ de be de be/ de be na dra phu tsi te swAhA/ de bzhin
gshegs pa gser gyi ri bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ka na tsa ne ka na tsa ne/ kan tsa na sa tri she swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+ne/

dz+nyA na rat+ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+harma d+harma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+yA thA/ shi ri te dze

shi ri te dze shi ri swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dze be dze be/ dze be ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
shAn+te shAn+te/ pra sha ma ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi gnas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ki ri ki ri/ ki ri rA dza swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i mar me sprin dpal la phyag

'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra sha ma ri pu pra sha ma ri pu shan+to b+ha ba ri pu swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba b+ha se a ba b+ha se/ a ba b+ha
se ka ra Ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin shol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi bi bi bi ma le te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ su ru su ru
sUR+ya ti te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mar me dpal ri rab phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dI pi dI pi/ d+harma pra ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
tsi ri tsi ri/ tsi ri tsi swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ de ba de ba/ de ba pu tsi ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bsgrags glog gi mar me la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ si me si me/ bud+d+ha sid+ha si me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan mang po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ me ru me ru/ bud+d+ha
me ru swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga ga ga /ga ta ya swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rigs pa mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya

thA| sam+b+ha be sam+b+ha be/ sam+b+ha be byu he bu swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya mtsho dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gardza gardza ni swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings nga ro
dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra Ni ban+d+he swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa stsal pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ni me ni me/ dz+nyA na ni me swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa

lha sgra dpal la phyag 'chal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ swa re swa re/ bud+d+ha swa re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu kun gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te na
swAhA| de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa mu dre sa mu dre/ d+harma d+hA tu sa mu dre swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya

thA| sam+b+ha be sam+b+ha be/ sam+b+ha ba tu/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te na swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gu Ne gu Ne bud+d+ha sam+b+ha ba gu Ne swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dpal gyi mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ pra dI pra shi ri swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+nyI na dzi na sUR+ya swAhA/ de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin rnam par mnga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi bu le bi bu le/ ga ga na bi bu le swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal mar me'i yon tan gzi

brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ pra dI pe pra dI pe/ shi ri te dza pra dI be swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi/ mo tsa ni mo k+Sha ni/ mu

ga te pi mu ga te swAhA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga l+ya /hir N+ya gar+b+he rat+na gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ma ra ma ra tha sa d+ha ni/ ma na se ma hA mA na se/ ad b+hu te a t+yad b+hu te/ bI ta

b+ha ye| su wa r+Ne bra h+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma ad+h+ya She te/ sarba ar+the/ Shu pa rA dzi te/ sarba tra a pra ti ha te/ tsa tu shiSh+Tha b+hu ta ko Ti b+hA Shi te/ na maH sarba sid+d+hi nA ma ta thA ga ta nA na swAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod
pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs sngags zab mo brjod pa ni/
legs so/ /gang gis gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rgyas par yid la byed na/ rigs kyi bu pho de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od gsal gyis ljags kyi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams yog par mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag bdun cu po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs sngags
kyi tshig 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ci nus su mchod par byed pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ji ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad
do| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od gsal la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gleng ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji
lta bur na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu gleng ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gang su'ang rung ste/ las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na/ nang par sngar langs te lci bas dkyil
'khor byas la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pas ci nus su mchod pa byas te 'du 'dzi mang po spangs la nyin gsum dben/ mtshan gsum dben par de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dran par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bden pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlabs pas na/ de'i da ltar

gyi tshe 'di nyid la las thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+re su tsan+d+re/ mahA tsan+d+re/ tsan+d+ra ki ri Ni/ mi li mi li/ bud+d+ha

a d+hiSh+Thi te/ si li si li/ d+harma a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ ki la ki li saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa 'chang
zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nang par langs shing yid la byed na/ de bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par 'ong ngo / /nam du'ang byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ gang gis
de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'chang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byas na/ de da ltar gyi tshe 'di nyid du las thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lo bye ba khrag bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ mthar byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor la thug gi bar du de'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mig yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsak+Shu tsak+Shu/ dz+nyA na tsak+Shu swAhA/ gang gis de bzhin
gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzin na/ de lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa'i mig lta bur 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzhi bcur tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ byang chub kyi
dkyil 'khor du thug gi bar du mi zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang dri 'od gsal rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga dze ga dze/ ga dze in+d+ri swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan
'das la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal rgyal po de'i
mtshan brjod pa 'dzin na/ de'i lus las lo brgya phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems nam du'ang brjed par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ su puSh+pe swAhA/ de'i cho ga ni/ me tog ji lta bur bshams pa de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mchod rten la gtor na/ de'i bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'ong / de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
lo| |tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+ha ra Ni ban+d+he swAhA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di 'dzin na/ des bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro/ /mtshams bab par 'ong / sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te byin na ji snyed pa mi byams/ de bzhin du smon lam thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa gcig tu mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba'i khyu mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar bas shin tu rnam
par 'phar ba'i khyu mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i don la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
rtse mo mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkhar mthun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i
stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu 'gyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
me tog sna tshogs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ba spu ldang ba dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa tsan+dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gsal ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i bal glang la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs gcig pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun rdzob phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la dmar po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'od dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba las 'byung ba'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad skrag cing 'joms par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcus lhag pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha'
yas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas mtha'
yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo
sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sil snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar yongs su grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dpal 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dka' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dri'i 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra 'byin 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen rtse mo mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od gsal la la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur grags pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan dbang pos sprin phyug mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas ye shes 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa
mang du sprul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mang po'i mchog mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas 'od me tog tshogs kyi dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog 'byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon
mi za ba'i dpal kun tu grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed
ma thag tu sems can kun gyi sems kyi rgyan du 'gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pha rol phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tha mi
dad pa'i shing rta la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo 'od las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ut+pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtan pa'i
rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpung mgo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
'od 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sde mtha' yas
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa rin chen gdugs mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi me tog la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems
bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun tu bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ka ling+ka'i rgyal po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung
pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa so sor brtan pa'i yon tan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa med pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ut+pa la'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/
de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od mtha' yas dri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bud med skyes par bsgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun gyi sems dad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes
ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi
tshugs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rab tu gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
tu rtsol ba khyu mchog ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan
lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun yid 'joms zhing 'jigs pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bdud rtsir 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dga' bar rtsol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sbyor ba kun gcod pa'i go cha la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sprul pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams
cad ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa pad+mo las byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kun nas byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gnas la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bral ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa go cha tha dad pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dri dpal la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog dpe med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brjod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa zla ba las mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med rnam par skye ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags
par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu 'khor ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri 'od kun tu 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rab tu
mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer spros pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od
khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma dang bral ba'i rtse mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum khyu mchog rnam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rigs khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gnod sbyin khyu mchog la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i khru mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam
par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu so sor bstan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin chen mtha' yas ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mngon du 'phags pa'i 'od zer dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dri dam pa khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ban glang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i
'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dpal 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa'i dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa bde bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i
dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon
du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu
snang ba'i bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sna tshogs kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khor mchog dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul dang bral ba rnam par grol ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
gser gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rten la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa yi ge'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
gdon mi za ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnam par snyoms pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

pa pad+mo snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa puN+Da rI ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi
me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa gser gyi nor bu ri gzi brjid bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs kyis sku bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mu med bzang la phyag

gshegs pa rgyal ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bar 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par sems pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan la dpa' ba'i sde 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dga' ba rnam par mdzad par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos las byung bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
dri ma med pa'i dpung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpung bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpung pa ring la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon
tan dpung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpung pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye shes bzang ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub dkyil
'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rmad lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i rmad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rmad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i rmad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa'i yon tan shar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan 'byung
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sprul pas 'dul
ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bas 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol pas 'dul
ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa re ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang ba yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdul sprugs pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags kyi rdul bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs don la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa mi tshugs don la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
nyid kyi go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dul ba'i go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdzo gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa sku mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa spyi bo nas mngon du 'phags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rab tu gsal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgol ba thams cad shin tu 'joms
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi yul thams cad shin tu gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer brtsegs pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa sangs rgyas bdud rtsi me tog 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog dang ldan pa la

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snying po thams cad zlos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha'
yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'joms pa med pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du spobs pa rtsol bar spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsung ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bal glang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dri'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa pad+mo las mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa go cha shin tu bgos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa gces pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa gces pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mchog la phyag

lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mnyam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bkra shis pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa la

rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgongs pa la phyag

kyi spyod yul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ye
shes 'od dam pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sku dam pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
kun tu zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor chen ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shing rta

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshig gcod
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshig rjes su gtong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas bsod nams skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med drang srong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa 'gyid pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gying ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par
dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
dka' thub rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dam par 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa dbyangs yid du 'ong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa cher dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' bar 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa bdud rtsi dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros chen
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du 'phar ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha ma yin 'bigs pa mi zad pa'i lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa byang chub kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su rig par mdzad pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i skyid pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi me tog gsog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor chen po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi ba med pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dogs pa med par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i
blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan shin tu bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thar ba'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba ma yin pa bskyed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog tsam pa ka'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i dpal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros shin tu dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid thabs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa 'gro bar dga' bar 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal bar dga' ba la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab tu zhim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa mi
dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyen du 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa nam mkha' lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten gyi rten la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs shin tu che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros btsan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa the tshom spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'char ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa dag med par spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sgom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus skyed par dgongs pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul las rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo
bsgoms par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ba la glang la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyis
brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyob pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom rnam par zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbang
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsir dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od kyi rgyal po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal
ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chags
pa med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshim par mdzad pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos
sbyin bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs 'byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pa
kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan 'di thos na ni/ /bag yod rim gro bskyed cing rig par bya/ /phun sum 'di la ma dad
spong na ni/ /ngan song sdug bsngal phyir yang myong nga re/ /rim bzhin tshul khrims la ni brten nas su/ /thos la dad cing rab tu dben par ldan/ /zab mo bzod pa yongs su bkang nas ni/ /
des ni 'jig rten mgon po 'di kun mthong / /las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin mi shes te/ /bskal pa bye bar sdig pa'i las byas pas/ /rgyal ba rnams la mos pas mtshan brjod na/ /de
dag kun gyi sras su de 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya samya ka tsAR+ya br-it+ta ga ga na war+Na
bi na ya k+ShA n+ti nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dang
po| |sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa can na rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya
ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ri la drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge
slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa
chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis
sems can thams cad la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas kun tu ngoms pa/ tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la
mkhas pa/ chos kyi sprin dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis ma rig pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis sems can rnams
chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir byams pa dang / khong khro ba med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag
pa| chos kyis yang dag par 'jug pa/ ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag par ston pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sreg
ba'i chub rkam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa /mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par ston pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod chos rin po ches yongs su bkang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir skye bo thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i
shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo'i rjes su zhugs pa/ mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa'i
mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes su 'brel ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod
pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /
byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgyings pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang
chub sems dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dur smrig seng+ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
ri rab mtshams zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
dpa' yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu bo che

zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang / sngon du 'gro ba drang srong rta rlung dang / drang srong stong phrag sum cu dang / lha
bran brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la
bka' stsal pa/ legs par 'ongs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams
cad dang ldan pa la rnam par kun tu bltas te pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so/ /de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan las langs te bla gos phrag
pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi
ba| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni/ gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas btags pa ni/ ji lta bu lags/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig
rten du btags pas btags pa ni/ ji tsam zhes dge slong khyod de skad 'dri'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no/ /de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs
shig dang ngas bshad do/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol te dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
dge slong / 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten yin no/ /dge slong / de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni/ gang / 'du
byed kyi 'jig rten ni/ gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / klung gi khams ji tsam pa ni/ snod ces bya'o/ /dge slong / de la nang gi sa'i khams yod de/ dge
slong / de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gi sa'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rus pa dang sen mo dang / so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni/ nang gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /de
la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / rdo dang /
byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / gram bu dang / gseg ma dang / myo mo dang / shing dang / rtswa ba dang / sman dang / phyag dar dang 'di dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sA khams zhes bya'o/ /chu'i
khams gang zhe na/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod/ nang gi chu'i khams kyang yod de/ de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang / chu'i khams kyi mkhris pa dang / bad kan
dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rgyungs pa dang / lgang pa dang / gcin yod pa kun tu len pa 'di
ni| nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/ /de la phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang / chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang /
zho dang / dar ba dang / bu ram dang / shing gi ro dang / chang dang / rtsa ba mo dang / bu ram chad dang / me tog chang dang / lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun tu
len pa 'di ni/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so/ /de la nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/ lus la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dro ba nyid du ba dang / gdungs pa dang /
rims dang / yongs su tshig pa dang / des zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ nang gi me'i khams

zhes bya'o/ /de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/ gang me'i gdung ba dang / nyi ma'i gdung ba dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / shing dang / rtsa'i dro ba dang / lci ba'i dro ba

dang / phyag dar gyi dro ba dang 'di dag ni/ phyi rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/ /de la nang gi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di la gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / thur du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / ma zhu

ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang / nying lag tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang 'di ni/ nang gi rlung rnams zhes bya'o/ /de la phyi rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol tu yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par

rgyu ba'i rlung dang / gyen du rgyu ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i dmu rlung phyang ba mang po dang / sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang / phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni/ phyi rol gyi rlung gi

khams zhes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di ni/ snod kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o/ /'di gang gi snod ce na/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i snod do/ /dge slong dag /phyi dang nang gi
'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa'am/ dga' ba'am/ byams pa'am/ chags pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ nga yir bya ba'am/ bdag gir bya ba de dag thams cad spang bar
bya'o| |zhes so sor bslab par bya'o/ /gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phyi dang nang gi 'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang po'am/ gang ring ba'am/
gang nye ba'am/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor bslab par bya'o/ /gang la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag ni/ bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de'ang
bdag gi ma yin no/ /zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag la de bzhin du yang
dag pa'i shes rab kyis shin tu brtan par byed do/ /shin tu yid la byas pa'i dge slong de sred pa dang / rgud pa dang / lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge
slong dag /'di ni/ snod kyi 'jig rten no/ /dge slong dag /de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ 'du byed ces bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
nya bar len pa'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag/ 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig
rten no| |dge slong dag| sems can ji tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten
zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gnang mos pa'am/ dga' ba'am/ byams pa'am/ chags pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ nga yir bya ba'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams
cad spang bar bya'o/ /zhes so sor bslab par bya'o/ /gang cung zad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi'am/ che ba'am/ phra pa'am/ ngan pa'am/ bzang ba
ba'am| gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de'ang bdag ma yin no/ /zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba
bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang
nye ba'i tshor ba'am/ gang la la 'du shes dang / gang la la 'du byed dang / gang cung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni/ bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de bdag ma yin no/ /zhes

de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni/ dge slong dag/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang
pa 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa phung po rnam par 'jig pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di

'jig rten du bstan pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa'i phung po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa/ phung po lnga po de dag ni/ ji
lta bu| gzugs kyi phung po ni/ gang 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang /
gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna
ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba ni/ gang / ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs
kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi kyang mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba'am/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes
