dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i
khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang
bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba'am/ ci 'das pa gzugs kyi phung po'am/ mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
lce dang / lus dang / yid nas mig gi bar du'am/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/
'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te de ltar byung ba gzugs kyi phung po'am/ mig dang / gzugs
kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/
'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po'am/ mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de rna ba nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig
gam| 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/
mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / 'dod
chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing ldang ba'ang ma yin/ phung po ni ngag gi lam dang / dbyangs dang / sgra dang / brjod pa las yang dag par
shin tu 'das pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o/ /dbyangs dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams
cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste/ mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o/ /stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni thob pa
med pa'o/ /tshig med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o/ /mi khom pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o/ /rkyen med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni sbyor
ba dang bral ba'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ lta ba dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dmigs pa dang bral pa'o/ /
bdag med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag dang bral ba'o/ /brjod du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yi ge dang bral ba'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ chos nyid mi 'thob pa'o//
mi snang ba thob pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ snang ba dang bral ba'o/ /shin tu yul med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yul dang bral ba'o/ /shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/
dbang po med pa'o/ /shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /gnyen po med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sems med pa'o/ /chags pa dang bral
ba'o| |chos thams cad ni/ shin tu 'phos pa'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'jungs pa med pa'o/ /spros pa dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/
shin tu bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yo ba dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ shin tu sgrib pa med pa'o/ /rdul dang bral ba'o/ /shin tu bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nyon
mongs pa dang bral ba'o/ /stobs chung pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rtsod pa dang bral ba'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dngos po dang bral ba'o/ /byed pa med pa'o/ /chos
thams cad ni/ las mi ston pa'o/ /tshor ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o/ /thos pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dbyangs dbang bral ba'o/ /gzung du med pa'o/ /
chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis sdug pa'o/ /shes pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ tshor ba chags pa med pa'o/ /smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'di shes dang bral ba'o/ /
brag ca lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa'o/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni /
gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs brnyan la brten pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sprin mi dmigs pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gzugs brnyan no/ /
bstan du med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa nam mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid
gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o/ /ngar sems pa med pa'o/ /rten med pa'o/ /brjod
du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yi ge med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ skad cig ma zad ba dang bral ba'o/ /zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir bdag
dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa spros pa med pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di la rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gi bzod pa sgom pa na yang dag par
spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob po/ /bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis
sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra bsnyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du song ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba'i/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char ram/ skom gyi char ram/ gos sam/ ltab lhub bam/ dri'am/ me
tog gam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang rab tu 'ong ngo / /gang sems can zas dang / kom de yongs su zos pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de 'du byed thams
cad ni| mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang / tshul khrims thob bo/ /khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs te byung nas ri'i sul

dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par gyur to/ /drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtswa dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la
mi zad par mos shig/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor bar byed do/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rdu dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong
pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/ /tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du go sa nas rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i bar du
yongs su spyod par byed do/ /de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de
bzhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyim pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos
kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyangs med pa'o/ /bdud bzhi'i yul las 'das pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha'i lam mo/ /gnas yang dag
par spong ba'o/ /yi ge med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ chags pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /mi skye ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /ma 'gag pa'o/ /chos
thams cad kyi sngon gyi dam tshig mi gtong ba'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o/ /rkyen med pa'o/ /chos
thams cad ni/ kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'i gnas med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rtsom pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba
yang dag par gtong ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dben pa'o/ /'du 'dzi yang dag par gtong ba'o/ /bdag med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med
pa'i bar du'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'o/ /mi snang ba thob pa'o/ /mi gnas pa'o/ /shin tu yul med pa'o/ /shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o/ /shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o/ /gnyen po med pa'o/ /
kha zas med pa'o/ /shin tu 'thor ba med pa'o/ /'jungs pa med pa'o/ /shin tu bsam gtan byed pa'o/ /shin tu bsgribs pa med pa'o/ /shin tu 'od ba med pa'o/ /nyam
chung ba'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /byed pa med pa'o/ /tshor ba med pa'o/ /zag pa med pa'o/ /'dzin pa med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa med pa'o/ /smig rgyu ba lta bu'o/ /brag ca lta bu'o/ /
mig yor lta bu'o/ /chu zla lta bu'o/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid
dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /ngar sems pa med pa'o/ /gzung
du med pa'o/ /brjod du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ skad cig ma'o/ /'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o/ /zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ skad cig ma
zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /mnyam pa'i sems dang / rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /
chod pa med pa'i sems dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang / rten med pa'i sems dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang / sdug bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nye bar
zhi ba'i stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de'ang chos kyi sgo de thos nas zang
zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa de 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang / tshul khrims thob bo/ /khyim gyi bcings pa thams

cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang /
rtswa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi zad par mos shing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do/ /nye bar len pa'i
phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rdu dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/ /tshangs
pa'i 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa sgom pa de ni/ ming mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs/
gsob mi dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs mi dmigs/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/
rna ba'ang ma yin/ sna'ang ma yin/ lce'ang ma yin/ lus kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs/ gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra mi dmigs/ dri mi dmigs/ ro mi dmigs/ reg
bya mi dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid mi gsog pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ thub pa/ khams
gsum gtong pa med pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so/ /ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa de sngon gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi
ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med pa/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa 'di sgom pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur
ro| |byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya bas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byas te byang chub sems
dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang / de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam
par 'jig pa ci la bsam ste rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag med pa/ mi snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam
par mi rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa'am/ 'on te 'di lta ci/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba'am/ gso ba'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyed pa'am/ shed can nam/ byed pa
po'am| tshor ba po'am/ tshor ba gzhan nam/ skye ba'am/ yang dag par skye ba'am/ gang mi dga' ba dang / mi 'byung ba med par mi 'gyur ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang du byung / snying rje
chen po ni/ gang na/ chos 'chang ba ni/ su zhig/ chos kun shes pa ni/ gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pa ni/ gang na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams
dang / skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni/ gang du smin/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched
drug gis bzung ba ni/ gang du byung / bdag ni/ stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas dge slong drug cu rtsam stan las langs te dong nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur
pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs pa dang gnod bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me 'khor de nyid du

'dus par gyur ba des byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /don gyi dbang gang mthong na/ 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang
dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'jungs pa la

gtong ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang /
gtam ngan pa'o/ /zhes 'di ltar gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar bya'o/ /log par lta ba'i lus rnams la

lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /brkam pa rnams la tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / kha zas la chags pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /'dod pa spyod pa'i
lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha dang dpal
mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs la spyod pa'i skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams

la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par
zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang
chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par
brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam smra bar
mi bya'o| |nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i
bzod pa zab mo 'di mi smra bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu legs so/ /zhes bya ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ga na ma re me la legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do/ /legs so legs so shes rab che/ /rnam par shes pas
mchog gcod pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad chos rnams kyi/ /dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes/ /'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg
pa la| |chos 'di rjod par mi byed do/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu/ /chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/ /tshul 'di kun tu shes par
'gyur| |nam mkha' ji ltar mtho byed la/ /dma' ba med cing gzugs med pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med/ /bskal pa grangs med pa
dag gi /'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni/ /smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /khyod kyis chos 'di thos pa dang / /ji ltar rgyal ba des bstan pa'i/ /grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di/ /
brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la/ /'jigs med pa 'di rab tu bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing / /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa/ /skal pa ldan pa'i mdun du
ni| |chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan/ /nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang / /rang rgyal dag gi mngon dga' la/ /chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/ /de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi shes
pas ni spong ba dang / /mos pa med par skyes pas na/ /bsod nams mang po 'byung med cing / /ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro/ ting nge 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni/ /gal te de lus sbyangs
byas te| |byang chub lam la brtson bya phyir/ /la la thas dang de bral ba/ /'khor dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang / /sems kyi rtog par mi byed do/ /'chal pa'i shes rab snod min
la| |stong pa zhi ba smra bar byed/ /de yang myur du spangs pas na/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag /gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la/ /myur du yang ni 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /dmyal ba yi dwags byol song du/ /lha ma yin dang lus srul po/ /gnod sbyin srin po gtum pa yang / /yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o/ /mir gyur dka' byed thob pa
dag /gal te ji ltar thob na yang / /smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni/ /'on pa long ba zhar pa dang / /rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba/ /skur pa 'debs shing mchod pa byed/ /zas dang
skom dang bral pa ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ /pha dang ma la bkur sti med/ /nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod/ /sems can rnams la snying rje med/ /ngan 'gro yang
ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rab tu song ba yi/ /dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag /yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba/ /ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro /lus dbang byas pa'i sems
can 'di/ /gang gis bzod pa 'di bsten cing / /thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa/ /des ni dge slong de song ngo / /ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang / /pha rol sems la lta ba yi/ /
'jig rten la ni sgron 'dzin pa/ /sems can kun la sman par smra/ /thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa/ /thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la/ /ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la//
de 'dra ba yi chos kyang shod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na drin po ches 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri ba shams te nyan
thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
pa bstan pa na/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs
pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan la'ang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam
mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi dus la bab par shes/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig
su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa/ /ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin/ /grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad/ /rdul dang
bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston/ /rgyal ba nyi ma grol la mar me mdzad/ /sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad ba/ /lam rnams rab ston la ma ni khyod ston pa/ /
mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs/ /thugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin/ /thub pa 'jig rten zla ba 'od 'dra
ba| |tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston/ /snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che/ /rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa/ /
bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston/ /thub pa seng+ge mu stegs 'jigs par mdzad/ /'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /mu stegs can gyi 'khor mang rnam 'jig pa/ /
mar me'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod/ /sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/ /bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro mi mdzad/ /mthon po ma yin da ltar mtho min pa/ /
yongs min gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ /ye shes mchog gis nga yi nga rgyal gyi/ /rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor/ /des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa//
las kyi me yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams/ /khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig /klu lta bu rin chos kyi char gtong ba/ /des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste/ /yongs su smin la
gzigs shing bzod 'di gsung / /sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed/ /bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing / /gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur/ /de thob pa yi
yon tan 'di mtha' yas/ /spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi/ /thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang / /da ltar gyi yang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa/ /thugs rjer
dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so snyam mo/ /lha bran gyis gsol pa/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa 'di stan nas ji lta bu'i spos
kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des
bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang srong de'ang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs
pa dang / skra ring po'i ral pa 'chang ba dang / ag tshom ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg chen po 'bar bar byed do/ /de las kyang 'od kyi phung po
kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'byung ngo / /de'i 'od snang bas phyogs
bcu'i zhing stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / 'od dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo / /sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dwags kyi lta ba'ang mi mngon mi snang ngo / /de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can

rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang / tshigs dang / yi ge dang / chung ngu na sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi sgra'ang mi grag go /de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
mtha' yas mu med pa na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / lus dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu
snang ngo / /yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ rang rgyal pa'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni/ kun tu mi snang ngo / /yang theg pa chen po la

yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'ang ma mthong ngo / /de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der
'dug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zhing / de byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang yang 'dir 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs
snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /snang ba rgya chen pos ni/ 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes kau Di n+ya la
smras pa/ gnas brtan kau Di n+ya/ bcom ldan 'das gang na/ kau Di n+ya sa smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba zhes bya ba ni/ mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po
des 'od srung chen po la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan

'das da ltar gang na bzhes bya ba mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan
gyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas bcom
ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des maud+gal ya na la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal ya na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na
bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /maud+gal ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras
pa de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gnag na bzhugs pa gang du
bzhud ces bya ba ni/ mi mthong ngo / /mi shes so/ /de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang
mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na gnas/ spyod pa ni/ ci 'drar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags
pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba dag kyang mi shes so//
mi mthong ngo / /des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni/ de la 'jug
go /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang
yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tsha dang ldan pa/ 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis phung po bshad par byas pa de na dge slong drug cu tsam po stan
las langs te dong pas/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig tu spyod do/ /bdag
cag ni| rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do/ /bam po gnyis
pa| de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas
de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa de bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo / /zhes bdag cag rnam par
blta bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ bdug pa rnams
dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus
pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo / /drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya snyam
mo| |de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dod ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin
dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
'dir gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag

par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis drang srong gi tsha byad kyis drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dod do/ /'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad
ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa la'ang 'jug par bzhed pa'i
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sams kyis shes so/ /bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing lam der drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i
ril nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor bdag dang / 'jog po dang / yid yod la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag

drug cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shes dang / byu ru dang / a sma gar+b+ha dang / mu sA ra gal pa la sogs pa rin po
che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu nas mu sA ra gal pa'i

shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to/ /shing ta la'i phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam
pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / /lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zhing dpag tshad bcu pa
dbyangs so/ /lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas mu sA ra gal pa'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to/ /gser gyi shing ta la dngul gyi snying
po 'phyang ba nas mu sA ra gal pa'i bar du smra bar bya'o/ /'og logs su bai DUR+ya bzang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos spa bar bya'o/ /sprin gyi lha'i bu
drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rdzing de dag la'ang lha rdzas kyi me

tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / tsam+pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / mu tsu ku da dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / pa ta li dang / pa ri sha ka dang / gan+d+ha
d+ha nu ska ri dang / su ma dang / a mra dang / dzam+bu dang / mri na la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to/ /sa bla na gnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad
kyis lam sbyong bar byed do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi ma gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to/ /
rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang / do shal dang / rgyan rab tu 'byang ngo / /'phrul dga'i lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi
khang bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis byas so/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de la'ang lha rdzas kyi do shal sna tshogs
dang / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / /me tog sna tshogs kyi kun tu gtor to/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba
sna tshogs byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rol mo dkrol ba dang / klu'i sgra bsgrags pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab
par gyur to/ /klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi

char phab bo/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / tsam+pa ka dang / ba ri ya tra dang / 'dzo

sha dang / 'dzo sha ka chen po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsa ka chen po dang / bal la dang / bal+la chen po dang / tsakra dang / tsakra chen po 'od dri ma med pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ 'dab ma stong pa/ 'dab ma
brgya stong pa/ kun nas 'od/ kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba/ kha dog mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon par dga' ba rnam pa sna
tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so/ /char ba'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mdag

kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo/ /klu'i glang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing 'di
lta ste| mu tig sngon po'i char dang / go shiR+sha'i snying po'i char la sogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo/ /gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sngon
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
'phye chen po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi
cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / glu sna tshogs yongs su
bzung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo'am/
gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / klu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis khad
kyis rab tu phab bo/ /mi'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub

tu sems bskyed pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing spyan sngar 'khod do/ /brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha

byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
rab tu gsal pa'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par lta'o/ /klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so/ /lha
ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun tu reg pa/ mchog tu dri zhim pa/ mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi
dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan por gyur pa gser gyi
dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/ /grul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad
kyis gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du
ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char chen po
mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong
gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs
so| |lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgyan gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
dzam+bu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do/ /sa'i gnod sbyin
brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do/ /bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' la 'phyen to/ /bdud brgya stong du
ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go/ drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par
spyod pa dang / drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba chen po blangs te bcom ldan 'das
kyi don gyi phyir rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba'i char rab tu 'byin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po
kun tu gnon par gyur to/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo / /de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa
lha bran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas
bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sems can mi srun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog /mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzungs
ngan 'dren mdzad cing / /sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa/ /rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing / /
'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis/ /bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /'gro la phyin ci log
bzhi rnam par grol/ /'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur zhing / /'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa/ /zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /
thub pa phung po lnga 'dir ba ston pa/ /'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnam grol zhing / /'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa/ /'gro ba lnga yi btson ra rnam par bkrol/ /dbang po
drug 'dul gnas pa skyon med cing / /sred lus drug la shin tu rnam grol shes/ /sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog /spos kyi ngad ldan ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /
rgyal ba mnyam gzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs/ /shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog /ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad/ /kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spyon/ /
rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa/ /ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas/ /khyod ni mun pas bsgribs pa la ye shes ston/ /thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su
gsol| |dzam+bu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag /'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing / /mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa/ /mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs gsol/ /
sbyin dang 'dul ba gtong zhing dul ba'i thugs/ /sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog /sems can dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod/ /spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs
su gsol/ /bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing / /bar 'gar rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs/ /dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa/ /thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod
pa rab tu ston/ /wA ra NA sir 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ /shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod gcig gsungs/ /'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba/ /spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod
pa gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam/ nyan thos
kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba'am/ gang sa la rgyu ba'am/ gang chu
la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo / /
mig gis gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de'ang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ mi'i
brtul zhugs can dang / zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la
la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa/ log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so/ /ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/
rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yos pa 'di dang / snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung bar gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan sngar gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug
pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang ba de me tog man+dA ra ba chen por kun tu gnas par 'dug par gyur
to| |'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /shar
phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dar de
bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang /
dbyings kyis bdag mthong ngo / /gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang / dbyibs kyis mthong ngo / /mthong
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/ gang me tog mer snang ba bai
DUR+ya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin
par grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du
'jug pa na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang
dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to/ /gsol pa/ bzod pa 'di thog ma dang tha ma ji lta bu zhig /bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa 'di ni/ mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug
pa'o| |da ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams la sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /chu bo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / srid
pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo dang / de dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par
byed pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa/ sems can rnams yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po
rnam pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor bar byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can
rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams
srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /chos la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul
khrims kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spang ba la ston par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pas sems can rnams tshe'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /ngag snyan pas lta ba'i
rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /don byed pas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /don mthun pas sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol
bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba
dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la dbab
par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang / bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig
tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis dang spyi bos phyag btsal nas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba
byas te 'khod do/ /skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas phyag
btsal te 'khod par gyur to/ /de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis shar phyogs kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa
tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad gcig ma gcig gis lhags so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das
te| de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni
byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang /
bzhugs dang / dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo / /sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus
pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der
de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par mthong ba dang / ku mu da'i glang
po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi chu bo gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu
'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/ /de na byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
chu bo gang+gA gcig gi bye ma las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen
po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis
kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na
'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong
ba chos kyang ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang / bdud rtsi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no/ /de'i tshe byang chub
sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'khod do/ /mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis ma
gyur pa'o/ /rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi
'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros
dang / gnya' shing du lta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang / dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang / lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin
dul ba'i 'gros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu 'dul ba'i 'gros dang / rgyal ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros ci 'dra
ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing sangs rgyas chen por rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'gros dang / rgyan chen po'i 'gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs
chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'degs pa dang 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la byon to/ /dka' thub
kyi gnas gtsang ma 'di tha dad pa med cing dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te glang po'i rnam
par blta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na'ang 'di brjod do/ /la la gang 'dir bstan dang ldan pa la/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa/ /bdag
gis yang dag pa spyad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs med gang / /da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod
cing / /chos la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa/ /bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston/ /kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag dang / /sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing / /
thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa/ /de dag thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po/ /thabs la mkhas pa sems can rnams
'dul zhing / /shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa/ /bzod nyan thos phyir de dag thams cad 'ong / /gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur/ /'dus byas thams cad 'di la
brten pa med/ /chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong / /gang rnams thabs dang yang dag sbyor phyir zhugs/ /thams cad dngos la sems
dpa' rten med cing / /mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa/ /dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong / /bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar sdug bsngal kun
la mi gnas pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la'ang khyod myur 'jug /srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed/ /phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang / /'gro ba rnams la phan
phyir 'khor lo bskor/ /da dung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 'dod pa/ /bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong / /lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdag bskor te/ /phyir mi ldog la
sems can bye bkod pa/ /rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan rab thogs shing / /bdag bdag zhing rnams su yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang / /byang
chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste/ /de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi
dkyil 'khor de'ang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang / don dang / tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
mu med par song ngo / /de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gis blta ba'i
sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba/ de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/
de ltar tshim pa/ de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der de phyogs bzhi kun tu
bltas te sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba la drang srong
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag btsal te ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni/ mthu chen po/ drang srong
gi 'khor chen po 'di ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang / dbyibs
kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na/ drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye
bar 'gro'o/ /de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs
pa med cing dpag tu med pa/ chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs

kyi drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas drang srong thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bstod de 'khod do/ /la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la la ngan song du spyod pa'i

rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran pa so sor thob nas drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do/ /drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs
su'ang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing ji lta
bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe na shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i
lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs
pa lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtseg pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du
sems te/ bdag gi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/ drang srong thub pa gang na
bzhugs pa der bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs na nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna
tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bur bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas byang chub
sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa
de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston te snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste/ dper na/
tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra
bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug
pa| rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
drug cu lhags so/ /de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang
pa brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng+ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng+ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam
ste| de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/
su'i byin gyis brlabs/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bas na/ chos kyi sgos
chags pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de dung mi sgrub kyi/ 'di gnyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di gnyis ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'o/ /'di gnyis ni/
'byung ba dang / 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'dus shes kyang med do/ /de 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /
'khor ba'i rgyun bcad pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o/ /gang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag tu sgro 'dogs
pa med pa dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa/ 'di
ni| gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang skyes pa'am/ ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang 'byung ba dang / 'gog par rnam par mi rtog
cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa med pa dang / tha dad par bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la
'jug pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang phung po yongs su shes shing skyo ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan
nyid spangs pa/ rlom pa sems thams cad bcom pa/ gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /'gul ba dang / rlom zhing sems par
rig pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom sems med pa/ g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| gang tshor ba shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu/ gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro ba mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid
dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /yang
rigs kyi bu/ gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| gang yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la brten par mi shes pa
dang / yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni/ gnas med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| gang dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol la 'du shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'di'ang mtshan ma
med pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mi zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang tshu rol ni/ zag pa'o/ /pha rol
ni| phyin ci log ste/ gang tshu rol dang pha rol la rtog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang bkrol ba 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang / bkrol ba med pa
dang / ci'ang btags pa med pa dang / btang ba med pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
la zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa zhes rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
'du shes su bya ba'ang med pa dang / 'du shes dang 'du shes med min thob pa'ang med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang phung po dang / khams dang /
skye mched la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'
dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
chos la snyems pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang la la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la mi 'jug /mi 'gro/ rnam par mi 'gro/ mi rgal zhing 'gro ba'ang med/ rnam
par grol ba med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang la la ming dang gzugs las phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'byung bar rab
tu shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / ming dang gzugs bral ba la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lta ba kun tu 'gro zhing kun tu mi 'gro/ /yongs su mya ngan
las 'das pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis
pa'o| |gang yang 'byung ba med pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas thams cad du myur du rab tu shes pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la
'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang / rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang / nga yir bya ba dang / skye mched la chags pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang la
la bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa thob pa/ bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral ba/ skye mched nyams pa med pa/ bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba dang bral ba /
'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /gang la la rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ma rig pa ni/ rgyu ba med cing
bdag med pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni/ glog gi rang bzhin can no/ /rnam par grol ba'ang nam mkha'o/ /nam mkha'ang mi rtog pa/ rtog par byed pa med pa/ spros pa med pa 'di'ang
gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /gang rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs kun tu spyod pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du stong ste/ nam
mkha'ang 'jig pa med do/ /gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyu ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
kyang de bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa rab tu rgyu ba med pa ni/ nam mkha' ji lta bur mun pa med cing snang ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa stong
pa ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyang stong pa'o/ /de bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'ang nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar stong ngo / /nam mkha' ji lta bur 'dod chags med/
zhe sdang med/ gti mug med/ mi mtho mi dma'/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro bar de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes so/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la'ang 'dod chags med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug med/ mi mtho mi dma'/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog /mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro
zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig khrag dgu bcu rtsa
gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa thob par gyur to/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyang sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong gi cha byad ji tsam ba mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs
rgyas kyi sku mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyan te bzhugs so/ /de ltar de bzhin du gang gzhan la la dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad mi snang bar gyur te/ sngon gyi
lus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ji lta bur
bstan pa de bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sgo 'di bstan par bya ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dpang du btsugs te de ltar khyod kyis tshad med
pa'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do/ /gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
ci dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs byas so/ /bam po gsum pa/ de nas de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bla gos phrag
pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de glos su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la chos bstan du gsol ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i yon
tan 'di dag gis bstod do/ /rgyal ba mi mnyam zhing mang dag khyab pa/ /nyon mongs dgra zhi 'di la mngon par gnas/ /thub pa shin tu rnam grol 'dir zhugs shing / /khyod kyis 'gro la
bzod pa'i mchog 'di ston/ /rab tu zhi thugs brtul zhugs yongs su dag /thub pa'i mchod sbyin bgyis pa bzod dge gsungs/ /'gro la bde sbyin drang srong shes rab 'chang / /gti
mug 'jig mdzad 'di la bdud rtsi char/ /'di la lha klu sems can mi mang po/ /shin tu gsal yid myur du zhing gang ba/ /'gro ba thams cad khyod zhal lta zhing 'dug /nyon mongs yongs
su spangs te dam chos srungs/ /sngon chad rgyal ba khyod kyang kun spyod bstan/ /mig gnyis rkang pa lag pa lce byin zhing / /phags pa mgo khrag yan lag dang 'bru nor/ /glang rta bu grong shing
rta rin chen rnam mang byin/ /zas skom mal dang bran pho bran mo byin/ /gnyen dang 'gro la sdug bsngal rtag thar byed/ /bsam pa rdzogs shing sems can dga' mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis
mchod sbyin brgya byas sems can phyir/ /sangs rgyas mang la sngon chad dge mchod byas/ /byams sems rtag pas ther zug sbyin la dga'/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas ri rab ji bzhin
'bar| |'gro la brtan phyir bzod pa 'di bstan gsol/ /ngan song gsum spangs sems can mtho ris khrid/ /khyod kyis bstan pa'i smon lam sngon rtag byas/ /'gro ba byang chub sdug
bsngal zhi mchog reg /rgyal ba sngon chad dri bzhin byang chub de thob bo/ /snying rje dpal chus sa rnams ma lus gang / /nyon mongs dri gsum the tshom thams cad zhi/
lam gang zhi bas byang chub thob ston pa/ /ji ltar chos rtogs 'di la khyod kyis dus/ /shin tu skom yid 'gro la chos char phob/ /bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms yang dag yon tan gsungs/
lam gang zhi des 'gro ba byang chub reg /zhing mang 'di la sems can gang dag 'ongs/ /rga shi dag las rnam thar gang yod pa/ /thub pa chen po chos 'di gsung du gsol/ /nam
mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa ston/ /de ni sgyur ma smig rgyu spros par 'gro /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes nas
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis khang pa brtsegs
pa ji snyed pa de snyed du lus mngon par sprul nas khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na 'dug ste/ 'khor 'di dag kyang yang dag par dga' zhing skyo bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas bcom
ldan 'das 'od shin tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyis khang pa brtsegs pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang rang bzhugs te bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs pa tshad med pa 'di dag ni/ gang na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
gyi rlabs kyis khang pa brtsegs par sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba ni/ gang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas byang chub sems
dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni/ smra ba med pa'o/ /ma rig pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spros pa
med do| |rigs kyi bu/ ci 'das pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
bu| ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci da ltar byung ba'i sems dang / bsam pa'i gnas pa yod dang / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ med do/ /smras pa/ gal te re zhig sems dang / bsam pa'i gnas pa
med na| rnam par mi gnas pa'i dngos po la ji ltar byang chub thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ci dus gsum gyi chos thams cad spangs nas de'i tshe cis kyang chos khong du chud pa med dam/
smras pa/ rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa/ mi 'gro ba/ mi skye ba/ mi 'gog pa/ mi reg pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas la gnas pa med pa'o/ /
dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la byang chub 'gro ba med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba med cing rnyed pa med pa de bzhin
du byang chub kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang
rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa'ang med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med cing snang ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mun pa med cing snang ba'ang med do/ /
ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs med cing bstan du med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzugs med cing bstan du'ang med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' ma skyes ma 'gags
pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma skyes ma 'gags so/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'gro bar dmigs pa med
do| |ji ltar nam mkha' la gnas pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gnas pa med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la reg pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
kyang reg pa med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la gnas la lam du dmigs pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ci la'ang lam du dmigs pa med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha'
la dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la brjod du med cing yi ge med pa de bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang brjod du med cing yi ge med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la rtag pa med cing chad pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rtag pa med cing chad pa
med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la lus med cing 'byung ba med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang lus med cing 'byung ba med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la gzung ba med cing
gnas pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzung ba med cing gnas pa med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la rten pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rnam par
rtog pa med pa/ 'deg pa med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ rtsa ba med pa/ mtha' med pa/ 'khrug pa med pa/ yongs su gdungs pa med pa/ brtags pa med
pa/ bkrol ba med pa/ mthong ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ mun pa med pa/ dngos po med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ sprul pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang
rten pa med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ mi skye bar bsgrags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/
gnyis su med pa'i cha shas so/ /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ sems can gyi khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
ni| nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams ni/ gnas pa dang / rnam pa'i gnas dang / rab kyi gnas su yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ shes pa dang / rab tu shes pa dang / rnam par shes
pa dang / nye bar shes pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ mtshan ma med pa yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nye ba'i mtshan
nyid dang / rjes su mtshan nyid la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ 'das pa med pa dang / rnam par 'das pa dang / 'das pa dang / rjes su 'das pa la
yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ blang pa dang / dor ba dang / kun tu blang ba dang / nye bar blang ba la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/
snang ba dang / kun tu snang ba dang / rjes su snang ba dang / yang dag par snang ba med pa dang / rab tu snang ba med pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ yang dag pa dang /
shin tu yang dag pa dang / rjes su yang dag pa dang / kun tu yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / rab tu yang dag pa ma yin pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ kun

tu smra ba dang / rnam par smra ba dang / shin tu smra ba dang / rjes su smra ba dang / rab tu smra ba dang / nye bar smra ba la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ kun tu rig pa dang /
rnam par rig pa dang / mtshungs par rig pa dang / rjes su rig pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ kun tu gzugs dang / rnam par gzugs dang / mtshungs
par gzugs dang / yang dag par gzugs med pa dang / nye ba'i gzugs la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni/ kun tu spyod pa dang / rnam par spyod
pa dang / mtshungs par spyod pa dang / rjes su spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ kun tu brjod pa dang / rnam par brjod pa dang / rjes
su brjod pa dang / mtshungs par brjod pa dang / nye bar brjod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ bgrang ba dang / rnam par bgrang ba dang / mtshungs par bgrang
ba dang / rjes su bgrang ba dang / nye bar bgrang ba la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /byang chub ni/ kun tu yod pa dang / rnam par yod pa dang / rjes su yod pa dang /
nye bar yod pa la yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub ni/ spros pa dang / rnam par spros pa dang / spros pa dang bral ba dang / rjes su spros pa dang / nye bar spros pa la
yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar nam mkha'i khams la gzung du med pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ la la nam mkha' spros
par bya ba dang / tshad du bya ba dang / rnam par bgrang bar bya ba dang / brgyan par bya ba dang / ri mor bya bar nus sam/ rigs kyi bu/ mi nus so/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'
ji lta ba de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin no/ /nam mkha' cis kyang spros par mi nus pa ji lta ba de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de bzhin du cis kyang spros par mi nus so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs par bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa ni/ gang / sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs pa ni/ gang na zhes bya ba khyod ci'i phyir de skad smra/ de ltar spros
par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun mi skye
ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo
so sor thob cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rgyas par gyur to/ /sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can gyis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston pa bstan pa legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe na bcom ldan
'das 'od zer 'byung ba'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te khang pa brtsegs pa gcig na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par yang dag par mthong ba ma gtogs par sangs
rgyas kyi sku de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur nas 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i
mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag ni/ gang nas 'ongs/ yang gang du 'gro /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' drang srong rnam par 'grel pas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod da dung 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes
su 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po mang po'i mchog gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar 'ongs so/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur gyi tshig go /rigs kyi
bu| 'gro'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ bdag med pa'i tshig go /byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ glo bur gyi tshig dang / rigs kyi bu/ bdag med pa'i tshig
gis kyang rigs kyi bu/ nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba'i tshig go /skyes bu gang zag nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la chags pas phyin ci log bzhi ste/ mi rtag pa la rtag
par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa rnal 'byor gyi rjes su ldan pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes
par rnal 'byor gyi rjes su ldan pa la zhugs pa'o/ /skyes bu gang zag sems phyin ci log la zhugs pas sgrib pa lngar 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i sred pa'i sgrib
pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang gnyid dang / le lo dang rgod pa dang / the tshom gyi sgrib pa spangs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la la sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag tu
'gyur ba de mtshams med pa lnga yang dag par spyod do/ /mtshams med pa lnga ma spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag lha dang mi'i nang du 'gro bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ nyan thos

kyi byang chub lta ci smos/ gang la la nyan thos kyi byang chub med pa de la rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lta'ang ci smos/ gang la nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba
ma spangs pa de la rtag pa dang / chad pa yang spangs pa med do/ /gang zag chad par lta ba can du 'gyur ba de dge ba'i las dang / dge ba la spyod pa'i mtshungs par spyod par lta ga la 'gyur/
gang yang rtag par lta ba can du 'gyur ba de thar pa la bsngos pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang / dge ba la spyod par lta ga la 'gyur/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag
ni| lha dang / mi'i nang du skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang / rang byang chub lta ci smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ga la mthong / nga yir
