'gyur ro/ /chung du na sems can gcig kyang gang yon tan 'di dag gis yang dag par brgyan par byas pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gtong bar mi bya ste/ zhag bdun pa
de las 'das pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'da' ba bya bar tshangs pa'i dbang po
de'i spyan sngar bdag gi smon lam de bzhin du btab par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bdag ni/ rnam pa de lta bu'i smon lam grub pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus
na rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal chen po bya bar yang nus par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sngon lta ba can de dag gi rgyun bcad de/ de ltar 'khor thams cad dang
ldan pa ji ltar mngon du gyur par 'gyur ba la/ de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i
dbang po des yang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ shin tu zab mo/ shin tu ngo mtshar ba/ shin tu rgya che ba'i smon lam btab pa ni/ nam mkha' la 'brug zer bas chus sems
can rnams tshim par byed/ chu'i rdzing dang / lteng ka'i sgor yongs su rdzogs par byed/ shin tu dro bas gdungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sman dang / lo ma dang / nags
tshal dang / shing gel pa rnams tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha' la 'brug bsgrags pa de bzhin du shin tu zab mo'i smon lam 'dis 'khor thams cad
dang ldan pa 'di dag la gzhog par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi bzad par brtson pa'i smon lam gyis rnam pa de lta bu'i smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas gzi brjid du bskal pa'i 'od chen por 'gyur ro/ /de na yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su skye zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ma lus pa'i gnas dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po de la yan lag lngas zhabs
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ma thag tu bdag gis spyi bo sa la reg pa tsam gyis na/ de na de nyid kyi tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i sa chu zla bzhin du rab tu g.yos
so| |lha dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa 'dis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa chos chen po/
snying rje chen po can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / brtson pa dang / mthu chen po shin tu dka' ba'i smon lam btab pa legs so legs so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
khyod de na yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang bo nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du bsnyen
bkur byas pa de ltar bdag nyi ma re re zhing yang bcom ldan 'das de la me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / spos sna tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod pa'i gnas su byas
par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar khyod zla ba gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas rgyal po'i longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa thams cad spangs
te de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po de'i spyan sngar srog chags stong phrag bcu dang thabs cig tu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas yang dag
par dad pas rab tu byung ba de bzhin du bdag kyang rab tu byung ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yul gzhan du rgyu zhing gshegs pa'i bar du de nas
bdag kyang grong rdal gzhan du bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyin te/ grong rdal der mchod sbyin chen po so sor gnas par gyur to/ /de la'ang srog chags mang po gsad par
bya bar 'dod pa de la gal te bdag sems can 'di dag gsod pa las yongs su ma thar na/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya zhing rga shi'i chu bo las sems can yongs su smin par mi nus so/ /zhes snying rje chen po skyes te der nye bar phyin nas dris pa/ kye gang gi phyir mchod sbyin
'di bya| de dag gis smras pa/ yul 'dir char mi 'bab par 'gyur zhing / mu ge'ang 'byung ba dang / 'dir sems can mang po nad kyis gos pa dang / long ba dang /
zhar bar 'gyur ba dang / nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang / rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po dang / grong dang / ljongs dang / mi mchog gcig la gcig 'khrug pa rnam pa
de lta bu'i ltas ngan pa de dag med par bya ba dang / nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / kun 'dus par bya ba'i phyir mchod sbyin 'di bya'o/ /de nas de dag la bdag gis 'di
skad ces smras so/ /bzhin bzang / sems can 'di dag gsod pa las yongs su thar bar nus kyi/ mchod sbyin gyi ra ba 'dir ma gsod cig/ bdag gis khyod la mu
ge dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / nad dang / nang gi 'khrug pa thams cad yongs su zhi bar bya'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong mgo reg nus sam zhes pa dang / bdag
gis sems can de dag la mchod sbyin gyi ra ba mi snang bar byas so/ /de la'ang bdag gis smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das med par gsungs pas bdag bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan pa de lta bu'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par
gyur cig /gal te mchod sbyin 'di'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pas bdag bsad do/ bdag gis lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung du ji tsam pa de tsam gyi lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin yul yongs su skyong ba la lus 'di dbul bar bya zhing bdag gi khrag shin tu rgya che ba mdangs can 'byung bar gyur nas yul yongs su skyong ba de
ngag kyang khrag 'di la yongs su 'thung bar gyur cig /yongs su 'thungs pas yul skyong ba re re la'ang yul 'dir de tsam gyi ltas ngan rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /de tsam
gyis bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nad med pas 'thab mo dang / bcing ba dang / gnod pa dang / rtsod pa la 'jug pa'i gnyen por phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/
sems can re re zhing yang 'dir de tsam gyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur cig /sems can rnams kyi yul 'dir de tsam gyi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /
ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len med par gyur cig /yul ji tsam pa 'dir sems can thams cad de tsam gyi mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur
cig /gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe sems can 'di thams cad rga shi las yongs su thar par
bya'o| |sems can thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu ji tsam par gyur pa de tsam gyi bskal pa chen po'i gling bzhi pa re re la mchod sbyin gyi ra bar mchod sbyin gyi phyir bdag bsad la/
gang mi dag mchod sbyin gyi ra ba'i phyir gsad par 'gyur ba dang / gang byol song gi skye gnas can thams cad kyi phyir bdag mchod sbyin gyi ra ba de dag tu bsad par byos
shig /de nas yul 'dir bdag gi lus mi snang bar gyur cig /yul de na gsod pa dang / nad dang / mu ge dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / 'khrug pa gnyis dang / shin
tu grang ba dang / shin tu dro ba dang / dug dang / byad stem dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / dus ma yin pa'i sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang /
sbrul gdug pa dang / phye ma leb gsod pa dang / sdom pa med pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chags pa dang / slu ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe
gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log pa lta ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gi dngos po rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /de na sems
can rnams gcig la gcig dga' ba'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / las su rung ba'i sems dang / gzung du med pa'i sems
dang / sa dang mtshungs pa bral ba med pa'i sems dang / sbyin pa'i sems su gyur cig /de na sems can rnams 'byung ba'i sems dang / tshul khrims kyi sems dang /
zhi gnas kyi sems dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems dang / bzod pa'i sems dang / bsam gtan gyi sems dang / shes rab kyi sgom pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems
su gyur cing / /gang la bdag mchod sbyin gyi phyir gsad par bya ba nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong ba dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma
snyed du rtsal chen po bya ba'i bar du bdag gi sngon gyi ltas de dag byung bar gyur cig /nam mkha' las char 'bab par gyur cig /ces bdag gis tshig de brjod ma
thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe na bdag gi lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung bu las 'o ma zag cing nam mkha' las char kyang rab tu 'bab bo/ /de na yang mchod sbyin can
des mi gsad par bcom ldan 'das 'dir dbang du gsol to/ /yul de na thams cad kyang dpal phun sum tshogs pa bde ba'i yo byad dang mthun par gyur to/ /nad
dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / char mi 'bab pa mi snang bar byas te/ gang bdag mir gyur pas chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin gyi ra ba la mchod sbyin byas
pa bcom ldan 'das dpang du gsol lo/ /bal glang gi gzugs kyis chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin byas pa nas rta'i gzugs dang / g.yag gi gzugs
dang / glang gi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / spyang ki'i gzugs dang / phyugs kyi gzugs dang / bse'i gzugs dang / ma he'i gzugs dang /
wa'i gzugs bsdus pas bdag byol song gi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la skye gnas re re thob pas chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor la mchod sbyin
byas so| |phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du rnam pa de lta bu'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
sems can rnams bde bas tshim par byas pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal chen po byas so/ /bam po bcu gcig pa ste tha ma/ yang btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ ngan pa'i dus kyi tshe nad pa la la zhig gi don du ra'i gtsang sha 'tshal bar gyur la/ yul de na ra ma mchis na de la bdag gis smon lam 'di lta
bu btab ste/ gal te bdag bla na med pa'i shes rab chen po ma thob kyi bar du bdag gi smon lam 'di grub par gyur cig /bdag
shing chen po 'di la 'dzegs te bdag mchongs nas rdzus te rar skyes la/ lhas mi rnams la bsgo ba 'di ni/ nad pa rnams kyi sman du gyur pa yin gyi/ sems
can de dag gi sha zos shig dang / de dag gi nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bdag 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su gyur pa der sems can
rnams sha za bar ma gyur cig /de na nad kyis reg pa rnams la sman du ma gyur pa'i dngos po med par gyur cig /yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur
cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pas phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur cig /bdag de ltar nga'i
gzugs kyis nad pa rnams bsnyen bkur byed pa de bzhin du ji srid du yun ring por 'khor ba na sems can rnams nad kyis reg par gyur pa la sha dang / khrag
dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyis sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi yun ring por sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du byol
song gi skye gnas su gyur cig /bdag shing de las 'dzegs nas bdag mchongs te/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam
pa drug tu g.yos la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / a ga ru dang / ta ka ru dang /
dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char rab tu phab nas bdag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug la 'di skad ces smras te/ skyes bu dam pa sems can no cog gis
bdag ma gsad cig dang / bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can nad pa rnams nad thams cad las yongs su thar par bya'o/ /char mi 'bab cing mu
ge 'byung ba thams cad dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar las kyang thar par bya ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag shing de las mchongs pa lha rnams kyis bdag nam mkha' bar snang las bzung ste/ de na bdag gis sems can rnams bslabs
nas sems can rnams chos la sbyor bar byas so/ /de na bdag gis sems can khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po lnga mngon par shes pa dang ldan par byas so/ /bdag gi tshig
gis lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar la btsud cing so sor bkod do/ /btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi smon lam ni/ de lta bu lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyangs la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin
nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smon lam de lta bur gyur te/ spyad par dka' ba spyod pa'i seng+ge'i sgra de lta bu bsgrags pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ji ltar sngon
lan 'ga'i zhes bya ba nyi ma la dga' bar gyur pa de ngas bskul nas thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur tam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
sngon lan 'ga' 'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ma mchis so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag thog ma byang chub sems
dpar gyur pa ni/ 'di lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i thad du mchis te/ de'i tshe da ltar ji skad du brjod pa'i smon lam
de lta bu btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gal te sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na smon lam de lta bu sus bslabs/ gsol pa/
de na bdag dben pa zhig tu mchis te/ dog sa la mchis nas smon lam zhig gdab par sems pa de na bdag gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang pos smon lam de dag
bsgo ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar smon lam btab bo/ /de na bdag sems can rnams la snying rje skyes te 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs so/ /de phyis rjes su dpag pa des
mchod sbyin smra ba bdag gis yongs su btang ba bgyis te smon lam de lta bu btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod lta bar song ba de dag tu zhugs sam/ gsol pa
ma lags so/ /su zhig gi mthus/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/
smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su dgrol gyi/ gzhan gang gi mthus kyang sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs
su grol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub kyi phyir lung bstan pa 'di su zhig gi dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du yin nam/ 'on te dus
gsum gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal bar med pa tshor ba'i skye mched drug po 'di dag gi yin nam/ 'on te tshor ba med pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyir
lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di su zhig gi yin/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ bdag lung bstan par gsol ba'am bdag la lung ston
pa'am| bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'di rdzas ma mchis/ dngos po ma mchis/
rang bzhin ma mchis/ cung zad kyang ma mchis/ yi ge ma mchis/ thob pa ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang rdzas ma mchis shing dngos po ma mchis
pa nas brjod du ma mchis shing ma skyed pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum gyi gzugs 'byung ba ma mchis te lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas rnam
par shes pa'i bar du'ang ma skyes pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum gyi mig 'byung ba ma mchis shing lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas dus gsum gyi nang gi
yid kyi bar dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / bde ba'ang ma mchis sdug bsngal ba'ang ma mchis pa'i tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa nas lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bar du'o/ /
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid la skye ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ 'jig pa mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi
dbyings la'ang gnas par mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /brdar btags pa tsam du'ang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
ste| de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la'ang
brdar btags pa tsam du'ang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi mig gi yang dag pa'i mtha' nas
brda tsam du btags pa'i mig gi mtshan nyid nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma mchis sdug bsngal la'ang ma mchis pa'i
bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa
dang | 'gog pa mi dmigs so/ /yid dang chos kyi khams kyang mi dmigs so/ /bdag gis ni/ yid rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ brag ca lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/ /chos thams cad
ni| mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ chu zla lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang
gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin spangs pa'i mtshan nyid bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba zhig
mchis te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing yongs su gzung du ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / rab tu stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag bzung ba de ni/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang de skad brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di lta ste/ de ni/ ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /'di
lta ste/ bdag la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan to snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni/ lung
bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / brjod pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor
ma lags pa dang / lam dang / lam ma lags pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid kyi lam ma mchis shing phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid
dang | chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi lam yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de bzhin du gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas rnam par
shes pa'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi lam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lung
bstan pa brjod pa 'di'i skabs dang go skabs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang gzugs kyi lung bstan pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / mig nas yid kyi bar gyi lung
bstan pa dang / gang byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad
pa na| kun tu rgyu shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sras kyang de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa rab tu thob par
gyur to| |sems can gzhan mu stegs can nga rgyal bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum po de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog
pa'i sa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin des sems can gyi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi por de dag
gi sgra brjod pa'i tshig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin des skye gnas dang sgra dbyangs kyi tshig brjod pa thams cad tshim par byed do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge
dang smras pa nyon cig /grogs po dag nyon cig /grogs po dag /lha dang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / lam gang gis nyan thos kyi theg pa rnyed de sdug bsngal thams cad zad
par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnyed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par 'gyur ba bde ba dang zhi ba'i lam ston cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis

sgra dbyangs brjod pa de phyogs bcu kun tu skad dang tshig gcig brjod pas yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi brjod pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa

des sems can thams cad rang rang gi tshig khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed sgra dbyangs kyis
rgyas par byed do/ /chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa de'i sems can ngan par song ba rnams kyi rna lam du'ang grag go /de nas sems can de dag
rang rang gi tshig kun tu shes nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba/ 'di ltar snyan pa/ 'di ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di su'i tshig bdag cag la zhi ba dang bde ba'i lam
ston pa'i sems can gyi snying po 'di su zhig /lam gang bstan pas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob/ nyan thos kyi sa ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig /rang sangs rgyas
kyi sa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig /lam gang thob na bdag cag lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad byang zhing sdug bsngal thams
cad byang ste lus kyi g.yeng ba thams cad srab par gyur/ de bas na bdag gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan par bya snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka'
stsal pa| grogs po dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ dge ba'i las kyi lam ste/ des lha dang mir skye ba rab tu 'thob/ sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang
'thob| sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba thob bo/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam des sems can thams cad kyi mchog dam pa/ khyad par can/ phul/ byams pa chen po/ /snying rje chen
po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang zhe na/
dge ba'i las kyi lam gang dang ldan na/ sems can rnams myur du lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/
de la grogs po dag /lha dang mi rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam la brtson par bya'o/ /sbyin pa sbyin no/ /tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /'du shes bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
rnam par bam par 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba dang /
rnam par rnags par 'du shes pa dang / /rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang / 'bus gang bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par zos par 'du shes pa
dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang / keng rus su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bar 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa thob ste/ mir gyur pa thob nas kyang yang gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su 'thob par
'gyur ba'i 'du shes bcu gnyis bsgom par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa
dang / zhi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lhag mthong rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su thob
cing mir gyur pa thob nas kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi'i ror mgron bya bar bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra skad dang / dbyangs brjod pas sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'di lta ste/ da ltar
gyi bzhin du bde ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag rnams ni/ gor ma chag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i spobs pa
mthong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa stong par gyur pa'i rnyog pa lnga'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed du sprul pa'i
phyir sems can tshangs pa la mos pa de dag gi mdun du ni/ tshangs pa'i gzugs su so sor gnas shing chos ston to/ /la la dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub yang dag par len du 'dzud la 'jug par byed cing so sor 'god do/ /sems can la la dag ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/ /la la dag ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la'o/ /
la la dag ni/ dge ba'i las kyi lam la sbyor bas lha dang mi rnams kyi phyir ro/ /gang dbang phyug la mos pa nas glang po la glang po'i gzugs kyi bar dang / rta la rta'i gzugs dang / yi
dwags la yi dwags kyi gzugs dang / sems can dmyal ba pa la sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste chos ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i
sems can la la dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nas lha dang mi'i bar dag la'ang sbyor te/ sems can gang dag der sngon
dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bskyed pa de dag ni/ de bas kyang brtan par byas so/ /sems can gang dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni/ der bskyed do/ /sems can gang dad pa'i
rgyu des ngan song gsum po de dag las shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes pa de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs
rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang tshad med grangs med pa'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun to/ /la la dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob bo/ /la la dag ni/ de lta bu'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs rab tu thob ste/ bzod pa dang /
gzungs ji snyed thob pa'i stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gan du lhags so/ /gang
rkyen la 'jug pa'i theg pa la sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA'i grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dag las kha
cig ni| gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing skyong la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong ngo / /kha cig ni/ phyir mi
ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/ /de bzhin du gang nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag
tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems
can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par gnas pa lha dang mi'i lam thob par gyur pa chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i
sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes so/ /la la dag ni/ smon
lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho skyong zhing byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te chos kyang ston pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad sna
tshogs cho ma cho dgu grangs med dpag tu med pa byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'jig rten dag na mkhas
pa gang / /blo dang ldan zhing 'jigs med pa/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos shing / /bya bar dka' ba rnams kyang spyod/ /pha yi dngos po rnam par ston/ /sems can sdug bsngal smin par byed//
bdud bzhi dag kyang 'dul bar byed/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba thob/ /sbyin pa sgom pa sdom pa yis/ /sems can rnams la las ston cing / /theg pa gsum la sbyor ba yis/ /de dag thar pa'i
skal pa thob/ /gang dag ngan 'gro gsum gnas pa/ /sdug bsngal gnod las thar byed cing / /de dag sems ni dang byas nas/ /lha dang mir ni rab tu khrid/ /dge ba'i chos la rab sbyor
zhing / /gang dang gang la mos pa dag /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/ /de dag sangs rgyas mthun par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan
las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gnyis pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu 'khrol/
me tog gi char yang rab tu bab/ a ga ru dang / ta ga ru dang / dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan dang / sprul gyi snying po tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char dag kyang rab tu bab/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
yid bzhin gyi na bza' dang / dar gyi lnga ldi'i phreng ba dang / gser gyi lcag bod dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / dpung rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings kyang brgyan to/ /klu bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson pas mu tig gi se mo do rnam pa sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu'i char kyang rab tu phab bo/ /byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'gro ba slad ma dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag de skad ma zer cig /ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i dus kyi bar dag tu gang de dag rigs bzhi'i
'khor mi dad pa dag 'byung ste/ spyod pa ngan pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa/ gzhog slong byed pa/ thos pa nyung ba/ ser sna can/ spyod pa ma rungs pa/ sdig pa'i lta bar gnas pa/ rtag pa dang
chad pa la lta ba phal cher 'byung ngo / /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/ rgyu dang 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod pa/ gcig la gcig ngan du sems cing bdag bstod pa nas mi
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dang ldan pa dag 'byung ngo / /rgyal po'ang chos dang ldan pa mi 'byung ste/ 'dod pa yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skabs tshol ba/ dge
sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim na gnas pa mchod par 'os pa dag la brnyas pa shin tu byed cing mchod pa'i 'os ma yin pa la dad de/ gzhog slong can/ g.yo sgyu can/ tshul khrims ngan
pa can| thos pa nyung ba/ bsod nams chung ba/ snying chung ba/ yid mi gzhungs pa/ log par zhugs pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la rgyal po gus par byed cing
zhes byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing kun tu 'dzin to/ /de dag kyang nyin dang mtshan du bde ba 'dor zhing 'phral gang du rgyal po'i dgos pa ma rungs pa
dag spyod de/ rgyal po'ang 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba brdzun du smra ba mang ba 'byung ste/ rgyal po'i skyon de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi
khams gzhan du 'gro'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ dgon pa dang / nags tshal gyi gnas su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / chog shes pa dang /
btang snyoms la gnas so/ /gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ yul gyi phan pa dang / dgos pa thams cad yal bar 'dor ro/ /yul
de'ang 'khor gnyis kyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i nyes pas de na sems can rnams nad mang bar 'gyur te/ tshogs dang bral ba/ dran pa nyams pa/ chos ma yin pa
tshol ba| myur du rga ba/ myur du 'khogs pa/ myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu 'di lta bu'i yul 'khrug par 'gyur na/ chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di su la yongs su gtad/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu ri mor bya bar mi 'os pa/ 'chal ba'i shes rab can/ brlang ba/ brkam pa/ nor la dga'i/
chos la mi dga' ba/ tshig la dad kyi/ dgos pa la ma yin pa/ mi sems pa/ gzhogs slong can/ brdzun che zhing gzhan 'drid par sems pa dag 'byung ngo / /gang dge sbyong dang / bram
ze dang / khyim na gnas pa/ mkhas pa/ chos 'dod pa/ chos smra ba de dag la ri mor mi byed/ mi lta'i/ rdzun zer ba'i tshig la dga' zhing brnyas pa/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig thos na
bya bar sems pa 'byung ngo / /gang bsod nams chung ba dang / shes rab chung ba dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / gzhogs slong can dang / brlang ba dang / bdag bstod pa dang /
gzhan smod pa dang / lta ba ma rungs pa dang / 'phral gang du sems kyi lus dang ngag mi sdom pa dang / chos 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / sdig pa la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan
pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim na gnas pa de dag kyang ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i zham ring ba la nor gyi phung pos rjes su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur
ro| |nor gyi stobs de dang / rdzun du smra ba'i stobs des ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams la'ang mchod cing rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i
rgyal po'i zham ring ba'i tshig nyan cing byed de mchod pa nas rgyal po la mchod par gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i bar gyi nyes pas chos kyi phyogs tshar
gcod par 'gyur ro/ /chos ma yin pa'i phyogs bslang bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar la
bsam gtan byed par 'gyur na/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su zhig la gtad par bya/ gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyi
tshe na khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/ bdag brtson par sems shing de dag mi dad pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dang / shes rab 'chal cing khyim dang / rigs dang / gnas dang /
yul dang / rnyed pas chos la ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/ /gcig la gcig gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul ba'i skabs tshol ba dang / gzhan las rnyed cing rim gro
byas nas yid dga' ba dang / yul dam pa rnyed pa'i dge slong rnams la smad pa dang / gzhan gyi gnas dang / grong khyer dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la slu ba 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang / so sor rtog pa zhi ba dang bde ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang / zas dang / skom gyi ro la brkam pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la brtson pa
'byung ngo / /khyim na gnas pa rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ chos 'dod pa rnams la brnyas pa shin tu byed pas chos smra ba'i dge 'dun rnams gtsug lag khang gi
gnas spangs te dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan dag na btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po la la dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dong ngo / /la la dag ni/ dgon par btang snyoms kyi bar la gnas so/ /gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang
btang snyoms la gnas so/ /yul der mu ge dang / nad dang / 'thab mo'ang 'byung ngo / /der sems can rnams gcig la gcig 'ching zhing gsod de/ de dag gcig la gcig
'jigs pas yog par lta ba gzhan la skyabs su 'gro na/ ngas 'di lta bu'i zab mo chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi bzod pa 'di su zhig la yongs su gtad par bya/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin mthu chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di bdag cag gi sug par gtad du gsol/ pho brang 'khor gang dang yul gang na zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di rab tu spyod
par 'gyur ba'i yul der bdag cag 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba dang / dgung char mi 'bab pa dang / bro nad dang / gzhan gyi 'khor bzlog pa la spro bar bgyi'o//
chos smra ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos dgod pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zham ring ba dang / grong rdal
dang / ljongs na gnas pa rnams chos dang ldan pa la sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /legs so legs so/ /spobs pa
bzang po/ brtson pa bzang po/ 'jigs pa med pa/ khro ba mi snyan pa/ brnyas ma shin byed pa/ bkres pa/ skom pa/ dbyug pas 'tshog pa/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung gis
gdungs kyang dam pa'i chos kyi mig gnas kyi bar du yul dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 'or gyi grong dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chos kyi mig 'di la
brtson par bya ba dang / zab mo chos thams cad kyi sgo'i gzhi dang / bzod pa 'di rab tu bstan pa dang / bzod pa 'di la sems can yang rab tu sbyor ba dang / gang bzod pa
'di sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan la'ang lung 'bogs pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / gang yang nyan pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa de dag la spro bar bya ba dang /
chos dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / byed pa sgrub par khyed las su dag spro bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong
phrag bcu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ dam
pa'i chos kyi sbyin gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams sbyar bar bgyi ba'i bar dang / gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam la 'brir stsal
pa de dag bdag cag chos dang ldan pa la sbyor bar bgyi bar spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /skyes bu chen po'i byed pa bya ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu
khyed yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di thob pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji tsam du bzod pa 'di'i stobs dang / brtson pa
yang dag par 'dzin cing brtson pa la dmigs pa de tsam du stobs dang brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la brtson par dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / gling bzhi pa
thams cad dang / yul dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs thams cad du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byos shing / /rgyal po lam g.yo bar byos shig /
blon po dang / zham ring ba rnams kyang yal bar ma gtang zhig /rigs kyi bu/ gang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du da ltar nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'phel bar 'gyur gyi bar du
sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skye bar spro zhing sdig pa 'dod pa log par lta ba'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug
pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / nyes pa mang po'i shas che ba'i sems can rnams khyim gyi gnas nas phyung ste zhi ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing sbyor ba dang / bslab pa'i
gnas la rab tu 'god pa dang / nyes pa mang pos nyen la/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa'i tshul can gyi sems can rnams bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
gzungs dang / bzod pa la sbyor zhing so sor 'god pa dang dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan la mngon par dga' la/ sems can yang de la sbyor zhing de dag phan pa la sbyor ba
dang / ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la sbyor ba nas 'chal pa'i shes rab can sdig pa'i bas mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ lta ba'i thibs po la gnas pa rnams 'phags pa'i
shes rab kyi stobs la sbyor zhing so sor 'god de/ sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis non pa rnams yongs su thar par byed pa ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang
bar 'phel lo/ /'di la gang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus nyin mtshan bdun du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
skyo ba bzod cing bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed cing chung ngu na bzod pa 'di yang dag par len du 'dzud do/ /sems can rnams la ston cing tshig tu
'don pa dang / glegs bam la 'brir 'jug pa ni/ bsod nams rab tu mang du 'phel te/ yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa chu
klung gang+gA'i bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed du mi 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ rang
bzhin gyis snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can chen po de dag ni/ dgos pa chen po la brtson pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can chen po de dag ni/ brtson 'grus che ba/ shes rab kyis
brgyan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ rab tu myur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /gang nyon mongs pa
rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas/
glegs bam la 'brir 'jug pa'i bar du sbyor zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
zhes bya ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bsngags pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gang na
ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing yongs su dag pa grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par brtsams te da ltar nas ma mchis pa'i dus kyi bar du nyon mongs pa
rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba thams cad btang ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mchi bar sdom pa blangs pa
las| da ni/ bdag cag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sdom pa blangs te ma mchis pa'i dus na slar zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyad pa
spyod par mi bgyid do/ /smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag cag rnams yongs su ma dag pa nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa
ba ma mchis pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /brtson 'grus chen po la dmigs te byang
chub sems dpa' gang de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing pha rol tu phyin pa chen
po spyad de mngon par shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po la gzhan la rag ma lus shing ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gang yongs su ma dag cing nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su nyams pa'i sems
can rnams dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| de lta bas na/ ci nas kyang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ yul
gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad pa'i yul der yon tan gyi khyad par dang / dpal phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs
'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rgyal po yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po nad med par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa nyung zhing tshe ring
bar 'byung ba dang / rdul dang bral zhing rgol ba dang dgra med par 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang rtsal thags thogs med cing dga' ba mang la chos 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| 'di ltar klu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis rab tu srung bar 'gyur te/ bzhin bzang dag dang / de la
de ltar mnyam pa med do/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
lags te/ yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o/ /bro nad zhi
bar bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o/ /dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /stobs dang rtsal thags thogs
ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /legs so legs so/ /khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su longs
shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'os dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdag cag mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel
bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags te/ yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de nga rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po
rnams kyi yon tan dang / legs pa bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang / des pa dang / dga' ba dang / gus
pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'ang byams par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu
mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod de/ phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher grags shing
tshe ring ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste/ yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni/ rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang
bsngags par 'gyur ba ni/ de dag go /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/
bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag rnyed par
'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang / ri la mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang / sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la
gnas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
zhe na| khron pa dang / chu mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi mtha' grub par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams
dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
yul de'i bud med phrag dog dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /
gzhan yang bud med gang bzod pa 'di nyan pa de la dad pa rnyed cing chos smra ba la phan pa zer ba de ni/ bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin te/ snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud med thob
par mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba dag na gzhan gyi 'khor dang / nang gi
'khor gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang dro dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu smyung

dang / sbrang ma dang / byi ba dang / 'gro ba khro bo dang / sbrul khro bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / ro bro ba med pa dang / rtsub pa dang / sre mo dang / mi bde bar reg pa dang / bza' ba dang /
btung ba dang / gos dang / lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog dang / dbyig pa dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / rdeg pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nad kyi gnod
pa yul de na med par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag gis kyang yul de shin tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
dag /yul gang du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di 'chad cing ston par 'gyur ba'i yul der gnod pa bcu po de dag gi yul thams cad mi
gtse bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ bzod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ pha rol tu
phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su thob par byed pa'o/ /bzod pa 'di'i ming 'ba' zhig gang gi rna lam
du thos pa'ang snying po byang chub kyi bar du gang zag de mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzod pa bsgom pa 'di thog thag nyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs
te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ de ltar mthu che ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' bar byed pa/
rgyun du byed pa/ phyir mi ldog par byed pa/ rnam par rtsan par byed pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ gzugs zhi bar byed pa/ yongs su smin par byed pa/ 'bral bar byed pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'o/ /bzod pa 'di de ltar bstan pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog
gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di sems can rnams la bshad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par dgod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /da gang gi dus la bab par sems na'o/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems
dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ me
tog ban+du 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ gnas dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu me tog ban+du 'di rab tu spyod par
'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar de bzhin du gnyi ga byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na rigs kyi bu po'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo de dag byang chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / gling bzhi pa grong dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / ljongs dang / 'or gyi grong dag tu rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo dag byang chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba de dag tu bzod pa 'di sgom pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrog pa dang / spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa 'di gang
na spyod pa der me tog ban+du 'di spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' ste mngon par bstod do/ /yang dag
par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //bod skad du/ 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas
pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgyad khri dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i dge 'dun sum khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sgrib pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba/ gzi brjid dang dpal gyi
dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i don thabs kyis bskul ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba lhun gyi grub pa/
sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bkod pa/ chos kyi sde snod srung zhing skyob pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i mdo gzungs su 'dzin cing seng+ge'i sgras phyogs bcur chos kyi
'brug sgra chen po sgrog pa/ de dag gi yon tan gyi go 'phang ni/ ri rab dang 'dra la shes rab zab cing rgya che ba ni/ rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ bdud kyi sde dpung dang bcas par btul ba/ mu stegs
thams cad sdud cing sems rnam par byang ba la 'jog pa/ mthu stobs dang ldan pas rnam par grol ba la thogs pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid la bde bar gnas pa/ dran pa dang ting nge
'dzin kun tu bzung ba/ bstan pa la mos shing blo gros dang ldan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pas chos thams cad
kyi don dang mi ldan pa med pa/ skye bo rnams kyi yid bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/ yod pa dang med pa shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa/
mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te spyan lngas sems can rnams kyi dbang po rtogs pa/ gzi brjid dang dpal dpag tu med pa/ skye bo mang po rnams kyi bsam gtan dang shes
rab kyis sems su sbyangs te mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan cing mchog dang ldan par byed pa/ sems nam mkha' dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi gzugs dang kha dog yongs su btang ste
chos rnams kyi chos nyid la mkhas pa/ rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sems can gang nas gang du 'khor bar shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pas mnyam pa
med pa la bsnyen pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring bo nas bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug thob pa/ ye shes dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
dang / ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa/ bzang 'gro'i sgo ni/ phye/ ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgo ni/ bkag ste/ sems can kun la bu gcig dang 'dra bar snyoms par bstan pa'i
phyir lam rgyud lngar skye zhing lus ston par byed pa/ sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu zhing 'khor ba la gnas te/ nad gso ba'i
cho ga la mkhas pas nad kyi rkyen bzhin du sman byin nas 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byed pa/ gang gis thos kyang ma grol ba med pa de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang
ldan pa| sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa la mchod pa myong ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shin tu rig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun du gnas par shes pa/ rtag
par yang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod par bshad pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems
dpa' 'od mi g.yo dang / byang chub sems dpa' klu shing ljon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi bla dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po
dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'grus dang / byang
chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid la dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thub med dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang / mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs te grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lha dang lhan
cig tu nam mkha' la 'khod de lha'i rin po che'i me tog gi char phab nas rol mo sil snyan yang grangs med dpag tu med pa sgra rang 'byin pa byas te/ lha tshangs pas sam+b+ha ra'i spos kyi
bdug pa dri zhim pos bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin phung phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams kun khyab par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i chos thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la kun tu mchod yon gsol bar gyur
to| |de ltar lha rnams kyis mchod pa gul ba yang theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i lam tshol ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po grangs med
dpag tu med pas bskor ba de dag dang thabs gcig tu shing sA la chen po ga la ba de logs su gshegs nas dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i khar
de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad sdud cing skyob par dgongs te/ gsung dbyangs chen po phyung nas sgra des phyogs bcu
kun tu khyab par so so'i skad bzhin du sems can thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ deng ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
sems can la thugs brtse bar dgongs so/ /sems can la srung zhing skyob par dgongs so/ /sems can sdud cing zhes par dgongs so/ /sems can la snyoms par gzigs pa
ni| dper na/ bu gcig la lta ba dang 'dra bar rten med pa la rten bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba ni/ mthong bar bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni/ bral bar bya'o/ /
bde ba med pa ni/ bde bar bya'o/ /ma grol ba ni/ rnam par grol bar bya'o/ /longs spyod med pa ni/ longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o/ /the tshom dang ma bral ba ni/ the tshom dang bral bar bya'o/ /
'gyod tshangs ma byas pa ni/ 'gyod pa tshangs par bya'o/ /mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni/ mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na lam gyi g.yas g.yon
du sa gzhi mnyam pa thang bzang po yongs su dag pa/ bkra shis kyis chu zheng du mnyam par dpag tshad stong phrag bcu bcu yod par bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas mod la der gzhes
te dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnas 'dir ni/ chos bshad pa'i sar 'os so/ /zhes bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sngon rtag tu ri dang / tshal dang / chab gtsang ma 'bab pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / me tog dag mchis
pa la dgyes na/ deng 'dir ni/ char 'bab pa'ang ma mchis/ shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/ grong khyim dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mi phal yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das
'dir ci la dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad ces gsungs/ phal shul ring po nas mchi ba/ bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams srog kyang mi
'tsho ste| zas mchis na ni/ srog mchis/ srog mchis na ni/ lus mchis/ lus mchis na ni/ chos lam yang mchis so/ /zas ma mchis na/ srog ma
mchis| srog ma mchis na/ lus ma mchis/ lus ma mchis na/ chos lam yang ma mchis lags na/ da 'di'i nang du 'di lta bu yid la bab bo gang yang ma mchis par bcom
ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'dir chos bshad ces gsungs/ de nas shes rab chen po shA radwa ti'i bus sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo la smras pa/ sngar chos kyi phyir
zhu ba'i rigs kyi/ gzhan bsam mi dgos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhir ma zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa
dang / cis kyang mi bsnyengs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa mnga' ste/ gang rten med pa de'i ni/ rten du mdzad/
sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ma mthong ba ni/ mthong bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mdzad/ bde ba med pa ni/ bde ba la reg par mdzad/ ma grol
ba ni| rnam par grol bar mdzad/ longs spyod dang mi ldan pa ni/ longs spyod dang ldan par mdzad/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rang 'byung med pa'i mya ngan bya ci dgos/ bdag dran pa sngon dra ma chen po dri
ma med par grags pas phal mang po la chos bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mthu
stobs dang ldan pa'i lha dang / klu la sogs pa'i phal mang po khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe na zas dag mi snang nas bdag gis de'i tshe phal mang po 'di rnams kyi zas ji ltar
'byor snyam bsam pa las dri ma med par grags pas bdag la smras pa/ nyan thos shes rab dman pa/ yang dag pa'i chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi/ thog ma nas zas dang / gos dang / khri
stan la sogs pa sgyu ma'i rdzas la ci'i phyir rnam par rtog ces dri ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas de skad smras pa'i tshe lha dang / mi rnams ni/ chos lam thob/ bdag ni/ skyengs te/
khyod da ltar smras pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ blo gros kyi mchog shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa bden te/ theg pa chen po
bsam pa'i rigs kyi lus bde ba'i phyir bsam pa ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs kyi mod las der gser gyi me tog cig
'bus nas byung ste/ de'i 'phang du dpag tshad khri phrag bzhi bcu yod la/ stong khams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas bai DUR+ya'i dra bas kyang gser gyi me tog
khyab par g.yogs te/ me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrus kyi rdzing bu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba/ de'i ngos bzhir me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang
po la 'di lta ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da rI ka la sogs pa rnam pa mang po dpag tu med pas rin po che'i rdzing rnam par brgyan pa byung nas gang la la zhig
gis gser gyi me tog dang / rin po che'i rdzing bu mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi rnam par dag pa thob na/ nang du zhugs te khrus byas pa lta ci smos/ gal te zhugs te khrus byas pa ni/ rnam
par dag pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /gser gyi me tog de'i 'og tu seng+ge'i khri rin po che las byas pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa byung ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis rin po che'i khri de la bzhugs nas sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dang / yan lag kun nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang gser gyi me tog dag gi
kha dog dang mthun par phyogs bzhir byung bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ri lung dang / yul sa kun kyang
mnyam par gyur nas thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ sme gtsog pa'ang med la sems can dmyal ba'ang zhi nas yi dwags kyang rnam par grol te/ log spyod dang dam pa'i chos
la smod pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyur nas tha dad pa med do/ /phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od zer de gzigs nas so so nas tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so/ /zhes pas bstod nas legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan
'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi 'od zer dang mi 'dra ste/ sngon chad kyi 'od ni/ shar phyogs su sngar shar na/ deng gi 'od ni/ phyogs bzhi nas dus gcig tu
phyogs bcur khyab par shar ba las bltas na/ 'od des ni/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te mya ngan las bzla bar mngon no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de
nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams so so'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mjed nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'od zer chen po gtong ba ni/ gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos bstan cing sems can
rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral gyi cha na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/ sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phul nas the tshom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi
rnam grangs nyan cing gsol ba'i rigs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can yongs kyis ngan cing khro la rdzun rgyu can te/ theg pa gcig la ma dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa
shAkya thub par byams pa chen po thabs sna tshogs kyis theg pa gsum du phye ste srid pa gsum las rnam par grol bar byed do/ /theg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dge ba/ bar
du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dge ba/ yongs su dkar ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong
du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do cig kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ 'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdan khri dang /
gser gyi me tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tshom dag zhu na/ khyed rnams kyang
bsod nams thob la/ skye bo kun la phan pa dang / bde bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
phrag bcu bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas thabs gcig tu dong ste byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te me tog rin
po che mchog tu bzang po'i char phab nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis
na| skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /the tshom yod na de kun dris shig dang / ngas khyed rnams la byed brag phyed par bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ theg pa gcig las mi bshad na/ 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg
pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed
rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyi/ nyon cig /rigs kyi bu rnams/ dper na/ mi gcig la ming gsum yod
pa lta bu ste/ chung ngu'i tshe na ni/ byis pa zhes bya/ lo nyi shu yan chad la skyes bu zhes bya/ lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa ni/ rgan po zhes bya'o/ /nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/
sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni/ theg pa chung ngu bstan/ sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni/ theg pa 'bring po bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam
chen po la zhugs pa la ni/ theg pa chen po bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig /mdor mtha' gnyis med pa dang phyogs gcig tu mthun te/ shes pa'i sgo tha dad
kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o/ /mdo ni/ theg pa gcig ste/ thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'du la theg
pa chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /de bas na theg pa gsum yang theg pa gcig go /zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la
bzod pa thob bo/ /dge slong brgyad brgyas ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lha nyi khris ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob/ mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni/ mod la bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan
'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin
gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ri dang / nags dang / tshal dang / shing drung dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas
dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / dgon pa dang / dur khrod dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang / chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba
dang / khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur
ro| |sngon de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/ gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa
skyes te rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do/ /gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyal ba'i mdo 'di thos te dga' ba skyes nas
dad pa dang gus pa'i sems kyis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byas sam/ blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs
'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni/ tshe 'di nyid la bde ba thob ste/ sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi
'phos na'ang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis sngon du lam drangs te bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad
du zhe na| mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang / gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/ /mdo sde 'di blangs te/ gzungs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni/
byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te/ de bas na de dag ni/ bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go /rgyu dang rkyen des na mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa rnams gcig tu skye zhing mi
'bral bar smon to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dbyangs can dang / 'phrog ma mo dang / ri'i

lha dang / shing gi lha dang / klung gi lha dang / mtsho'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rang rang gi stan las langs
te| bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing gus pas phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'dri la rtag tu bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu mdun du bdar te yongs su
dag par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di mchod rten du'am/ gnas khang du'am/ khyim pa'i khyim du'am/ dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/ gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug pa mi gtsang bas mdo
sde 'di bzung ngam/ ma gus par bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyis na/ bdag cag gis gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/ /gang
du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / glo bur du gnod la 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / tshe 'phos na'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o/ /gang
la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par bgyis te sug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam/ khrus bgyis te bdug spos kyis bdug cing bklags sam/ kha
ton du bgyis sam/ 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ rjes su dran nam/ sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na/ bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di
bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang zag de nyal na'ang de'i mdun du mchis te ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /yang gcig tu na dgra ma
rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/ /de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ste mgron du 'chi na/ bdag cag rnams
kyis rtag tu 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhir gang du mchi na'ang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun du dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na'ang lhar skye bar bgyi'o/ /
rgyu de dang rkyen des ni/ sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stor bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur
na| mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur/ ga la te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byed par 'dod na/ khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te khang ba
dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan+dan dang / phye ma dang / byug pas mchod cing phyag btsal nas de ltar nyin
mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo btsugs nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo se 'di bklags te/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng ba
dang / bsam pa mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g.yeng ba dang / spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang / bstan cing bslab pa mi g.yeng bar nyin mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas byung
ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa'am/ kha ton du 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang
nas 'byung ba'i sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyi/ de la the tshom mam yid gnyis su ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /'di ni/ srung zhing skyob pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni/ mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o/ /'di ni/ don dam pa'i snying po'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni/ 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /
drug gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / me chen po dang / rlung chen po dang / nyi ma chen po dang / nam mkha' chen po dang / mdo sde 'di ni/ sa chen po dang 'dra ste/ gtsang sme
dang / bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ chu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme gtsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ me chen po dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa
dang / gtsog pa dang / ljan ljin thams cad tshig par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ rlung chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme gtsog thams cad 'bud par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ nyi ma chen po dang 'dra
ste| mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do/ /de lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen
po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni/ dpe zla med de/ yar byang chub sems dpa' dang / bar du nyan thos dang / mar 'jig tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shong ba med do/ /de bas na
khyed rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung ste chongs shig /kun tu spel bar gyis shig /dad cing gus par byos shig dang / khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o/ /khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te 'chang na/ rgyun du nga'ang
mthong la/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas
'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams gsol zhing zhu ba mchis na/ dpag tu ma mchis
pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa la bka'
stsal pa| shin tu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /khyod kyis dris pa de'ang sems can
dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag dran pa sngon yun ring por
'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chen gtsug phud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan gcig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo/ /zhes thos te/ de las yun mi
ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab bskams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa
gdugs kyis gdungs te 'gum du nye ba las/ dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang / snying rje skyes te chab dang / kha zas stsal
kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni/ gson grang na/ tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma
thag tu dus las 'das te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sar skyes so/ /zhes gda' na/ deng bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang / dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs/
rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / dpag tu ma mchis
pa'i bsod nams dang / rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ sdom pa'i
rtsa ba nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshad na/ bskal pa brgya stong
khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ 'di ltar chu thams cad kyi thigs pa ni/ bgrang zhing shes par rung gi /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /ri rab
thams cad ni/ srang grangs su bgrang du rung gi /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug par shes par rung gi /sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan gyi/ gang gis rna bar lan gcig thos na/ gang
zag de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skya bar 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang mos pa dang gus par byas te yi ger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med
pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas
gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur/ nga yang mthong la dus ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams tshul bzhin du gos tshags bcos la lus mi g.yeng ba dang / sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi
g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng bar byos la chos thos par 'dod na sems rtse gcig tu sdus shig /bcom ldan 'das mar me ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams
cad sdud cing 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brjod dpag 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam khyab dka' la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs la gnas pa'i stobs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gtso la phyag
'tshal lo/ /thams cad 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'ching ba kun gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gyi mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten kun las
'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' ltar dmigs su med
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi tshogs 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bu gcig gi pha ltar byams pa chen po la phyag 'tshal
lo| |tshe rabs 'chi 'pho gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin par gyur
cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs can kun la sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kye 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag par mnyan cing sems thag
pa nas mchod pa phul cig /ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon/ /sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yangs/ /rnam grol mtshan nyid bskyed par
byas| |dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag la/ /ngas ni dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang / /des kyang chung bar mi nus te/ /sa bon tshig rnams rang bzhin dong / /grung brtan 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur
