theg pa chung du bsal nas su/ /theg chen nyi tshe yod par 'gyur/ /theg pa gnyis po bsal nas su/ /theg pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur/ /dge rtsa med pa'i gang
zag gis/ /sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas grangs med mchod myong bas/ /gdod des sangs rgyas mtshan thos so/ /len cing 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /phyogs tsam rnam
par grol ba ste/ /rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas/ /da yang nga yi chos 'di la/ /sangs rgyas spyad pa kun spyad de/ /sangs rgyas mtshan la phyag 'tshal zhing / /mdo 'di blang zhing klog
'chang na/ /bdud kyi las dang bral bar 'gyur/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med dang / /log spyod rnams kyi sdig kyang 'byang / /ma 'ongs dus na gang zag de/ /'phags pa'i lam yang
nges par 'grub/ /gang zhig dad pa ma skyes na/ /ngan song gsum du ltung yang dag /dad skyes brtson 'grus phyag btsal na/ /tshad med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas rtse
gcig phyag 'tshal zhing / /sdig pa dpag med byang bar smon/ /de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te yang dag par mnyan nas lus dang
sems rtse gcig tu bsdus te g.yel zhing 'gyur ba med par yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te sems thag pa nas nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi
mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrags pa las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla mar me gsal nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal bu bcu drug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rgyal po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang mar me rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byin sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od
dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge bar bsam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla gsal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas pad+ma dag pa rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu btsun rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
sprin 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
shing sA la rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma dpal gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi
g.yo 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos tsan+dan la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri legs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab lha'i thur tshugs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas zla gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chags med la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya'i me tog
mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya dang gser gyi kha dog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer
rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blo rgya mtsho mngon par shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs chen po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma sgyu ma dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid skyo spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug
dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'dzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od sgrib la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas nyi zla bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bla med bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub me
tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog mdog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chu zla'i
'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas the tshom mun sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sdug bsngal bsgral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mos pa dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
sngon legs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bzhad sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od
thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od 'bar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas 'bar ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas 'od rgyun mi 'chad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od bsam dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od brjod med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od
'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan bzang gser btso ma'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ring du brtag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i mdzod la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zil mngar gyi ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal
ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpal mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas 'jam dpal ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu rje dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu gtsang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos ta ma ra ba ra tsan+dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
spos tsan+dan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog brtsegs rab tu dga' ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas brtson
'grus chen po bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i
dpal 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tu dgram la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas brtson 'grus che btsan la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas dpa' brtsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i snying
po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi phug rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bzang legs gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas legs par sad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i bla bre stong pa nyid du brtan pa'i
stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rin chen me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
bai DUR+ya rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku kun tu mngon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas bdud kyi rgyal po rnams tshar gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dben zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog
btsun ye shes kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gdugs rin po che'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyi ba dan mchog tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser
'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog dbyangs dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas ba dan 'od rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi na bza'i rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog su ma na'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog
ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas stobs btsan dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga'
ba'i 'khrug med kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs bdag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi ri dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thar pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blun mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas
sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig
gang+gA'i bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gal te gang zag la las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos
na| de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/ de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'das pa'i mtshan/ /de la
gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /sems nyid thob cing sdig kyang 'byang / /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/ /phyin chad mi byed sdom par nus/ /dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/ /theg chen tshul khrims
ldan pa ste/ /de phyir da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te/ /theg chen chos la dmod pa dang / /log spyod rnams su lta ba'o/ /gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag na/ /
log spyod ces su mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dpag med rtag tu mthong / /sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang / /mtshams med sngar bcas gang byas pa/ /rnam dag sems kyis 'gyod nus na/ /de ni
tshul bzhin gnas pa yin/ /de yang gus par phyag 'tshal phyir/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /theg chen tshul khrims thob las na/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad brgyas ni/ theg pa chen po'i sems shas
tsam skyes so/ /dge slong lnga stong ni/ dgra bcom par grub bo/ /lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag
tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gsal rgyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i mdog dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas seng+ge 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyi ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas yon tan bde gnas rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dka' thub seng+ge'i
nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan 'dab ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid mchog
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas zil mngar rnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan dang ldan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng+ge'i sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer
dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bla na med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs thor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas bro mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab ting nge
'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas drin dpal kun tu
'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid sgra snyan sred la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ta ma ra ba ra tsan+dan
gyi spos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa thams cad
bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong /
sangs rgyas khri la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/
'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la las da ltar bzhugs
pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na/ de ni/ bskal pa khri phrag drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas gus par
phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag btsal na/ /las ngan kun las rnam par grol/ /mtshams med lnga pa'i sdig kyang 'byang / /rnam
dag sa la rtag tu gnas/ /shAkya'i chos la'ang bde gnas shing / /mtha' ru ngan song gsum dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mthong ba dang / /sangs rgyas stong yang mthong bar 'gyur//
de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste/ /rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye/ /dam pa'i chos kyang thos gyur cing / /sangs rgyas rtag pa'ang mngon par rtogs//
da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas gzungs kyi sgor chud par gyur to/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag
bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dzam+bu na da'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen
snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas khyab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab
ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas skyes bu
dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mthong dga'
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi mtshan mas rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mthun pa kun tu dpal sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri
ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bgegs kyi tshogs
thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam
par bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par
brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lung bstan pa pad+ma'i
'od lnga brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje ting nge
'dzin gyi dbang phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs
med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag
khri bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gang zag dang la las thos par 'gyur na/ bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems
can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas da ltar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /log spyod rnams ni ma gtogs te/ /sgrib pa gsum dang
mtshams med lnga/ /sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la bde gnas shing / /dpag med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos kyang rtag tu thos/ /de bas da ltar
gus phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ /kha na ma tho 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /las ngan bcu po byas pa yang / /
da ltar mngon du byang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas kyi/ /ngo bo nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas de la mos par byos/ /kha ton 'bri klog phyag 'tshal na/ /tshe rabs gar byung gar
skyes kyang / /lta ba log par mi skye'o/ /rnam par grol ba rgyun du thob/ /mtha' 'khob sa ru yong mi skye/ /ngan pa'i yul du'ang mi skye zhing / /rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa 'bum
phrag bzhi khri'i bar/ /sems can dmyal bar mi skye 'o/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /gzungs chen rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis sangs rgyas ma byon pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga khris phyir mi ldog pa'i sar gnas so/ /dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni/ dgra bcom mar grub bo/ /
lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /gzungs chen po dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdo'i sde la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin
tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
gang gis mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos nas bstod pa byas sam/ phyag 'tshal lam/ brjod dam/ mos pa bskyed dam/ blangs sam/ 'chang bar byed na/
gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ tshe snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir gus pas phyag 'tshol cig /bcom ldan 'das
kyis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /nyan thos 'bum phrag bcus theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /
dge slong dang / dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha dang mi dpag tu med pa zhig gis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla gang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dren mkhan la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'chad mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan rin po che'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par gus la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rgyal po'i me
tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson
'grus yon tan gyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' spyan rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam legs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul me tog
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpung gnas la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gog spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' mnyam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par mi rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mtshan
nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun du bteg la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun du phab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rin chen blta ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dra ba snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
skyon med rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' btang bzung ri sgul ba'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dkar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dbyug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra thub med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' zhing gi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' gzhon nur brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang shar la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tsan+dan gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtsug tor la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang mchog la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' gtsang shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs ldan sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' mngon sum mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na
dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi
zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thogs med la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mthong la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po me tog la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dri mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lan ldon mkhas pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges
par brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud
skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab go
'phang 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba rnam bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rgya mtsho mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' mdo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
seng+ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgra mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyi bo skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang
ba brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtso mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus kun tu
mngon par ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku
mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
byang chub sems dpa' dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rje la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu phan gdags la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' yang dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ston pa'i mkhan po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod
pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rigs la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu snying rje la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' ri ngar can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' char pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rin chen 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chu la phyag 'tshal
lo| |byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rin chen byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i thor tshugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo rig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bla ba rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sbyin pa rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dam pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnyen pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma'i 'od la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba
dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal btsun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya che la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' snang thar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
gzugs stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus spyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig dang /

bcu dang / brgya dang / stong dang / khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya/ khri phrag nyis brgya/ khri phrag sum brgya/ khri phrag bzhi brgya/ khri phrag lnga brgya/ khri phrag drug brgya/ khri phrag

bdun brgya/ khri phrag brgyad brgya/ khri phrag dgu brgya/ khri phrag stong rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ 'bum phrag khri phrag khri la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa
tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi zad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal

lo| |gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA brgya'i

bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA khri'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams
la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa gsum gyi khams su
mi gtogs te/ rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur/ mtha' 'khob tu mi skye/ yul ngan par mi skye/ lus ngan par mi len/ log par mi lta/ rigs ngan du
mi skye/ mu stegs can du mi skye/ dbang po yan lag tshang bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan bar
'gyur/ theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas
shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can
'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dge slong sems stor ba
'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni/ sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni/ gzungs chen po thob ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i
dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba can rnams kyis lan gcig thos na/ 'chi 'phos pa'i tshe lhar skye'o/ /zhes khyod nyid kyis
bshad pa dang / da yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod
dang skye bo kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyi/ don dam par na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshad pa gang la la de'i mtshan thos na
sems thag pa nas dran par byas te/ 'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan lan gsum du/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH saM g+hA ya zhes de
skad ched du brjod du bcug na/ mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad la mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen
po'i phyogs su rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu/ gang zag de'ang bskal pa grangs med
pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi/ dngos po gcig gam/ dngos po gnyis sam/ dngos po gsum du bgyi/ ci ste dngos po gcig na
ni| skyabs gcig tu song bas dngos po gsum lags na ni/ skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum du gyur na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te/ dge
'dun yang de bzhin no/ /gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni/ skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa gsum gyi bar chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi mjal
bar mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol/ bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par
gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /don chen po 'di lta bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni/ shin tu
legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri ba'ang sa dang po dang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun
pa dang / sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no/ /khyed legs par nyon cig/
ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ skye bo thams cad ni/ thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
gzir te/ lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs te skyabs tshol ba/ mu stegs rnams rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog
btang ste skyabs tshol na'ang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do/ /me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus med do/ /de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin
gshegs pas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun du 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag
pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir bslab pa dang po nyan thos dang / rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do/ /de'i 'og
tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyad pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos po gcig par yang bshad de/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig gi nang
na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/ dper na/ 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun po phongs pa rnams
la 'tsho ba bstangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang / ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /dkon
mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni/ sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad
de| byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ni/ ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad pa'o/ /dge
'dun zhes bya ba ni/ mchod pa'i gnas so/ /ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te/ mthun pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma
byas thob pa ni/ yang dag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid grol ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad pa'ang 'dus ma byas
zhes bya'o/ /zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu mthun te/ rtsod pa med pa ni/ mthun pa ste/ don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| chos ni/ dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa rnams so/ /sdig pa'i chos ni/ spang bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni/ 'phel bar bya'o/ /de'ang sems kyis
dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun gnyis dngos po'ang mi gcig la/ ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do/ /chos ni/ dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su
dbyings mthun te/ so sor dbye bar dka'o/ /ji ltar so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na/ gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gnyis kyi mtshan bla dwags su btags te rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam
par grol ba'i phung po lnga thob pa dang / dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go /zhes bya bar don de lta bu'ang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi
dbang gis mi lus thob pa yin no/ /chos dang bral na mi med la/ mi las gud na'ang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ga la yod/ deng 'dir gleng ba ni/ mi dang chos su
gcig tu mthun la tha dad pa'ang yod de/ chos kyi dbang gis mir grub/ mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /nyan
thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni/ dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gtan tshigs su
dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni/ chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /ye ni/ dbyings gcig ste/ don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun tha dad pa'ang yod de/
de'ang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o/ /de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na/ khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur
ro| |spyod pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad de/ de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o/ /
sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o/ /chos ni/ mi rtag go /dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/ sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na/ deng 'dir bshad pa
ni| rtag tu gnas pa ni/ rnal 'byor spyod pa ba rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing / phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba/ skye 'gag med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni/
sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni/ yang dag pa'i chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /spyod pa pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos
kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni/ dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /yang phyin ci log brgyad gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo thams cad mthun zhing nam
du'ang rtsod pa med pa ni/ dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /sngon dkon mchog gsum mi dang chos su tha dad par bshad/ deng 'dir sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang
der byung bas don de'i phyir nas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad de/ skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ gang la rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| khams gsum mi rtag par bsam ste theg pa chen por bsgrub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa la
rnam par rtog par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag la byams pa dang snying rje thog
mar 'gro bar bya ste/ skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na'ang lan mi re ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can yongs su mi gtong ste theg pa chen po bsgrub
par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ grong khyer chen po gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la/ sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror na/ lam na g.yang sa dang / mun nag pa dang / shin tu
'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes bu mi gcig la bu gcig pa zhig yod pa shin tu'ang sdug mod kyi/ grong khyer de na bde skyid
pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do/ /zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyi lam 'jigs sa rgal nas grong khyer de'i sgor
phyin pa dang / rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste/ rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsam mo/ /bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma
khrid| da su zhig slad na gso zhig gu zhes bsam nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du chas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje'ang de dang 'dra ste byams
shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgoms te zag pa zad na yang mi shes grub pa mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag
pa zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa spong ste/ so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o/ /dper sgo
mang po zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o/ /dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o/ /dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes
bya ba ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni/ ye shes la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o/ /dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la bya'o/ /dper bu la dran pa ni/ snying rje chen po la bya'o/ /dper bu'i
thad du ldog pa ni/ sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o/ /dper lan dang grub pa mi len pa ni/ thabs mkhas pa la bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos bsdus te mi gtong ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di lta ste/ byang
chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dpog par bya'o/ /bcu po gang zhe na/ srog mi
gcod pa dang / ma byin par mi len pa dang / 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa dang / brdzun du mi smra ba dang / phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang / ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang / don med
pa'i gtam tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / brnab sems mi byed pa dang / gnod sems mi byed pa dang / log par mi lta ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang / snying
rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na/ byams pas ni/ dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/ snying rjes ni/ sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / dmyal ba las sgrol bar byed do/ /skye bo
rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar sgrub 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can
thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon par ston te/ theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang /
bka' stsal pa/ mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos mi skye ba ni/ gang / mi 'gag pa ni/ gang / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdig pa'i chos ni/
mi skye bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni/ mi 'gag par bya'o/ /de lta bu spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khams
gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi tshig dang / yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par
bshad mod kyi/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ni/ dus gsum du mi gnas la/ mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos/ chos bcu po gang
zhe na| bstod pa dang smad pa la sems skye bri med pa dang / snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang / shes rab can dang gti mug can la 'dra bar snying rje bskyed
pa dang / sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste snyoms par lta ba dang / mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyags mi 'dogs pa
dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na'ang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgra thos na'ang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa'i sems mi skyed pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang / bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du
shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu
dam pa khams gsum na bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste/ de bas na/ bsam gyis khyab dka' zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig
'jig rten rnam dag na/ /bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/ /tshul khrims dam du srung ba ni/ /skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam/ /byams pa spyad pas dam pa mchog /gang zhig 'jig rten sa 'di
ru| |lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de/ /ngan song gsum du ltung nges dag /byams sems de yis 'phral du 'byang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis/ 'jig rten ngan par
skyes na yang / /'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig /ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang / /mgo son ba tsam gyis 'byang / /gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa spang
'dod pa/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang / /dam chos srung bas shes rab 'phel/ /rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum/ /tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas/ /deng nas sang gi bar dag tu//

'jig rten 'di na gnas kyang sla/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas ni mi 'khrugs 'jig rten dang / /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis/ /shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na/ /sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med/ /khams
der bsod nams bya ba ni/ /dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad de/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /rang gis mi bzod bzod bya ste/ /pha rol po yang bzod bcug na/ /de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog /de
phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par/ /sems can thams cad 'dren bya ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na/ /
bla med byang chub myur du thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams
kyis deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba /rnams bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs spyad pa la
mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa dri ba legs kyi/ 'dod pa bzhin dris shig /ngas khyod la bye brag
phyed par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpas ci bgyis na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems la gdung ba ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/
byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul mi g.yo bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems
dpas ci bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ byang chub
sems dpas ci bgyis na/ thabs shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sems can gyi ston pa bgyid par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/
tshe tshe rabs rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sems spyod pa rnams gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis
par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ chos rin po ches legs par sgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshul khrims dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na
mtho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par
'gyur| byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar
'gyur| byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ gzhan gyis bstangs pa la rag mi lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/
bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
dpas ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang / khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid bar mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyis pa dang /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu nus pa'ang
shin tu legs so legs so/ /khyod legs par nyon la dran pa mngon du zhog cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bka' bzhin du thos par smon te mnyan
cing mnos par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems mi gdung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la snying rje cher bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus
bskyed cing le lo mi byed pa dang / skye shi'i 'khor ba rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi sems gdung ba med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nges pa'i tshig la bar ma
dor 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag med par mngon par chung ces brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cog la dad pa'i 'du shes
bskyed pa mi rigs zhes brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis las dge sdig gi 'bras bu mi brlag ces brjod
pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims srung ba dang / mang du thos pa dang / sbyin pa
byin pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jigs pa med cing tshul las mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khe stor ba dang mi snyan
par grags pa dang / smad cing dma' dbab pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis non kyang mi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos dkar po yongs su 'grub
par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po las dge sdig yid ches par ston pa dang / sbyin pa la lan mi re ba dang / dam pa'i chos srung zhing skyong ba dang / shes rab chen pos byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par shes par 'gyur ro/ /
chos bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun du bskyed pa dang / nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang / thabs la shin tu mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang chub tu bsngo ba dang
bzhi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bsod nams
dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems skyed pa dang / sdig yod na 'gyod tshangs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
gsol ba 'debs pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang bde
ba sgrub par byed pa dang / rang gi dga' ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / mnyan des byas te bzod pa sgom pa dang / le lo spong ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
tshe tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi zos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu dran par byed pa dang / bsod nams byas so cog
sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su sgrog par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems spyod pa rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su mi spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
spang ba dang / chos sgrub bas skyo mi ngas pa dang / chos ci thos pa gzhan la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rin po che legs par
sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa chen po'i chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel ba'i phyir sman
dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang mi brlag pa'i phyir nor gyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir sdug
bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi
gang zhe na/ chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams rgyu dang
rkyen las skye ba shes pa'i phyir chos la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / tha dad pa'i sems rgyud med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon par bzhag pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdam pa
dang / dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang / dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'dzin spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshogs mang po
kun dang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag chos sgrub na'ang khyad par thob par mi sgrub pa dang / le lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems
skyed pa dang / chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig tshol gyi bdag mi spyom pa dang / gzhan la dge ba'i chos bstan kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi tshol ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / rang gi shes
rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la ston par byed pa dang / rtag tu ya rabs kyi chos spyod pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sngon gyi dbang gyi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang mi bza' ba dang / zhe sdang can la
rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang / rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du bshad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub la rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la
byin pa dang / gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba mi brjod pa dang / chos kyis bsdus te sems can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang / chos zab mo chub par shes pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su mngon du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems mnyen des su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
mthu rnyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang / shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du sgom nus pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi
dang ldan na| sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs med par myong na'ang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad med
pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / byams sems tshad med par bsgom par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos pa skyed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir smon lam mi gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa
dang / brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos rgyun du spyod pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod
cing spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po'i rnam grangs spyad de/ sems can la phan pa dang bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun
mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khris ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni/ chos la
mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni/ chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do/ /de'i tshe
de'i dus na'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod mdo sde 'di legs par
zungs shig /chongs shig /ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji
ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ni/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa/ mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas
par gzhig pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ log par lta ba dang / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba/ khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dral ba/ 'khor ba las thar cing
mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su sgrol ba/ sa bon dam pa'i rgyu bskams pa la rlan par byed pa/ rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can theg pa gsum
gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang / 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / tshogs
dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / don rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i

chos de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni/ thos ma myong ste/ deng
thos pa 'di dag rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag la/ chos dang dge 'dun ni/ 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ khams gsum gyi sems can rang skye
zhing rang 'gag par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro/ zhes brjod do/ /bdag cag de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bsnyegs te mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes bla dwags su brjod pa legs so/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sku
thob par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o/ /gzung zhing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar
bshad pa bzhin bsgoms te dus gcig tu sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi'o/ /mi gtong bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan
'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha ton du bgyid dam/ glegs bam du yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir
'jug na/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu
rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcur nor
bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang na yi ge 'bru gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig gam/
sh+lau ka gcig 'bri'am/ 'brir 'jug na/ de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas
kyang sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i sh+lau ka gcig klog gam kha ton byas na/ bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/ /stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi
skyabs byin pa bas kyang gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te gzhan la tshig gcig gam/ sh+lau ka gcig gi don bstan na/ bsod nams de bas kyang

dpag tu med par che'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod pa skyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro/ /theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin
pa ni| sems can rnams kyi byang chub rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni/ sngon sdig can ma
rungs pa yin na'ang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon sdug bsngal can yin na'ang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon 'ching ba can yin na'ang da grol thar pa dang ldan
par 'gyur ro/ /sngon ma rgal ba yin na'ang da rgal ba can yin no/ /sngon blun pa zhig yin na'ang da ni/ slob dpon du chud pa'o/ /sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na'ang da ni/ zag pa
med pa'o/ /sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na'ang da ni/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na'ang da ni/ 'phags pa'i lam la chud
pa'o| |lus skye bo'i lus can yin na'ang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra'o/ /sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na'ang da mdo sde 'di klog pa
dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/ sngon so so'i skye bo lags kyang da ni/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang / sngon nyon mongs
pa can lags na'ang da ni/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/ /zhes byung na/ tshul khrims zhig pa dang /
mtshams ma mchis par spyad pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa'ang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa zhig lags sam/
don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kyang legs par zhugs pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang /
tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yong
med do/ /de ji ltar zhe na/ dper na/ dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig bu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phang shing sdug na/ pha yod pa'i tshe na ni/ nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so
cog la 'gal ba med/ bu'ang pha la sri zhu che ste pa'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo / /re zhig dus gcig na pha lam ring por mgron du song ba las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i

bar du bu de pha'i bston ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du byung ngo / /pha ring du lon te sar ma 'khor ba'i phyir ba shi ba skad du brjod de dud mo dag byed cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do/ /mya ngan
gyis non te sems stor nas pha'i bstan pa'ang brjed de chos la skur ba dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do/ /pha de yun ring mo zhig lon nas dus gcig
na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu'ang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pha'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzung su bzung nas nyes pa'ang ma byung ngo / /pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi
bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar spyad pas skur ba can zhes kyang mi bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dra ma zhes bya ba ni/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bu gcig bu zhes pa ni/ sems can thams cad do/ /phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims so/ /lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o/ /pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni/ tshe 'das so/ /zhes brjod pa'o/ /mya ngan gyis non pa ni/ sgrib pas
bsgribs pa'o/ /gzungs su mi 'dzin pa ni/ tshul khrims zhig pa'o/ /shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o/ /don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur ba btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te sems can gyis mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang
bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o/ /mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa ni/ ltung ba med pa'o/ /bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni/ chos la mi skur ba
yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni/ 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
mtshan thos pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
mdzad pa spyod pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di'i don shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
