spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs par
'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ bskal pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu rtsi ba/ zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig
'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do/ /yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni/ shin tu dkon
no| |gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o/ /de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang /
'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la yang bstan na/ log par lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yong su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa'ang 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
bka' stsal pa dang / nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na/ so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar
'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas yon mi 'ju mi srid de/ sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na'ang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin
la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde kha cig las byung ba lta ba log pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams
gcig tu lhan cig gnas su'ang mi rung ba dang / chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du'ang mi rung ngo / /zhes byung la/ gso sbyong gi tshe gang dag de 'phag pa'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge
'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na/ ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs/ gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na
ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad la/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/
bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par grol bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka'
stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang / snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsam ste don
de zhu ba ni/ rab tu'ang legs te/ ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyi/ legs par soms la nyon cig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la/ bdud dang / mu stegs dang / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par zad
do| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa/ sems can bzang ngan rnam par me rtog par sbyin pa byas na/ bsod
nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub bo/ /zhes bshad de/ byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni/ bsod nams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /log spyod la spyod pa byin pas ni/
bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni/ 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyun du 'gro'o/ /drin mi gzo ba dang / khre
med pa ni/ 'chi 'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o/ /log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang bsod nams can gyi yon 'ju na/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i gang zag
lta zhig ci smos/ de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / mtshams
med par 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang / log par lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na/ mchod yon yang 'ju bar nus so/ /
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thar pa chen po phyogs su
rgyas pa'i mthu dang phyin yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol ba/ dang de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bya ba
khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyad pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i
phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la
mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba
phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na nga
de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te bsnyan bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang
bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas nas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming thos te nyon mongs pa
yongs su spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'di da dung ma mthong ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsags te mchod pa phul na'ang de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga sngon bskal pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang / bsnyen
bkur dang bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang / tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshang par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bslab
pa dang / nga rgyal dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa
dang | thos so cog thams cad mi brjod pa dang / 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba chos nyan pa dang /
klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang / nyams pa mang

du byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas par bsgoms par
byas na| lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na'ang rdzogs par mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu/ nga bskal
pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa der
mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang / mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / don bsam pa la sogs
byas nas de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar lung bstan to/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te 'chang ba dang / klog pa la
sogs pa byas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang myur du thob par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir ngas
theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu

sbyin par byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu pa rjes chu/ /theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhun/ /theg pa chung ngu grog ma'i
mkhar| |theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu me stag tsam/ /theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o/ /dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ /sems can thams
cad go 'byed do/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa 'di las 'da' ba med/ /theg pa chen po 'di nang nas/ /theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / /dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni/ /
thams cad bsgral bar mi nus so/ /theg pa bla na med pa 'di/ /sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la/ /gang gis dpag med 'di spyad pa/ /nam mkha' dpag
tu med pa bzhin/ /gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yong med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te/ /thogs pa med cing dpag tu med/ /sems can thams cad de dag kun/ /theg pa chen po 'di zhon la/ /
theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na/ /gtos rgya che zhing mang du shong / /gal te theg chen yon tan dang / /theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni/ /bskal pa dpag med rab bshad kyang / /mtha' ru rdzogs par
yong mi nus/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa chen po dam pa'i mchog /sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na/ /byang chub shing drung mngon par 'gro /'ching ba med cing thogs med pa/ /
bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di/ /theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas/ /byang chub dkyil du 'jug par 'ong / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse phyir/ /
phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la/ /theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya/ /gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni/ /'phel ba'am 'grib pa yong med de/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas/ /
theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab/ /de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni/ /ye shes chen po
thob par bya/ /lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud/ /mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na/ /theg pa chen po'i skyabs song la/ /mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos/ /rig pa gsum dang rnam
thar gsum/ /des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms/ /log par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na/ /theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang / /dge rtsa phun sum
tshogs 'gyur bas/ /theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'/ /'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad/ /slob dang mi
slob de dag kun/ /theg pa chen por kun 'dus so/ /sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni/ /log par lta ba dang ni sdig grogs bsten/ /gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa/ /
des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus/ /de rnams spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba/ /grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob/ /skyes bu gang zhig don 'di shes 'dod pa/ /
theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye/ /de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon/ /zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan/ /de yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan/ /gang zhig
theg pa chen por spyod nus pa/ /de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad/ /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni/ /de ni bsod nams dpal med thob pa'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten khams su phyin pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag med mchod pa dang / /de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo/ /mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med/ /dpal dang gzi
brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms/ /de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'/ /byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub/ /
gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni/ /bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin/ /lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na/ /de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims brtson
'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang nus/ /de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so/ /rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa/ /des ni theg pa chen po thob
pa'o| |sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang / /theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang / /gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa/ /de ni tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin//
yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed/ /dam chos yang dag don la brten pa yang / /theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'jigs dang ni
stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang / /rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang / /theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis
so| |rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste 'bru gcig gam/ tshig gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig 'chang ngam klog na/ bsod nams 'di lta
bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ /sdug bsngal kun dang yong bral lo/ /nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste/ /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par
'gyur| |gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs dus ngan tshe/ /mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang / /ngas ni lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol pa/ /rgyal
ba'ang rtag tu de la gzhol/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na/ /rgyal ba'ang de la srung bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus/ /'khor ba'i
rgyud las bsgral ba dang / /bdud kyi dbung bcas 'jil yang nus/ /rgyal ba 'od mi 'gyur de las/ /ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa/ /shAkya thub ces
bya ba 'grub/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ /ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /
mdo sde 'di yi don shes te/ /blun po rnams la rab bshad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mi bzhugs kyang / /mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar/ /
gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di ma nos te 'chang ba
dang | bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad/ deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/ gal te ngas rgya cher bshad
du bskal pa'i bar du'ang bshad pas mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do/ /de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrungs pa dang /
yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la bsu skyel dang / chos nyan pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod
rten sgrub pa phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la ma brnyas pas rting ba yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan
par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas
sor mo bar 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bza' ba
dang | btung ba dang / zhim po dang / gtsang ma dang / nyams su bde ba byin pas bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la thos par dga'
bas ri dwags e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi g.yo dang mtshang sbed cing bcabs las gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par
'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng+ge'i ro stong lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phrag so shin
tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi
gtsug lag khang ngam/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang / slong ba rnams la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por pus mo'i lha nga la slab pa'i mtshan dang ldan

par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang / srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang / rim gro dang /
nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas ro phro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring po nas tshig kyal ba spangs shing dus su smra bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang
ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa rnams sdum pa la dga'
bas tshems thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag yid yongs su dag pas
tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams
la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa'i sems bsgoms te rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas
spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sgrub pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la
bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la sogs
pa'i bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du rim gro dang / btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas
mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur
ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs de smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / mkhan po
dang | bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par
'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin sgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro
d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na/ mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos
thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub pa ste ma mchis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma
lags na/ ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher grub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum dang / bden pa bzhi dang / phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang /
pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba'ang ma mthong / 'gag

cing nub pa'ang ma mthong / sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba/ brag ca dang 'dra ba/ chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/ rus sbal gyi spu dang 'dra ba/ ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/
nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ mo gsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/ mchis pa'ang 'dra
ma mchis pa'ang 'dra/ de dag mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa'ang ma lags/ ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma lags/ 'gag
pa ma lags/ nang du ma lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du ngas ni/
spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gsob ma lags/ skyes bu ma
lags/ gang zag ma lags/ shed can ma lags/ shed bdag ma lags/ byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi
mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags/ sgra ma lags/ rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ sna ma lags/ dri ma lags/ sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod
yul ma lags/ lce ma lags/ ro ma lags/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lus ma lags/ reg bya ma lags/ lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma
lags/ yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kyi
mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag gi
ma lags/ 'gro ba ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags/ phung po ma lags/ bden pa ma lags/ rdzun pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtong ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags/
'jug pa ma lags te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /phar bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang
mi mnga'/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'ang mi mnga'/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi mnga'/ gcig pa'ang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ ma
byon pa'ang ma lags/ ji ltar byung ba'ang ma lags/ dri ma can ma lags/ yongs su dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la
sogs pa'ang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ tshad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ sgom du ma mchis/ spyod du ma mchis/ dor du ma mchis/ blang du ma mchis/ mtha'
las 'das pa/ yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grangs
med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par chud de/ chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du
mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas par yang shes pas rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che
bai DUR+ya shin tu dang ba gsal ba/ 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung na'ang snga mkho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos
kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dang / sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam rdzab kyis ma gos pas na don 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod yang nyon cig /'di lta ste/ chos so cog
thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod pa zhes bshad/ chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang du'ang chos med do/ /kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ge bstan
to| |yi ge'i nang du ni/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni/ yi ge'ang med mod kyi/ don dam pa ni/ yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas sems can la sangs rgyas
kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod zer ba'ang bden te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skye ba med/ mi bsgom mi skyong /
sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug /de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te/ skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum
gyi lhums su'ang mi gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas nga ni/ skye rga na 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma por/ nga ni/ 'jig rten
na bla na med pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na chung bzang ma dang yang ma rtse na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang ma bslabs/ stobs dang
'phong rtsal yang ma bsgrun/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir gan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /nad pa mngon sum du bstan
pa ni| tshe la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /dge slong
mngon sum du bstan pa ni/ sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i chos brtson par bsgrub par bya ba'o/ /grong khyer
mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni/ khams gsum gyi btson ra nas thar pa dang 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o/ /slar gzigs pa ni/ byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o/ /
de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o/ /dbu skra breg pa dang / rgyan rnams spangs pa dang / rta tsan+ta ka zham ring dad pa
can la slar bskur ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang dbral bar bstan pa'o/ /kha spu bregs pa ni/ chos thams cad la mi chags par bstan pa'o/ /ka sha ngur smrig gyon pa ni/ sems
can 'dul bar bstan pa'o/ /drang srong u ta ka dang / a ran+ta la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni/ rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o/ /lo drug gi bar dka' thub spyad pa ni/ mu
stegs 'dul ba'o/ /zhal zas blangs pa ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /rtswa swa sti ka blangs pa ni/ cho ga shes par bstan pa'o/ /rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni/ nyam
rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o/ /lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa ni/ yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o/ /bdud rnams
btul ba ni/ dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas pa sa la brten pa ni/ bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o/ /sa chen po kun tu g.yo ba ni/ drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o/ /de ltar
mtshan ma med par bsgoms pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no/ /'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mkhyen nas chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa ni/
sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thub pa med de/ chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /dus gsum gyi bya ba
dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes
bya'o| |gang zhig de ltar bslab cing rtog pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la log par rtog pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can
zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste/ sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /zhes brjod pa dang / sangs
rgyas mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba'am nub pa mi mnga' bas rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma
bltams/ byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma 'das/ mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas pa/ sems can yongs su bsgral bar mdzad pa'i slad du dka' thub spyad cing mya
ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang yang dag par na 'gyur ba'am spros pa mi mnga' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yun du gnas te/ khams gsum na sku 'byung ba'ang chos kyi sku

rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo / /lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sku yon tan dang / sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa dang / sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang / sku nam
mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na/
sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o/ /sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni/ sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum
tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o/ /sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod
yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o/ /sku sprul cing 'byung pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na/ sku sprul
cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so/ /nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas
na chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra bas sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du sku rnam pa
lngar ston pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no/ /chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du
sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba legs so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa'am thogs pa med
de| rigs kyi bu/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag
theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lta ci zhig smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang / 'jig rten der de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa chen po
thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang / bcangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te phyag
'chal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang la las theg pa chen po chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
'gyur| gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu

gnyis kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog ste/ seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni/ nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o/ /nges pa'i tshig bstan
pa ni| de bzhin gshegs pa brtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o/ /yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i
bdud mu stegs la sogs pa spa bkong ste skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/ /de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams kun khebs
par g.yogs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs
dma'| lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mnon dbus dma' ba ni/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o/ /ljags kyi
drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so/ /snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni/ rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni/ dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni/ bde bar byas/ ma rig
pa ni| rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang / nags tshal dang / yul sa dang / chu bo'i klung dang / rgya mtsho dang / lcags kyi ri
khor yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par gyur cing nyal nyil dang / ljan ljin med de/ kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dper
na| shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa'i me tog gi char
bab pa dang 'dra'o/ /sa 'og nas byung ba ni/ sprin dang / na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste nam mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do/ /sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig
mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /zhes gsungs/ yang chos thams
cad ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /spyod la ma de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni/ theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi
snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi
rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma
snyed kyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni/ theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig ni/ dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo/ /dge slong
ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni/ rgyun du zhugs

pa'i lam thob bo/ /lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni/ chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par
mthong ngo / /de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i sgra stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
gtugs te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang / chos kyi mtshan thos
na'ang sdig 'byang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/
sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni/ sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni/ chos la gsol ba bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni/ dge 'dun la
gsol ba bgyi lags na gsum char la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/ gong na gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo / /zhes byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta ci zhig smos zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu legs par nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthus sangs rgyas ni/ sems
can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/ /sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mar
pos khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyang
chos so| |chos kyang dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas pa ni/ stong pa nyid de/ 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa

nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod zer ba lta na/ rnam pa gcig tu sgrub pa'i rigs
kyi rnam pa gsum du sgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gcig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin rgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo/ /rigs kyi bu
phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub
sems dpa' seng+ge sgras gsol pa/ legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pas bstan pa ltar na bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ yum/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi ni/ shul chen po/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni/ mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na ma
mchis pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing
bskyab par bgyi'o/ /sdom pa ma nyams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la'ang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gal te gang zag gang la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen
bkur bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba'ang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /ston pa la'ang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge

sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH sang+gA ya/ a dan+ti d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ A kA sha ni ba ni/ sarba d+harmA ni ba ni/ i

sha ma da/ pi ba sha na/ bi ma la su pa ri/ d+harma ni kha na/ bar du ni tsa ya ta ma le/ tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi bi te/ man+t+ra man+t+ra/ man+t+ra swAhA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing
mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtsog gyi
tu bgyi ste sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so/ /
gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di la smod pa ni/ tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur lte/
srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni/ sems dran pa nyams pa rnams slar rnyed pa dang / gzungs 'di lan gcig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger 'bris
te sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtsed 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par
'dzin na/ gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas glang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re
zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi bskyang bar bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgra la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang /
byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las 'don pa dang / bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing log par
lta ba rnams bzlog ste yang dag par lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni/ shin tu yang legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad khyod kyi ming dang sngags kyi

sgra thos nas dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod na/ gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde la 'chi 'phos na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing nga'ang mthong la/ khyod la sogs pa byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste the tshom med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs spangs pa dang / /dge ba kun gyi lam
bsgrubs te/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang / /rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi
bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo
sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsam na/ gang zag de ni/
skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs su ma lus par
'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa
dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ 'di

lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig
tu skad cig ma der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag bskal pa grangs
ma mchis pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig grangs ma
mchis par bgyis pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol te 'gyod tshangs
su gsol zhing mchis na skabs dbye zhing ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed
pa'ang dka' la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga mthol zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni/ log spyod la sogs pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi bdag
nyid mthong du nye bas yid la dran pa bzhin du mthol zhing shogs shig /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams
pa'i gsung thos nas gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag btsal nas bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs
su mchi'o/ /yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug pa mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal
zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
gsol lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol
lo| |yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /nub
phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bla ma phyogs na nam mkha'i snying
po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa
'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku
la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /skyes bu chen po dri ma med
par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srung la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
su gsol lo/ /'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la'ang phyag
'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
gsol lo/ /cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung dang ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da lta na sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad
la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang / bar snang la gnas

pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / shing drung gi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan
mnga' ba thams cad kyis snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig /kun dbang du gsol te sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams
cad byang bar gyur cig /yang de skad ces smras pa dang / bdag cag thog ma mchis pa nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du nor cing 'khrul ba'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba
dpag tu ma mchis pa nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal rang gis ma tshor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te tshe
phyi ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing las ngan pas bar du chod nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang
bsten cing dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag rang nyams kyi dbang gis
dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis
par bshad pa'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/ chos ma lags pa ni/ chos
lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa
dang shes rab la ni/ ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag
tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' bdag ste phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas la 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags
par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slad chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad
mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / ngag rtsub mo gtong ba
dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing mthol ma myong ste/ sems la nongs pa'am/ ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma
mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems
thog ma nas ma mchis par dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas mthol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos mun du btsugs te rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smos shing
brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do/ /zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma
mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnod zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi
sdig bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par
smon| yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu lta lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni/ sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni/ rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig
pa rnams ni/ ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni/ zhig par bshad/ lci ba rnams ni/ yang par bshad/ yang ba rnams ni/ lci bar bshad/ dag pa rnams ni/ ma dag par bshad/ ma
dag pa rnams ni/ dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas chos dang mdo sde la ni/ ma gus te smre
ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ bdud kyi tshig go /zhes bgyis
pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar
mya ngan las 'das te med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis nas lus dang / sems 'khrul cing phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs
shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang
thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma
mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang
'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du dge 'dun spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ da ltar
bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa'am/ rang nyam du spyod pa dang / yang rang
smos te bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo/ /zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te khyim nas khyim
med par rab tu byung na yang pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba
dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po dang / bdun shin tu lci ba'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas pham pa la thug gi bar du nyes pa
dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / mdo sde zab mo la skur ba dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas nongs pa bcabs te 'gyod cing mthol ma myong bas nyin
mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i chos la skur ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma
bshags ma mthol na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so/ /zhes byung bas na/ de'i slad du
deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnod zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / /ma 'ongs
pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje
mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun
chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bam pa bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams
mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng bdag cag gis sems can rnams dang / bdag cag rang rang gi slad
du phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar da mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha
ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs snyems te dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bar skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing nyon mongs pa'i sems 'khrugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i
yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus te 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems
'khrugs te/ spros pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang
ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang rjed so sor 'chags
so| |mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /ma rig pa'i dbang
gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag
kyang deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor
'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni/ ma lus pa'i sems can
de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa
dang skrag pa skyes nas nyes pa rnams mngon par mthol ba'i steng du sems can gyi sdig pa mang po'ang khyod kyis mthol zhing 'chags pa'i phyir khyod ni/ skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa
zhes bya'o/ /rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i steng du sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ring du dbral bar byas pas de'i phyir khyod ni/ skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin
te| rang gi don du smon pa ma yin te/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir
khyod ni| skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do/ /bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo khyod/ /khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen/ /thams cad mi mnyam pa nyid/ /bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshal

lo| |skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir/ /nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re/ /byams chen rgyal ba de min te/ /dgra gnyen byams dang phan snyoms mdzad/ /rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun/ /shes rab spyan
gyis mkhyen gzigs la/ /brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi/ /lhag gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin rgyal
ba skyabs gsol ba'ang / /dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig
sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa'ang / /mang du thos la 'brang bar byos/ /slob dpon dge la bkur byas na/ /sangs rgyas 'grub la yun mi ring / /gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyad/ /de ni dge slong
yang dag yin/ /gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa/ /de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya/ /gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa/ /de ni byang chub spyod pa 'o/ /gang zhig mya ngan
'da' 'gyur ba/ /de ni dga' ba yang dag pa 'o/ /tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / /rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma/ /zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos/ /chos gos rnam pa lus gyon
te| |lhung bzed gseg gshang thogs nas su/ /rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/ /lha rnams kun kyang dga' 'gyur bas/ /thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal/ /ngas kyang lha dang mi
rnams kun/ /de yi bya ba byed du gzhug /dper na lha bran thams cad kyis/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/ /rim gro gus par byed pa bzhin/ /da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste/ /phyi ma'i dus
su'ang dpag tu med/ /rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga dang sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten pa yi mi kun
kyang / /rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa ni/ /
sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing / /theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes/ /'das
pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa/ /phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu la/ /gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par/ /de ltar yid la bskyed nas su/ /sems kyis rnam par mi
rtog na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /rgyal ba'i drin lam lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin/ /rtag tu dad pa'i sems
bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas kun la sangs rgyas kyi/ /bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing / /lha yi 'bras
bu mi re ste/ /gcig cer bla med lam bsgrubs na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin/ /gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/ /yud
tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing / /mkhan la srid zhu mchod byas na/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /gang zhig nor rdzas sna
'ga' 'am/ /kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams/ /kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na/ /gang zhig 'ga' la
blo brtan nas/ /yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/ /mchod pa phul bas de lhag go /theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ /snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge
mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan blan 'dod pas/ /skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pa/ /stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi/ /srog gi sbyin pa
byin pa bas/ /bsam gtan sgom pa yon tan che/ /gang zhig sgom la skur ba dang / /dge 'dun 'khrug par byed pa ni/ /stong khams gsum po gang ba yi/ /mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang / /
srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/ /de sdig yang ni de bzhin no/ /gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la/ /skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas/ /de ni
rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bo nas blangs te tshigs su
bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la/ /gang mang lags shing gang mi mang / /mang dang mi mang gnyi ga yang / /dngos po dmigs su yod ma mchis/ /yang
dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /chos rnams kun dang mi 'gal lo/ /sems can kun la byams slad du/ /thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'ang de nas byon/ /yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad/ /de
yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems/ /sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che/ /rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs/ /
le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing / /'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ /rab tu sdug
bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la/ /zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na/ /'gyur ba ma
mchis bden par nges/ /de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang / /mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi/ /rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas/ /spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan/ /de slad mtshan ni
bcom ldan 'das/ /mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi/ /chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing / /dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas/ /thams cad kun la byams slad du/ /dus skabs
sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad/ /skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing / /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /'jig rten gang
nas mchis pa dang / /'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags/ /thugs rje chen pos sems can
bsgral| |gnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyad/ /thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med/ /de
yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /bla na med ces bgyi ba lags/ /nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan/ /rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /lha dang mi yi
ston zhes bgyi/ /dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo ba/ /bas sam ma bas chos kun yang / /byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas/ /de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sku nam mkha' la 'phags te zhal so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum
stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni/ nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu'ang nga brtan to/ /rnam par grol ba'i
phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo/ /shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/ /dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu'ang che'o/ /de bzhin du
mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni/ nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs
pas rgyun du nga'ang mthong la/ deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni/ nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin
chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen
po mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zham ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge
mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra
ba'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu'am/ sangs rgyas brgya'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs rgyas
khri'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes su bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag
tu med pa'ang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/ /bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan stong gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur/
sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'ang nges te/ the tshom med do/ /de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthol zhing bshags par byas la sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed na/ gdon
mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis gcig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje chen/ /shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje/ /tshogs kyi nang na seng+ge'i sgras/ /khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/ /pha la gzigs pa bcu gcig
bzhin| |rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis/ /de lta bu yi bla med pa/ /mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong rnams la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas da ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bya'o/ /khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa
nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ba ste/ de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byang bar gyur nas rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /dgra bcom par
'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no/ /byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin
no| |da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i
mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang dus gsum
gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs
rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi
sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa'ang
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang
dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las seng+ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting
nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byams pa
chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal
ba'i yon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams
cad nor cing 'khrul ba'i sems 'khrugs te mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis
dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyed la dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don
tam| yi ger bris sam/ kun chub par byas te dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri chus chag chag btab ste 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog
spos zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsal ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la/ gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan
gcig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na khrus lan gcig byas te seng+ge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang /
sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/ dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsol ba brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dri spos zhim po
bsregs la 'khrul sems bsal cing dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu mas ma mo/ /de ltar spyod pa rnams mthun zhing
'dum pa ni/ mchog ste/ de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni/ mthol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro/ /khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po dran
zhing don dam pa bsam la nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo / /nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ton nam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas
la dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag btsal nas mthol tshangs su byas te mdo sde 'di nyan na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing
sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang / sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / sems thag
pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang /
sems thag pa nas rgyun mi bcad pa dang / sems thag pa nas gzab pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsam pa dang / sems thag pa nas sangs
rgyas dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa
dang / sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i
nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang bar dri chus yang chag chag btab ste lus la'ang spos chus bkru bar bya'o/ /pog spos bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod par byas pa de
dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul bar gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /

byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun
gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes she na/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la rtags su
byas te| rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byang ngo / /rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo'i rmi lam
na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na/ de ni/ nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas
pa dang / lus la char bab par rmis na/ de ni/ nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/ gral du 'dug par
rmis na| de ni/ nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nam/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na/ de ni/ chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to/ /gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras
bu 'grub par mngon no/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma'am/ byang chub sems
dpa' dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig
mi 'byang mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ cho ga 'di ltar
bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo / /cho ga 'di spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo/ /de ltar
mthol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/ de ni/ mthol tshangs zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dran par gyis shig /bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas
de ni| bdag tshul khrims srung ngo / /da ni/ bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do/ /da ni/ bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha ton bgyi'o/ /zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis
shig /bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni/ rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to/ /des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste dbang du byed do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do/ /'phags pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas kyi rten byed
do| |'jam dpal/ 'di ni/ sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ gnas thob pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom
pa brgyad dang / sdom pa phyed can dang / khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas zhig
pa'am| nyams pa'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma mthol na/
mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mnar
med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par
smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
shin tu'ang mkhas so/ /shin tu'ang mkhas so/ /des na 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig /ngas bye brag
phyed par bshad do/ /ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /gcig tu na dgag
pa'am| 'or bar bya ba'ang med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tsha ba ni/ rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni/ shin tu'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang mi ngal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs
med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na me chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa khong du zhugs pa'i phyir mnar med
pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni/ gru bzhi lham pa dpag tshad brgyad khri
yod de| lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do/ /de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri
tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ /lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do/ /lcags kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po brtsegs mar
'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /de'i gra bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi bong tshad ni/ 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni/ glog gi 'od bzhin/
mche ba ni/ ral gri'i sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni/ spu gris gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni/ lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/ sder mo ni/ lcags kyi gsal shing dang
mtshungs/ mjug ma ni/ lcags kyi sbrul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig
rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun du med do/ /dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la de'i sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srung ma bco brgyad 'dug go /mgo ni/ srin po mgo /kha ni/ srin po'i kha dang
'dra ste| mgo la rwa bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so/ /ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal
mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni/ chu mig dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo / /lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na zangs po che bco
brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing sgo bzhir bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo/ /khang pa bar chad re re'i nang na'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad
khri bzhi stong yod pas khar bdug pa'i me skyug cing rab kun tu gang bar gtong ngo / /sbrul gyi sgra sgrog pa ni/ 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no/ /lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab
ba'ang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo / /der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni/ 'bum phrag brgyad khri'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe
zla med do/ /mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o/ /'bar ba'ang lcags kyi ra ba
kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal
gcig car ldang ba ni/ gong du smos pa bzhin no/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di
