'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa chen po la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rten la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'od la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
byang chub sems dpa' log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam ston pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma brtsegs pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shag gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bla med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos
kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i zom la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal thabs
can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' char pa'i rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin
chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rin chen snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ting nge 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rin chen dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bstan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bstan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rin chen mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsang ma'i
rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug gi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' blo dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bstan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' 'od stong dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla brtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' chos kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngos gzar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
chub sems dpa' yon tan 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' 'od 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' shes rab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang
bston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyis
brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bzhi brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
khri phrag lnga brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag drug brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bdun brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' khri phrag brgyad brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag dgu brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag stong gi byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la phyag btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgya
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag 'bum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgya la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag
'bum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems dpa' gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA khri'i bye ma
snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi lang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag
btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zag la las 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal ba 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing khams gsum gyi 'khor ba lam gtogs te/
rtag tu rnam par thar pa'i rgyal po'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' 'khob yul du yong mi skye/ /dge med yul du'ang de bzhin te/ /lus ngan len par mi 'gyur zhing / /log par lta
bar mi skye'o/ /ma rabs rigs su mi skye ste/ /mu stegs can du'ang mi skye zhing / /lus kyi yan lag kun dang ldan/ /dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/ /dka' thub sdom pa ma blangs kyang / /'di dag
rtag tu ldan 'gyur te/ /theg pa chen po'i spyod lam mdzes/ /rtag par sangs rgyas bdag nyid mthong / /de phyir gus par phyag btsal te/ /bcom ldan 'das chos la bde bar gnas/ /ma 'ongs dus na
sangs rgyas 'grub/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu brtsa dgus phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /sems stor ba'i dge slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis sems kyi
bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag bcus gzungs chen po rnyed nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying
por mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na theg pa'ang gcig tu bas te/ gnyis dang / gsum du ma mchis so/ /rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo
'di ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni/ lam chen po/ /rnal 'byor ba thams cad kyi ni/ mig /lta ba log
ba thams cad kyi ni/ sdud pa/ sems nyams pa rnams kyi ni/ spyod pa/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo ni/ gcod pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub pa'i sgo ni/ 'byed pa/ nyan thos rnams ni/ rim
gyis theg pa chen po la gzhol bar 'gyur ba lags te/ da bdag gis kyang gzungs sngags chen po 'di gzung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gang zag la las tshul khrims kyi sdom pa
dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing klog par 'byed na/ de la'ang de bzhin du bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang / zhag bdun
gyi bar du spyod cing sgom par byed pa la bdud sde to can dkrug pa'i skabs tshol ba mchis na'ang bdud des kyang 'khrug pa'i skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
gis mdo sde 'di yun du gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde
'di srung ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum srung ba yin no/ /yang nga'i bstan pa'ang srung ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags

smras pa| na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH sang+g+ha ya/ a dan+te d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ A kA sha ni/ swa b+hA ba/ sarba d+harmA ni swa b+hA ba/ i shaM da/ pi ba sha na/ bi ma la su ba ri/ d+harma a ti ka na
pa la ni sh+tsa/ ya tha ma le/ tsA le tsA le/ hu lu hu lu/ bi sha de bi sha de/ man+t+ra man+t+ra swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mchod rten la lan bdun
bdun bskor ba dang / de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bya'i/ gzhan
du mi g.yeng par bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang bshad do/ /gal te la las gzungs 'di la skur cing smod par bgyid na/
sangs rgyas de snyed la skur cing smad pa lags so/ /gzungs sngags 'di la skur ba'i gang zag ni/ tshe rabs su'ang sgrub pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub par 'gyur te/ khams gsum
las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sems stong pa las slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs sngags 'di la rna gcig tsam thos pa'am/ thos nas yi ger
'bri zhing sha dang / chang bcad de za gcig par bgyid cing / khrims srung ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i rtsed mo g.yeng ba mi bgyid pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi
'jug pa dang / rtag tu byams pa la sgom zhing bsam gtan la dam par lta ba'i gang zag de ni/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa mchis pa nas gsog gsog pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang /
sdig lci ba la sogs pa'ang gzungs sngags 'di thos te sems thag pa nas zlos shing 'dzin pa dang / nyin gcig bzhin klog cing kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi brjed
par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang chub ba'i bar du ngan song du mi ltung ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ khyod
dkon mchog gsum skyob pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan par sems shing / srid pa gsum las bsgral zhing gdon pa dang / slob pa grangs med pa la phan pa chen po byed pa dang
log par lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gzungs sngags phye zhing bstan pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi ming dang / gzungs sngags kyi sgra 'di sems can
la las thos nas mos pa dag gus pa bskyed de ma skur ba'i mi de ni/ tshe 'di la'ang bde ba nas shi 'phos nas kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong zhing nga'ang mthong la/ khyod dang byang
chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po so sor rang gis rig pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba the tshom mi za bar 'gyur ro/ /kun
nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing dge ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam sgrub pa ni/ kun kyang mos pa dang / dad pa'i dbang gis so/ /nga 'das pa'i phyi na
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ skad cig la phyogs bcu na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
rgyas dang / gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal nus shing / theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa ji
bzhin bar yid la byed pa'i gang zag de ni/ thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
las thams cad kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge tshul pha'am/ dge tshul mas ngo bo nyid kyi sems
stor bas rang gi rtsa ba bzhi gzhig pa dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / lci ba drug dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'ang phyogs
bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan la mos ba bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ de lta bu'i las mi dge ba kun
ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas 'od nges pa zhes bya ba de'i drug nas de'i tshe rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po rnams
glo bur du skad cig dus der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi ba'o stugs te phyag btsal nas mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa ni/ brjod kyis kyang mi rdzogs te/ la las ni/ mi dge
ba bcu bgyis/ la las ni/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis/ la las ni/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la skur ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sdig pa
bgyis ba de dag dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mdo sde la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mdun du mthol
zhing bshegs par 'tshal na/ de gnang bar gsol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jigs ba'i sems bskyed dka' ba dang / dge ba'i sems bskyed
dka' ba las bskyed pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis mi dge ba bcu bshegs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga bshags pa dang / 'dod chen la sogs pa bshags nas de
bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de mthong bar 'dod pa de legs kyi/ yid la sems pa bzhin mthol cig /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa'i
gsung thos nas chos gos tshul bzhin du bgos nas thal mi sbyar te spyi bos btud nas phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin du phyung / bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i chos la phyag
'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing
skyabs su gsal lo/ /yang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha'
yas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang steng gi phyogs kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang 'gog gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal
zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /shar phyogs na 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /lho phyogs na 'phags pa 'jig rten gzungs la'ang phyag
'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /nub phyogs na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs na 'phags pa zla rgyas la'ang
phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /steng gi phyogs na 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og gi phyogs na 'phags pa yon tan
bstan pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /thog ma'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol
lo| |ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sprul ba'i sku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dri
ma med par grugs pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /kun dga' bo dang 'od srung la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /
'phags pa'i lam bzhis mngon du byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sems bskyed pa dad po pa rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /mdzod chen
po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / yang dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /chos kyi mdo sde gzhan ji snyed bzhugs pa la'ang phyag 'tshal
zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sku gdung brgyad du bgos pa'i gzugs rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la'ang
phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs ba dang / bar snang gi lha dang / gnam gyi

steng dang / sa'i steng dang / sa'i 'og dang / ri'i lha dang / tshal gyi lha dang / shing drug gi lha dang / rigs sngags 'chang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i mig dang
ldan pa dang / lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis gzigs shing gsan te kun gyis dbang mdzad par gsol lo/ /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad la ma
mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i khams tshun char
nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du rmongs shing bslad pa'i sems kyis log par mthong ba dpag tu ma mchis pas las dang nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis
pa ni| brjod kyis mi rdzogs te/ sdig pa mang po ci bgyis pa rnams bdag nyid kyis ma tshor ma rig pas mi dge ba'i sems rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pha rol ma mthong
zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong ba la gnas te nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing mi dge ba'i las kyis bar chad du gyur cing bsgribs
pa'am| sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pas dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ pha dang ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags
pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ yang rang nyams kyi dbang gis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang / yo byad la sogs pa spyod pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la'ang mi rigs shing tshul ma
lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa snyed bshad pa dang / byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems can la'ang ngan du
smad pa dang / chos kyi mkhan po la skur ba'am/ dam pa'i chos ni/ chos ma lags par bshad pa'am/ chos ma lags pa ni/ chos lags par bshad pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa
mi rtag go /zhes bgyis pa'am/ dam pa'i chos kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis pa'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis pa'am/ phan pa'i sbyin pa la ma dad pa'am/ chos
log pa la dad cing 'dzin pa de lta bu'i slad du da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni/ dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnod pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol
lo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs rje dang byams pa'i sems mnga' ba kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad 'gyod cing bshags pas tshangs pa
gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis
pa'am| 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'am/ 'dod chen pa'i las spyad pa'am/ mi
dge ba'i tshig rtsub po smras nas dge ba'i chos la skur ba'i sdig lci ba'i las bgyis pa'ang slar 'gyod cing bshags ma myong ba dang / yid la 'dzem pa dang /
ngo tsha ba ma mchis pas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i dngos po sdig lci ba la sogs pa bgyis pa'am/ thog ma nas yid la 'jigs shing 'dzem pa ma mchis
pas de lta bu'i sdig lci ba bgyis pa bdag nyid kyis nges par 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs shing dad pas byin pa blangs pa mthol zhing bshags ma myong ba'am/ dam pa'i chos
yun ring du gnas par bgyi zhing / rim gror mchod pa'i bsam pa ma mchis te/ de la mi snyan par smad cing yang log par bltas pa'am/ ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs
pa'i nyes pa mang po bgyis pa'am/ yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gsum ma mchis zhes bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu
dang / mtshams med pa lha'i sdig lci ba de lta bu bgyis pa'i slad du da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni/ dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon
mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags pas na bdag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tu ma
mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba bgyis pa rnams bsal cing slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa
dpag tu ma mchis pa nas log par mthong bas lci ba bzhi ni/ sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni/ lci ba bzhir bshad pa'am/ zhig pa ni/ ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa ni/ zhig
par bshad pa'am/ lci ba ni/ yang bar bshad/ yang ba ni/ lci bar bshad pa'am/ gtsang ba ni/ mi gtsang bar mthong / mi gtsang ba ni/ gtsang bar mthong ba la sogs pa log par
mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag ni/ bshad cing bstod/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ni/ gus par ma bgyis shing mi dge ba'i don rnams la gzhung bzung zhing bsam pa
dang / ma brtags pa rnam pa brgyad 'chang ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ bdud kyi tshig ces bgyis/ bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bka' zhes bgyis pa'am/ bar 'ga' ni/ mu stegs kyi ston pa drug gis rnam par bshad pa la mos shing bzung ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
zhugs te dkon mchog gsum la rtag pa ma mchis snyam sems la 'khrul pa byung ba la sogs pa lta ba log pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de lta bas na/ da
'jigs shing dogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ kun la
snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pas
gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las/ gal te rtsa ba bzhi'am/ mtshams med pa lnga'am/ yang dag pa'i chos
la skur pa btab pa ma mthol ma bshags na nges par sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang de la skyabs mdzad par mi spyod do/ /dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi mis kyang skyabs byed mi
nus so| |zhes thos pas ni/ de'i phyir 'jigs shing dogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /'das pa'i
sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni/ thugs rje dang /
byams pa'i mnga' bdag ste/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing
mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'am/ las kyi sgrib pa'am/ rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am/ lci ba
bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma
mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba rnams bsal te slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa
nas da ltar gyi tshe 'di'i bar du dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor dang / phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi spyi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/ da ltar gyi dge 'dun gyi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/
dag 'dun sde lnga'i nor dang / dge slong ngo cog gi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/ yon bdag thams cad kyi rdzas la thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / bdag gis yang dag pa'i chos dang /
bsam gtan bzhi dang / 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo/ /zhes smras pa de lta bu'i las ngan pa'i rgyu des kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ khyim nas rab tu byung
nas rtsa ba bzhi'i sdom pa zhig pa dang / lci ba'i chos brgyad dang / sdom pa drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed
sum cu dang / ltung byed dgu bcu rtsa gcig dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams dang / shin tu lci ba'i chos bdun rnams dang / nongs pa bgyis
nas phas pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga la thug gi bar du re re nas bgyis pa'am/ yang dag pa'i chos nyid dang / mdo sde zab mo la skur pa'am/ 'dod chen pa'i las
bgyis pa'ang bcabs shing gsang nas nyin zhag re re zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de la sogs pa de ring skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gyod cing bshags par 'tshal lo/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas sangs rgyas dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud cing rnam
par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal bas mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs bgyis pa'am/ bdag gi rigs snyems pas dar cing rgyags pa'i tshe mi dge ba'i las rnams bsam pa bzhin du
bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mthong bas byis pa lta bu'i blun pa'i sug las bgyis pa'am/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du nye bar mchis shing nyon mongs pas sems dkrugs pas
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus pa'am/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mdud pas
sems dkrugs shing bskyod pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid la sogs pas rnam par bsdus pa'i sdig pa mang po de rnams 'gyod de/ da ma lus par bshags so/ /yang sangs rgyas
dang / dam pa'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /
yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la gus pa'i tshul gyis rim gro ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /gti
mug pas rmongs shing bsgribs te dregs shing le lo dang / rang nyams kyis mi dge ba rnams bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad da bdag gis mchod nas sems can ma lus pa thams cad sa bcu la gnas par bgyis te/ kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa nyid thugs
su chud pa dang ldan par bgyis par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rgyal rigs dra ma chen
po rab tu legs so/ /rgyal rigs dra ma chen po bdag nyid kyi dge sdig gi las la rtog pa mkhas te 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos 'gyod nas sdig pa'i las rnams mngon par
bshags kyi steng du sems can thams cad kyi phyir yang mthol zhing so sor bshags pa de bas na/ khyod ni/ rgyal rigs dra ma chen po nyid yin te/ bdag sdig pa mi dge ba dang bral gyi
steng du sems can thams cad kyang sdig pa dang bral bar byas pa dang / bdag nyid kyi phyir smon lam ma btab pas sngar sems can thams cad kyi don du smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa nyid thugs su chud pa dang ldan par bsngos pas na/ khyod ni/ rgyal rigs dra ma chen po yang dag pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum
stong gis mthol bshags zin nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ bcom ldan nyag gcig rab kyi mchog /khams gsum rgyan lags yab yum dang / /
thams cad snyoms pa'i ye shes lags/ /kun la snyoms pa'i dpe ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas dkon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byis pas shes rab bdag phyir spyad/ /nor rdzas byin la
lan 'dod phyir/ /byams chen sangs rgyas de min te/ /dgra sdang nye byams snyoms mdzad pa'i/ /brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi/ /rkang gnyis kun la sangs rgyas gtso/ /shes rab spyan ldan
mkhyen gzigs khyab/ /lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /bdag cag kun gyis gus phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bdag skyabs mchi/ /dus
gsum sangs rgyas mchod byas 'dra/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos
ni tshol 'dod na/ /thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brongs/ /dge bas mkhan po bzhin du bkur/ /sangs rgyas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam dag srung byed na/ /ming ni dge slong des pa
yin| |stong nyid gang gis rtogs nus na/ /de ming rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin/ /brtson 'grus la las sgrub nus na/ /de ming 'phags lam spyod pa yin/ /la las mya ngan 'das bsgrubs na/ /
de ming yang dag bde ba yin/ /tshul khrims sdom pa'i dge tshul dang / /rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong dag /zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong bya/ /chos gos brtags pa rnams bgos te/ /lhung
bzed 'khar gsil sogs bkur zhing / /dag pas bsod snyoms gtsang blang bya/ /lha rnams thams cad dga' mgu ste/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal thal sbyar nas/ /lha rnams nged kyis mi
'di dag /de yi mngag gzhug bsgrub par bya/ /dper na lha dbang brgya byin la/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha gzhan rnams/ /rim gro gus pa byed bzhin bya/ /tshe 'dir
legs pa nyid 'thob ste/ /tshe rabs gzhan gyi'ang dpag mi khyab/ /rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims sdom/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga
dang byang chub ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten mi rnams thams cad kyis/ /mos pa rnam dag sems bskyed de/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs par/ /mya ngan 'das par mngon par
shes| |chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /da yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/ /'jig rten mi rnams thams cad la//
bye brag dbye ba'i sems med par/ /theg pa gcig chos mngon shes te/ /phyogs bcur snga ma 'das pa dang / /da ltar ma 'ongs dus rnams la/ /sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu
las| |gnyis dang gsum zhes bya med par/ /bye brag dbye ba'i sems med de/ /de ltar mos sems bskyed nus na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin//
rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga ni 'das te gshegs phyin/ /mi yi nang na la la zhig /sems can rnam pa thams cad la'ang / /sangs rgyas snying po nyid yod ces/ /rtag tu mos
ba'i sems bskyed na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /la las thang gcig dge spyad de/ /'bras bu srid pa mi sgrub la/ /bla med 'bras bur bsngo byed
na| |sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tsho ba pa yin/ /da yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /mi yi nang na la la dag /dkon mchog gsum la rim gro gus/ /skad cig mdo
sde 'di bklags te/ /mkhan la sri zhu yon phul na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bde gshegs drin la lan bsgrubs yin/ /la las nor rdzas sna 'ga' dang / /gos dang kha zas bdog
rnams kyis/ /kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/ /bcom ldan bka' drin 'tsho ba pa yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga yi chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/ /la las mi 'ga' gros btab cing //
thad gcig mdo sde 'di nyan na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/ /yon phul bas ni 'di don che/ /theg mchog mdo sde 'di lta bu/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yum yin pas/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub dad bsam zhing / /'di la rim gro gus bskyed la/ /gnyis med phan tshun sems snyoms na/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong
da yang nyon/ /la las chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin sgrub bsam ste/ /thang gcig sangs rgyas thun zhugs na/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /
srog byin bas ni 'di don che/ /dge 'dun bsam gtan dkrugs skur na/ /khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams dang / /sems can thams cad bsad dang
mtshungs/ /bsam gtan dge 'dun dkrugs skur na/ /de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no/ /la las dge ba sbyod mthong nas/ /dpyas shing skur te ma mos na/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi
rigs kyang gcod/ /bcom ldan bka' drin bsgrubs pa min/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthon dang / mi sum stong la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bste chos bstan zin nas dga' mgu
yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs spyi bos blangs so/ /'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'tshal ba'i chog dang 'gyod tshangs kyi le'u nyi tshe
rdzogs so// //
